story:
My name is Jason Neilson. I have created this page to raise funds for fellow Cleethorpes Athletics Club member Zac Shaw (pictured above) who needs help with funding so that he can pursue his dream of competing at the Rio 2016 Paralympics. Zac is a T12 classified athlete. With the funds raised he will able to compete in Doha next year at the Championships. Funding is also needed for entry fees, accommodation costs and equipment. 

Although only taking up running 4 years ago I have ran in 9 half marathons, including running the Great North Run twice and ran in only 1 marathon, the Hull Marathon in 2012. After hearing that Zac needing funding I decided that I wanted to do something to help or contribute towards the financial support he is looking for. 

Please make all your donations on this page. In addition to this page I am also running 2 full marathons in 2 days in an event called the Maravan to raise funds for Zac. This event will take place on the 22nd/23rd November 2014. Please Sponsor me. Funds will still be able to be donated several weeks after the event has finished.

story:
Short Summary

The Fashion Merchandising and Design Program at Missouri State University is hosting their annual fashion show on April 25, 2014. The merchandising students are working to produce the show, while the design students will be showcasing original designs, featuring the Senior Collection's original 5-7 piece collection. Producing this annual fashion show allows students a real world simulation, utilizing PR, visual, and styling skills learned in the classroom, allowing for students to build their portfolio as they approach graduation and secure a successful position in fashion.

This year's theme is Legacy 2015 and we are asking for your help and support! The money raised helps cover the event expenses as well as funding scholarships for future students being recruited through the event. It’s a great opportunity to partner with an ambitious group of students while also getting your name out to a large number of people.


What We Need & What You Get

As a sponsor of the Legacy 2015 fashion show, you will be awarded many perks based on your contribution. All this would entail is a minimum of $50.00 and to fill out a simple advertising contract. We will display your name and logo the day of our event as an event sponsor on projector screens above the performance stage, as well as in the lobby of the venue. It is held at the Springfield Expo Center, and there will be around 1,000 people in attendance from all over Missouri. Other perks include free tickets to the show and free t-shirts.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is able to contribute at this time but if you could help us spread the word to all of your friends and family we would be very appreciative. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to tell everyone about the Legacy 2015 fashion show!

story:
Fashion trucks are to boutiques as food trucks are to fine dining. These mobile shops are the artisans of the industry, delivering high quality products at affordable prices with a certain mystique attached. No wonder their presence in metropolitan areas has developed a cult like following, both on the streets and social media alike. We would love to add our vintage flair to the scene with a renovated 1959 Airstream.

Spirit Love has been a mobile boutique for five years. We have morphed with time from selling jewelry to pulling racks of clothes from our trunk, like a Mary Poppins purse, to sell from tents at festivals and make-shift shops in homes.  With Spirit Love experiencing positive growth each of those years, we took a leap and purchased a mid-century Airstream in great condition this past fall.

Having this space, or Glamstream as we like to call it, where our shop can be permanently set up, will free up our time to do a few things we love best. Our top priority is to make women feel comfortable and beautiful, helping them highlight their best features by teaching them how to shop for their body type and skin tone. You see, we not only sell high quality clothes, but we style women for any type of event that’s important to them - from speaking engagements and weddings to a dinner date or concert. 

Spirit Love’s renovated Glamstream will not only free up time to connect with our customers, but also with our community. Rachael Painter, the owner of Spirit Love, has always wanted our store to be more than merely “profit-driven.” Because of her heart for women and community, Spirit Love has gifted special occasion outfits to nominated women, and supported multiple organizations and charities. This past year we bought shirts from an organization in Denver, who sustainably work to teach homeless and at-risk youth a trade, giving them a future other than a life on the streets. Together, we were able to raise $24,000! Our customer’s got the chance to be part of something bigger, and we are constantly in search of other social justice movements to take part in, with a few collaborations in the works.

 We’ve created a shopping environment where women feel comfortable.  We understand that shopping can be a daunting task, and for some is not enjoyable.  We have clothes for real women – those with curves, and lumps, and scars, and fluff, and the tall and slender.  So many times we have had women say, I’ll bet you don’t have anything for me, and we are thrilled that we are able to help her select a special outfit, without feeling embarrassed that it doesn’t fit.

What We Need & What You Get

Now we need your help. We cannot grow our community with more empowered, encouraged women, supply chic and affordable designer apparel,  or reach out to those in need without your assistance. Spirit Love purchased the Glamstream, and we’ve been working extremely hard with our own hands in the renovation, but we need to entrust the remainder of the renovations to a professional. Transforming this dated camper into a modern chic store, bringing a 60 year old tiny house into this century’s fashion truck boom, has a price tag of $16,000. We need to reach this goal within 30 days to stay within our projected timeline of having the Glamstream completed and ready to kick off Colorado's summer festival season, at the end of May.

For supporting us, you'll be rewarded!  You'll be sporting locally sourced items for contributing: a WIN-WIN-WIN!! 
Each level is named after important parts of our renovation, like you, if any part is missing, the whole project falls apart!



The Impact

We work with a plethora of women who have been impacted by Spirit Love already.  We want to share their stories with you.  With this project fully funded, we'll be able to help MORE women like these!  





Risks & Challenges

There aren’t many.  I have been in business for 5 years.  Each year, We have had steady increase. 

The biggest challenge will be completing fully in time for market season.  In working with a professional renovator, he has helped outline the sequence of events.  The biggest risk is if he isn’t able to complete the frame powder coating, replacing the belly pan, and a few other projects I’m not able to do. In the event his portion of the renovation gets pushed back, we’ll scale back our plan to doing the most important projects, to the least important projects, and have the major things done for show season, and we’ll finish the rest through the summer.  Some things, like a furnace is not a necessary in May as, say flooring.  We have some friends who have been chomping at the bit to help with renovations, so we're confident, that with their help, this project will be completed by May 20th.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • If you are on twitter, please Tweet: It's about time @shopspiritlove got the #glamstream on the road. I am supporting this indiegogo campaign. You can too!
    • Please PLEASE share this on Facebook, Twitter, with your cousins, your best friend.  Be sure to include a message why they should contribute. :)

story:
update: due to changing costs, full retail price will be $85 per pair. not $75 as specified in perks. now save even more money by contributing now!


The Story

I did a lot of financial modeling at my old job. I'd stare at email and Excel for 9 or more hours a day, and by the end of the day my eyes would hurt...a lot. Many of my friends had similar experiences as they also worked jobs that involved staring at computers all day long: investment banking, consulting, web development, etc.

As I began researching, I learned that Digital Eye Strain really was a thing, but that any glasses to correct for computer screens were marketed and branded towards gamers. I thought about how many other people stare at a computer screen all day long, that would want a pair of affordable, cool glasses. So that's how Felix Gray started. We want to create a stylish brand for computer glasses, where our lenses increase contrast and reduce glare leading to an overall more comfortable work (or digital play) experience.


Testimonials from our Beta Testers

Plus, they're wearing their frames!


The Science

Our eyes never evolved to stare long hours at things up close; in fact, they're at rest when looking 20 feet away. When staring at closer objects, the ciliary muscle in our eye spasms back and forth to adjust. This strains the eye and makes it tired. Our lenses increase the magnification of our sight, helping the ciliary muscle better stay at rest. 

However, digital devices pose two additional problems: back-glare and static glare.

Back-glare is light that hits the back of traditional lenses and then bounces into your eyes. If you've ever been able to notice the reflection of your eye in the lens, you've experienced pretty bad back-glare. In fact, this glare means that traditional lenses actually can exacerbate the damage that staring at screens cause your eyes. Our anti-reflective coating is a thin, hard film layered onto our lens that reduces this back-glare. Essentially, it equalizes the light reflected from the inner surface on the lens to the light reflected on the outer surface of the lens. In layman terms, it gets rid of the reflection of your screen on your lenses. This creates less interference for your eyes, which allows them to be more relaxed.

In addition, our lenses have a special EMI coating (Electro Magnetic Interference) that works similarly to an anti-reflective coating. However, EMI is special in that it reduces the static glare that digital devices produce. This further helps reduce the stress your computer, iPad, or smartphone will place on your eyes.


The Numbers



Our Needs & Your Wants

Producing eyeglasses are expensive. Especially ones that use cellulose acetate to create beautiful frames in amazing colors and patterns and high quality lenses with special coatings to reduce stress from digital devices. Completing our goal will allow us to produce 3 frame styles; if we fall short, we’ll produce as many frame styles as we can with the cash on hand. 

Our cost breakdown:

The Timeline



The (Beta) Goods

We're currently beginning our beta to test how effective different lenses are. Here are our first four frames.

story:
Unique personality bezel & crown

Welcome to SCURO Watches  

SCURO watches is a new watch company with a simple philosophy: create a timeless dive watch in a super lightweight and strong titanium case that is powered by a high quality automatic mechanical movement. The result is a versatile watch that can fit in at the office, the beach, or out to dinner. After a year of designing, finding a manufacturer capable of producing the design, and product testing - we are proud to present SCURO watches.

Applied indices dial
Crown & Bezel are in the same design style​
 
Dive watches are some of the most popular and historically important watches. However, some are just too expensive for many buyers and “affordable” dive watches are often big and heavy while also disappointing with the movements they offer. By cutting out the middleman, SCURO watches are able to provide a rugged yet handsome watch made of titanium, in a thin 11mm thick case. The signature bezel adds a touch of contemporary styling while being discreet enough to allow SCURO watches to exemplify dive watch design. Our design goal was simple: create a no-compromise dive watch that respects history but utilizes cutting edge materials.
Genuine Italian leather straps​
Engraved S logo buckles​
Lovely lumeshot - Nato straps

 

In the Press

https://techcrunch.com/2016/07/28/scuros-titanium-dive-watch-hits-on-all-cylinders/
 
http://www.ablogtowatch.com/scuro-offering-new-upgraded-model-s-titanium-dive-watches/
 
http://www.watchisthis.com/scuro-watches-bringing-titanium-kickstarter/
 
http://www.recensioniorologi.it/scuro-watches/
 
http://www.thetimebum.com/2016/07/preview-scuro-model-s-titanium-diving.html
 
http://www.thecoolector.com/scuro-titanium-dive-watches/
 
http://watchbandit.com/scuro-watches-a-truly-perfect-diver/
 
Scuro watch reviewed by @Recensioniorologi.it​

 

The SCURO watches mission is simple: -

We are the no-compromise, timeless looking, titanium dive watch that is designed to last.

Quality : Built to last and backed by a one-year warranty.

Aesthetics : Timeless design with a modern touch and contemporary

Materials.

Affordability : Premium in quality yet affordable in price.

Versatility : Designed to accompany any outfit, occasion or activity.

S1 Black - Nato strap
S1 Black - Genuine leather strap
 

The Titanium Case  

Titanium is a very popular material choice for high-end watches for three main reasons: -

First off, it is about five times stronger than steel, making the SCURO watch far more durable than even costlier alternatives on the market.

 -Titanium is about half the weight of steel with a density of 4.5g/cc vs. 7.8g/cc for steel. 

 -Finally, titanium is highly corrosion resistant. This means no rusting and has the added benefit of being hypoallergenic.

Custom S logo crown. 11 mm Thin case only weight 40g without strap.
 
Measuring 40mm in diameter with a thickness of 11mm, the model S Titanium watch case is fitted with a scratch resistant anti-reflective Sapphire crystal and a solid Titanium screw caseback. These dimensions make for a very wearable piece that is ideally proportioned and allow for versatility while allowing a water resistance of 200 meters. It’s dive ready with a nicely gripped and simple dive bezel. Thanks to the titanium case, the SCURO model S watch weighs just 40 grams. The SCURO Titanium is features a Miyota 9015 caliber movement. This solid, reliable movement has a 42 hour power reserve, 24 jewels, and a classic three hand display with discreet date display at six o'clock. The spec of the Japanese 9015 is a conscious one that brings with it many benefits. For starters it’s more than a match for its Swiss counterparts on all levels; from accuracy to reliability. Smooth with a decent power reserve it’s an automatic movement that can be hand wound and features a hacking seconds hand for syncing to your chosen time zone. The movement runs at 28,800 vibrations per hour with a power reserve of 42 hours. Granted, there are movements out there with bigger reserves and faster sweeps but they come at a price and tend to spend more time on the work bench. We simply want the model S to spend more time on the wrist. It’s also a nice thin movement, which means we can keep things slim in the case without losing strength.
 

 

IMPORTANT FEATURES OF THE MIYOTA 9015 AUTOMATIC / MANUAL WINDING

The 9015 is powered up by either an oscillating movement of it’s weighted rotor through natural counter clockwise movements. Or manually winding it by the crown. Just pull the crown to position “A” and turn roughly 20 times

HACKING SECOND HAND

Hacking function allows the second hand to completely stop while setting the time. Crown must be pulled to time setting position for the second hand to stop. This is done for precise synchronization between multiple time keeping sources

VIBRATIONS PER HOUR

The standard for modern watches is 28,800 vibrations per hour. Our Miyota 9015 is no different. Beating at 28,800 per hour allows for more precision and greater likelihood to keep accurate time. Higher rates on the other hand can effectively maintain greater accuracy but also lead to more time on the work bench

POWER RESERVE

This particular movement can last, on average, 42 hours between complete power ups. After a days work once you remove your watch and place it back in your black leather roll it can sit motionless for roughly 42 hours before being completely out of power. But you’re not going to let this baby sit are ya?

PLEDGES STARTING AT AUD399 ( APPROX. USD 299 )

VARIANT SELECTION :-

S1 : Scuba lovers Diver inspired watches.

S1 Black - Nato strap
 
 
S1 Black - Genuine leather strap
 

S Ti : Bead blasted Raw Titanium now available ( new reward just added )

S2 : Stealth Navy Inspired by Navy Stealth battle Ship.

 
S 2 - Gun metal NATO strap
 
S 2 - Gun metal Genuine leather strap
 
S3 : Sunrise The boardroom version
S 3 Rose Gold - NATO Strap
S 3 Rose Gold - Genuine leather Strap
 
What we've created is a timepiece that can be worn from the beach to the boardroom. We used a less is more approach in developing the dial design with applied indexes easy to read face.
 
 


Case Diameter : 40 mm Case 
Thickness : 11 mm
Weight : 40g ( excluding strap )
Case Material : All Titanium grade 2
Bezel : Unidirectional signature bezel with lume bead.
Crown : Custom trade mark Screwdown Crown with engraved S logo
Crystal : Anti reflective sapphire crystal
Movement : Japanese Miyota 9015 Automatic Movement
Dial : Swiss Superluminous index & hands
Strap Material : 20mm Nylon nato & Italian calf leather
Water Resistant : up to 20 ATM/200M
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

Once our campaign ends, we will immediately place the orders with our manufacturers. Depending on how large the orders are, production will most likely take between sixty to ninety days. We want our backers to receive their watches as quickly as possible without sacrificing their quality. The watches will be individually inspected once they arrived. There will be full disclosure with our backers and they will be updated every step along the way. Thank you so much for being a part of this project!  

We Need Your Help !

In order to keep costs reasonable, we need to order a minimum quantity of watches. By becoming a backer of our project, you will help cover a portion of production costs in exchange for a cool, fun & premium quality timepiece at a highly discounted price!

How the funds will be used

Our Plan & We Need Your Support to build SCURO watches!

We are now ready to make the SCURO model S Titanium watches available to our backers. We have completed the final design and all specifications. We have been testing several prototypes and are fully satisfied with the look, feel and quality of the watch. Our manufacturing partners have confirmed that they are ready to start production as soon as we give them the go-ahead. Once we place the order with our suppliers, they will start the manufacturing and assembly of the different parts of the watch. The completed and assembled watches will then be shipped to us for final inspection and testing. The only thing missing is the initial order fee. I need to order a minimum quantity of watches in order to get the best deal and that's where you come in to make this mission to become a reality and it will not happen without your support. By becoming a backer for this project, you help us fund the first production run and to make this awesome watch to life, not to mention you score an cool & premium quality watch at a huge discount!

Risks and challenges

We realize creating and delivering a product is a complicated process and often comes with unexpected challenges. That is why we have been preparing. We gained tremendous experience through our previous SCURO watch project before with the manufacturer. 
We have spent the past several months making sure our supply chain is in check. We have well-established relationships with reliable watch manufacturers. We have experienced and we are prepared to deal with fulfillment of goods. We also have contingency plans for all the steps that are out of our control. 
We are going to keep our backers informed during the production process. We'll do this with regular updates and sharing pictures as often as possible, for example when manufacturing of the watch cases is completed, during manufacturing of components, during final assembly, when the packaging is produced, etc… 
If somewhere along the way we find that there is a setback in production, or that we cannot make the timeline, we will keep all of our backers informed. 
In the end, we want to make SCURO a long-lasting brand of affordable watches. We will do whatever it takes to fulfill our promises and to deliver watches that will exceed our backers’ expectations!

Thank you! Thank you for your support. Please remember to pledge and make this cool, fun and premium quality watch a reality. It will not happen without your support. 
REWARDS - Starts at AUD $399 ( Approx. USD299 ) for our early bird supporter retail at AUD $649.( Approx. USD486 ) The beautiful timepiece.. 
Please also share this campaign with the Indiegogo share buttons located at the top of the page. 
Do tell your friends about us and our mission for everyone to have this sleek watches that's striking good to wear everyday.

Engraved S logo buckles​

Lovely lumeshot - Nato straps


 
In the Press


https://techcrunch.com/2016/07/28/scuros-titanium-dive-watch-hits-on-all-cylinders/
 
http://www.ablogtowatch.com/scuro-offering-new-upgraded-model-s-titanium-dive-watches/
 
http://www.watchisthis.com/scuro-watches-bringing-titanium-kickstarter/
 
http://www.recensioniorologi.it/scuro-watches/
 
http://www.thetimebum.com/2016/07/preview-scuro-model-s-titanium-diving.html
 
http://www.thecoolector.com/scuro-titanium-dive-watches/
 
http://watchbandit.com/scuro-watches-a-truly-perfect-diver/
 

Scuro watch reviewed by @Recensioniorologi.it​


 
The SCURO watches mission is simple: -
We are the no-compromise, timeless looking, titanium dive watch that is designed to last.
Quality : Built to last and backed by a one-year warranty.
Aesthetics : Timeless design with a modern touch and contemporary
Materials.
Affordability : Premium in quality yet affordable in price.
Versatility : Designed to accompany any outfit, occasion or activity.


S1 Black - Nato strap

S1 Black - Genuine leather strap
 

The Titanium Case  
Titanium is a very popular material choice for high-end watches for three main reasons: -
First off, it is about five times stronger than steel, making the SCURO watch far more durable than even costlier alternatives on the market.
 -Titanium is about half the weight of steel with a density of 4.5g/cc vs. 7.8g/cc for steel. 
 -Finally, titanium is highly corrosion resistant. This means no rusting and has the added benefit of being hypoallergenic.


Custom S logo crown. 11 mm Thin case only weight 40g without strap.
 
Measuring 40mm in diameter with a thickness of 11mm, the model S Titanium watch case is fitted with a scratch resistant anti-reflective Sapphire crystal and a solid Titanium screw caseback. These dimensions make for a very wearable piece that is ideally proportioned and allow for versatility while allowing a water resistance of 200 meters. It’s dive ready with a nicely gripped and simple dive bezel. Thanks to the titanium case, the SCURO model S watch weighs just 40 grams. The SCURO Titanium is features a Miyota 9015 caliber movement. This solid, reliable movement has a 42 hour power reserve, 24 jewels, and a classic three hand display with discreet date display at six o'clock. The spec of the Japanese 9015 is a conscious one that brings with it many benefits. For starters it’s more than a match for its Swiss counterparts on all levels; from accuracy to reliability. Smooth with a decent power reserve it’s an automatic movement that can be hand wound and features a hacking seconds hand for syncing to your chosen time zone. The movement runs at 28,800 vibrations per hour with a power reserve of 42 hours. Granted, there are movements out there with bigger reserves and faster sweeps but they come at a price and tend to spend more time on the work bench. We simply want the model S to spend more time on the wrist. It’s also a nice thin movement, which means we can keep things slim in the case without losing strength.
 


 
IMPORTANT FEATURES OF THE MIYOTA 9015 AUTOMATIC / MANUAL WINDING
The 9015 is powered up by either an oscillating movement of it’s weighted rotor through natural counter clockwise movements. Or manually winding it by the crown. Just pull the crown to position “A” and turn roughly 20 times
HACKING SECOND HAND
Hacking function allows the second hand to completely stop while setting the time. Crown must be pulled to time setting position for the second hand to stop. This is done for precise synchronization between multiple time keeping sources
VIBRATIONS PER HOUR
The standard for modern watches is 28,800 vibrations per hour. Our Miyota 9015 is no different. Beating at 28,800 per hour allows for more precision and greater likelihood to keep accurate time. Higher rates on the other hand can effectively maintain greater accuracy but also lead to more time on the work bench
POWER RESERVE
This particular movement can last, on average, 42 hours between complete power ups. After a days work once you remove your watch and place it back in your black leather roll it can sit motionless for roughly 42 hours before being completely out of power. But you’re not going to let this baby sit are ya?
PLEDGES STARTING AT AUD399 ( APPROX. USD 299 )
VARIANT SELECTION :-
S1 : Scuba lovers Diver inspired watches.


S1 Black - Nato strap
 
 

S1 Black - Genuine leather strap
 

S Ti : Bead blasted Raw Titanium now available ( new reward just added )

S2 : Stealth Navy Inspired by Navy Stealth battle Ship.

 

S 2 - Gun metal NATO strap
 

S 2 - Gun metal Genuine leather strap
 

S3 : Sunrise The boardroom version

S 3 Rose Gold - NATO Strap

S 3 Rose Gold - Genuine leather Strap
 
What we've created is a timepiece that can be worn from the beach to the boardroom. We used a less is more approach in developing the dial design with applied indexes easy to read face.
 

 

Case Diameter : 40 mm Case 

Thickness : 11 mm
Weight : 40g ( excluding strap )

Case Material : All Titanium grade 2

Bezel : Unidirectional signature bezel with lume bead.

Crown : Custom trade mark Screwdown Crown with engraved S logo

Crystal : Anti reflective sapphire crystal

Movement : Japanese Miyota 9015 Automatic Movement

Dial : Swiss Superluminous index & hands
Strap Material : 20mm Nylon nato & Italian calf leather
Water Resistant : up to 20 ATM/200M
 

 

 

 
 

 

 


 


 
 

 


 

Once our campaign ends, we will immediately place the orders with our manufacturers. Depending on how large the orders are, production will most likely take between sixty to ninety days. We want our backers to receive their watches as quickly as possible without sacrificing their quality. The watches will be individually inspected once they arrived. There will be full disclosure with our backers and they will be updated every step along the way. Thank you so much for being a part of this project!  
We Need Your Help !
In order to keep costs reasonable, we need to order a minimum quantity of watches. By becoming a backer of our project, you will help cover a portion of production costs in exchange for a cool, fun & premium quality timepiece at a highly discounted price!
How the funds will be used
Our Plan & We Need Your Support to build SCURO watches!
We are now ready to make the SCURO model S Titanium watches available to our backers. We have completed the final design and all specifications. We have been testing several prototypes and are fully satisfied with the look, feel and quality of the watch. Our manufacturing partners have confirmed that they are ready to start production as soon as we give them the go-ahead. Once we place the order with our suppliers, they will start the manufacturing and assembly of the different parts of the watch. The completed and assembled watches will then be shipped to us for final inspection and testing. The only thing missing is the initial order fee. I need to order a minimum quantity of watches in order to get the best deal and that's where you come in to make this mission to become a reality and it will not happen without your support. By becoming a backer for this project, you help us fund the first production run and to make this awesome watch to life, not to mention you score an cool & premium quality watch at a huge discount!
Risks and challenges
We realize creating and delivering a product is a complicated process and often comes with unexpected challenges. That is why we have been preparing. We gained tremendous experience through our previous SCURO watch project before with the manufacturer. We have spent the past several months making sure our supply chain is in check. We have well-established relationships with reliable watch manufacturers. We have experienced and we are prepared to deal with fulfillment of goods. We also have contingency plans for all the steps that are out of our control. We are going to keep our backers informed during the production process. We'll do this with regular updates and sharing pictures as often as possible, for example when manufacturing of the watch cases is completed, during manufacturing of components, during final assembly, when the packaging is produced, etc… If somewhere along the way we find that there is a setback in production, or that we cannot make the timeline, we will keep all of our backers informed. In the end, we want to make SCURO a long-lasting brand of affordable watches. We will do whatever it takes to fulfill our promises and to deliver watches that will exceed our backers’ expectations!
Thank you! Thank you for your support. Please remember to pledge and make this cool, fun and premium quality watch a reality. It will not happen without your support. REWARDS - Starts at AUD $399 ( Approx. USD299 ) for our early bird supporter retail at AUD $649.( Approx. USD486 ) The beautiful timepiece.. Please also share this campaign with the Indiegogo share buttons located at the top of the page. Do tell your friends about us and our mission for everyone to have this sleek watches that's striking good to wear everyday.

story:
True Artistry in Jewelry Design

With all the mass produced, low end and low quality jewelry out there, it's refreshing when quality and thoughtfully made work comes along.  Here is a little about me and my work: 

  • I am a graduate of the Fashion Institute of Technology in NYC with a BFA in Accessories design with a background in fashion public relations.
  • Within the first year of inception Michal Yakar Jewelry was featured in publications like ELLE and Brides.com.  Consistently featured in local publications.


  • Within the second year of inception, personally selected by the buyer to participate in trunk shows at the prestigious New York City department store, Henri Bendel.  Currently in talks with a potential future opportunity with Neiman Marcus.
  • My work is what I live and breathe.  My pieces are true works of art, all telling their own story, to be further shared through the generosity of your contributions.
  • All pieces are one-of-a-kind using 14K Gold Fill metal and semi precious gemstones.  Pieces are made using a wire wrapping technique that is rarely seen on the market today.
  • My brand acts as a stylist, helping women look their best by offering different style options to create a polished and finished look.


  • Michal Yakar Jewelry showcases pieces that offer versatility and function for an everyday, everywhere and every neckline look.


It's a matter of introducing lovers of the industry to something that is hand made, not factory made, something with quality and design beyond the mold or cast.  Something to inspire future generations to be uniquely creative when pursuing their passions in design. Be a part of the start of an exciting journey to an imminently successful end result!

  • $2,500 will fund the basics to start: $1200 for metals and gemstones, $400 for 2 months of daycare so that I can work, go to networking events, meet with stores, $400 for marketing materials (business cards, packaging and supplies) and $500 for a more professional website design.
  • THE PERKS!!  You might as well own a piece for yourself, right?  All contributors will enjoy discount on a piece of your choice from my website!  See below for specifics! 
  • If I don't reach my goal, I will still use what I have raised toward buying as many materials as I can to make my product.

Although this may not be a conduit to a charity, it's a conduit for exposing current and future generations to true artistry and quality. 

  • My pieces range from $150-$600 for elaborate pieces which makes is a perfect balance between the prices of low end and high end that is financially out of reach for most.
  • Since I've started using gold fill and semi precious stones, I have won awards, gotten a huge amount of press and have had the same loyal customers since it's inception in 2003.  I have yet to find a customer who has purchased less than 4 pieces at a time and still come back for me with every season.
  • Creating and sharing the art that I produce is what is most important. This is one of the many reasons why my customers (many of which have become very good friends through my jewelry) are so loyal and loving to both myself and my work.

It's simple really.  It's a dream with an ambitious end goal...that starts with you.

story:
www.RailtekBelts.com

  Railtek Belts is a revolutionary no-hole concept which gives you a clean, slick look while making it easier to adjust to your waist size...1/4 inch at a time instead of the 1 inch between your old belt's holes. It is a perfect fit each time!

RAILTEK ADVANTAGE

  Railtek Belts is different from your traditional belt in a few intriguing ways. We call this the Railtek Advantage:

#1 No Holes! - Traditional belts with holes can be frustrating. Having the holes one inch apart means your belt is either too tight or too loose most of the time. Railtek Belts has replaced the hole with a Rail System on the back side of the belt which gives you roughly 44 sizing options 1/4 inch apart! Incremental adjustment makes for a PERFECT FIT!

www.RailtekBelts.com

#2 Unique Buckle System - Behind the scene of each buckle is a unique buckle system that interacts with the rail on the belt using a lever and a magnet. The use of a magnet ensures that your buckle will not wear out over time like buckles with springs would.

#3 Customization - Our belts can fit up to a 42 inch waist size but just in case it is a little too large and has that annoying overhang, you can cut your belt to size. This way it is meant just for you. Simply detach the belt from the buckle, cut, and reclamp. (see section below on How to Custom Fit)

HOW TO USE

  Using a Railtek Belt couldn't be easier! Simply insert the belt into the buckle and you will hear it start clicking as the rail on the belt ratchets with the buckle (step 1). Cinch it up to your desired tightness and you are now rockin' the coolest belt on the market.

  To remove or loosen your belt, use your left index finger to locate the lever on the bottom of the buckle and pivot the lever away from your body (step 2). You may need to relieve the tension in the buckle by slightly pushing the belt in with your right hand (as though you are tightening it) before flipping the lever.

  You'll notice that you are able to adjust your belt 1/4 of an inch at a time which makes it convenient and easier to get that perfect fit...no matter how much you had to eat for lunch. Once you try it, you'll wonder why you let anything else hold up your pants!

HOW TO CUSTOM FIT

  Every Railtek Belt can be custom fit to your exact size. This means that you can make your belt fit instead of searching around for one that almost fits. To do this, detach the belt from the buckle by lifting up the belt clamp (step 1). Use a good pair of scissors and cut the desired length off the end of the belt (step 2). The length that is cut is determined by how much overhang there is when the belt is worn at its desired tightness. After cutting, reinsert the belt all the way into the buckle and close the belt clamp (step 3). Now your belt is made just for you!

OUR THREE DESIGNS

  We wanted to create designs that you would want to wear with anything from suits to jeans. Each buckle incorporates a mixture of casual presence and stylish dominance. Below are our three designs.

www.RailtekBelts.com

www.RailtekBelts.com

HOW IT ALL STARTED

  From 2005-2007, I lived overseas in an East European country. I was out and about nearly every day talking to people so dressing up and looking presentable was a must. As time went by I realized that there wasn't much variation in my fashion. Ties, belts, watches, and shoes seemed as if they were the only option to express some sense of style. One day as I was browsing through an outdoor market, I ran across an interesting belt. But was it a belt? There were no holes so how did it keep your pants up? Investigating further, I discovered the most intriguing buckle system that worked with a rail on the back of the belt. I had never seen this before! It only took a few seconds of investigation and moments later I was the proud owner of this new-way to hold up my britches! Over the course of the next week I realized that not only was this new belt very stylish but it may just be the solution to my fluctuating weight! I was no longer restricted to the daunting gap between holes of traditional belts; I could adjust 1/4 of an inch at a time in either direction...Amazing!

  As my time in Eastern Europe came to a close, I purchased a couple of belts to bring back with me. From then until the fall of 2012 I wore those belts almost every day. Many times I thought, "People would love these!" This thought inspired me to develop a business plan to introduce the American people to my favorite belt. What would I call it? Railtek Belts.

THE PLAN

  Upon successful completion of this project, a production order will be submitted to our manufacturer to begin production of the belts. This process will take anywhere from 30-40 days. Once complete, the belts will be shipped to our office in Salt Lake City, Utah, where we will repackage and ship your rewards to you! Turn around time depends on the number of orders that need to be fulfilled but expect your belt to be sent out no later than two weeks after we have received the bulk shipment from our manufacturer.

Because we have chosen the Flex Funding option and have received an early shipment of belts, we have started fulfilling orders. Perks can be received for Christmas if made before a certain date (See Updates tab)...So contribute now!

Thank you for any of your contributions; every bit helps. If you are not able to contribute financially, please tell people about this. Share a post through social media or show your family and friends!

story:
Buying the perfect bikini is something you often try to do in a rush.

 

 

Save money and start enjoying tanning in your new favorite bikini.

You won’t have to deal with tan lines. This takes away a lot of stress during sunbathing. No more untying bikini straps and forgetting that they are untied when you try to get up. We know, every female has been in this situation once.

70 years ago, the bikini debuted in the market... Amazing idea! And now, 70 year later, we, Frambosia, want to reinvent the bikini.  "The Most Unique Strapless Bikini in the World".

You can put and take off your straps and the top does not fall down... due to the new gel technology.

We’ve innovated and discovered the secret to offer you the perfect bikini. Re-enforced with a special adhesive polymer, regenerated for using up to 200 times; this will allow the bikini top to adhere to the skin with a nice feeling, and remove easily and comfortably.

 

 

The results are more than good, they are ideal! The adhesive special silicone gel will self-activate and regenerate after each washing, keeping all the strength as if it was the first use. You don’t need to do anything other than following the easy steps on the care manual and you will always have the best results. Strap lines from the ordinary bikini are now a thing of the past.

 

All you need is a bikini that not only covers your breast, but also gives you that little extra to empower your body. The bikinis come with an adhesive technique and a subtle push-up effect.

This means you can wear your bikini top without straps and you won‘t have to worry about how your breast will look. No sagging of your breast, it will keep your breast in place!

 

The adhesive technique gives you the option to optimize your curves. Your breast will look magnificent even without straps!

Place the bra on a higher position of the breasts, to make your breast look magnificent, or place the two bras at a distance, to enhance the effect of cleavage.

And if you do want to wear the straps, we will give you many options to do so!

 

How to use it! Easy...

  1. /Clean your breasts with soap and water.
  2. /Make sure that the area is dry and don’t use any cream or cosmetic on the zone before putting.
  3. /Remove the protective Plastic from the adhesive gel and suit the bikini over your breasts. Unzip the clasp. For a better push up effect, raise and hold your breasts before putting the cup.
  4. /Button the central clasp to push your breast each other.
  5. /Place the bra on a higher position of the breasts, to make your breast look magnificent, or place the two bras at a distance, to enhance the effect of cleavage.

 

 

 

This adhesive innovation is only a component that is supported by an exquisite design and only the highest quality materials and fabrics from Italy and Spain handcrafted in Europe to provide you with a new concept of the bikini. Now the straps are optional.

Next to this innovation, these premium bikinis are handmade with high quality details. This not your average summer sale bikini. This is an investment for your body!

The last thing we want is a stock full of bikini's we don't wear. We created a high quality bikini that defeats all problems.

The clothes are  designed and handmade elaborated based on the  traditional  artisan, with the highest quality, plenty of  exclusive and unique detail, in every accessory, crystal and element…with perfect finish that will power the inner elegance.

Frambosia uses the highest quality, creating a particular and own identity and style in every cloth and each bikini.

To produce a product of the highest quality and standards is very important. This is only made possible by designing every piece with the attention to detail in mind.

When you see Frambosia products the expectations of high quality, detailed finishing and luxurious feel will all be met as you touch and try-on these products for the first time, and every time thereafter. The design, the style and the finish are key words for creating a difference  in the market.

Do you want to be a part of the Frambosia lifestyle? We will keep you up to date about special offers & products!

 

Mix up your swimsear with different color pairings to match your mood. With over 700 combinations, pair to your hearts desire for that ultimate beachside pairing.

SIZE GUIDE

Our sizing advice is a guideline only. Please consider this when choosing your size.

 

/ How to measure for top

Frambosia tops are adhesive and very easy to measure. You don’t need to measure the full contorn of your chest. You just need to measure, as you can see the picture, the lenght of the curve of your cups.

Measure your size in both curve lines, vertical and horizontal.

/ How to measure for bottom

Hip Measurement: Stand on a level surface with feet together. Measure around fullets part covered on hips and bottom (few cm below waitsline), keeping tape parallel with floor. You just need to measure the part of your body you want to be covered by the bottom, as showed in the photo.

 

 

Frambosia is a new luxury fashion brand created to change your mind and bring to you a new concept of swimwear. Thanks to our new revolutionary concept you can create your own bikini depending on your mood and unique style in every situation. By customizing your own swimwear with our unique technology that is personalized right down to your own requirements. You can create your own style.

We have introduced an adhesive technique that changes forever the concept of the bikini, to get ideal tans and enforce the women body shape with elegance.Frambosia specializes in innovative designs and products where tendencies towards fashion and exquisite quality combines with new technologies. Handmade traditions all handcrafted with meticulous detail.

“Since I was a child, my idea has always been to find out solutions to necessities. I realized that when women are at the beach or swimming pool or enjoying their free time, have really troubles to get a great tan due to the bikini lines. They had just 2 options, topless or keeping the bikini with the straps and changing it every day to avoid the tan lines, but this is not effective. So I came up with the idea of apply this technology on the bikinis. Now women can enjoy their time on the beach, beach club, swimming pool, or wherever and get the ideal tan, even they can carefully enjoy the water.”

/ WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

 

We've been working on Frambosia Ideal bikini for over a year. From zero, Roberto and his team have completely funded the project themselves, creating a never before seen product. It's been a long way and they've given up everything to bring their dream to the world. Summertime is everywhere anytime.

Your support will allow us to offer you the definitive Bikini and prove that total strapless bikinis and ideal tans are a reality. As a special offer for supporters of our launch campaign, you will get a minimum 40% off of the future retail price.

This is a strictly limited offer as a reward for those who support our vision and product. All campaign supporters will also become VIPs and are entitled to exclusive early bird offers and discounts on future collections.

So why should you support us?

  • You'll be the first to get the Frambosia strapless bikini.
  • You want to save time and money, and look totally different.
  • Exclusive and radiant.
  • You will have a master piece, a luxury handmade product.
  • You can say hello to the ideal tan. You want to contribute to a greener future.
  • You will get a 10% discount in our next lingerie collection if we raise enough funds to develop it.

 

/ STRECH GOALS

 

$60,000 USD

With $60,000 USD we can hit the minimum order quantity to go into production and save all the charges of the campaign. The more we sell, the more affordable we can make the bikini in the future collection, which is our ultimate goal.

$65,000 USD

We really appreciate your kind support! due to this fact:

“When we hit $65,000 every backer will receive a free special and unique glue that we have just developed to reinforce, even longer, the adherence of your Frambosia strapless bikini” 

(but only if we hit $65 k :))

$150,000 USD

We will create a spectacular Frambosia Lingerie line for the 2017 fall/winter. And you will get 10% discount in your first purchase.

$200,000 USD

We will set up a bigger office and will bet on a bigger creative structure to develop and offer you again our dreams. We bet on  global talent and creativity.

+ $500,000 USD

We will dream, dream and dream and build your dreams.

 

Do you offer refunds?

We do not.

 

Are your clothes true to size?

We always try to specify if something runs a little small or large. On each product we list the size of the model and what she is wearing along with a recommendation e.g. go up one size. We also have loads of Sizing Information, check the sizing table.

 

ABOUT SHIPPING

 

I did not receive an order or shipping confirmation. What should I go?

It’s possible the email has gone to your junk folder or maybe we have an incorrect email address for you. Please contact us straight away at  info@frambosia.com  with your Full Name you placed the order under.

 

How much does delivery cost?

Postage expenses are calculated according to the country of destination. The exact transport cost is detailed on the page that summarizes the purchase before the order is confirmed.

Low shipping cost.

Delivery in EU (European Union): VAT is included.

Delivery in the Rest of the world: Local VAT or Local taxes are not included.

 

ABOUT CLOTHES

 

How does your bikini works and why it does not fall down?

The internal part of the bikini bra that contacts directly with the body is covered with a special silicone gel, transparent, developed and tested for the perfect use on the human skin. For you to feel even more confortable, we have developed a special and unique skin glue to reinforce the adhesiveness.

This gel always keeps its adhesive capacity. Once you use it, you should proceed to its right wash and dry for the perfect use next times. Up to 200 uses. No need to warm it to make it adhesive. It works in every climatic situation.

1. /Eco-friendly

2. /Self-adhesive

3. /High quality gel-glue

 

Is it hypoallergenic?

The gel is totally hypoallergenic; it was specially developed for the contact of every Kind of skin. No problems with your body.

 

Can I wear it only without braces?

No- but if u prefer this way u can add the braces, no problem. If you are taking a sunbath and you want to go to a restaurant, store, etc, it is that easy as link the braces… and ready!

 

Water proof?

Of course! But don’t stay too long. Just be careful with the waves!

 

Is it difficult to put it on?

It is really easy. Just follow the easy instruction, put the cups naturally over your breast and once they are in the right position, just button the central clasp. Every woman can wear this bikini. Follow the instructions below if you need more help.

  1. /Clean your breasts with soap and water.
  2. /Make sure that the area is dry and don’t use any cream or cosmetic on the zone before putting.
  3. /Remove the protective Plastic from the adhesive gel and suit the bikini over your breasts. Unzip the clasp. For a better push up effect, raise and hold your breasts before putting the cup.
  4. /Button the central clasp to push your breast each other.
  5. /Place the bra on a higher position of the breasts, to make your breast look magnificent, or place the two bras at a distance, to enhance the effect of cleavage.

 

Is it difficult to take off?

Absolutely not. It is almost the same to take of abnormal bra. Start on the sides or from the top to the bottom and it will easily remove. This adhesive gel has been certificated and tested. Totally skin friendly. Remind after using to top up the protective Plastic for a perfect use the next times.

 

Does it hurt?

Of course not! It will adjust to your curves. Taking off is so easy, just remove from your breast. You will feel a nice feeling.

 

Will I get sticky feeling after using?​

No. You won’t feel any strange texture or touch on your body, because the gel will stay in your bikini.

 

Does it fit for every breast size?

Yes, we make each size; the sizes A and B  come with push-up, C and D sizes do not need push-up.

 

How many times can I use the Frambosia bikini?

Always you follow the conservation advices and you use it with responsibility, till 200 times. If Over that time, or during any other moment you want to continue using it you can always use it as a normal bikini putting the colorful laces that are included with the bikini.

 

How to clean it?

Simple. Hand wash, cold water y and dried on air, no drier machine.

  1. /Always clean the gel after using.
  2. /Softly, use soap and cold water but don’t leave it in the soapy water.
  3. /Air Dry.
  4. /Once dried, the auto adhesive gel regenerates, keeping perfect the bikini for the next use.

 

Is it possible to replace the gel?

No, but up to 200 uses are a lot… and in case it stops working you can always use the laces as an ordinary bikini way.

We will launch to the market very soon our own created, skin glue to even reinforce our gel if you need it.

 

ABOUT FRAMBOSIA

 

Where are you located?

We are located in the beautiful Prague, “The pearl of Europe”.

 

Can I be a model for Frambosia?

We’re always looking out for fresh new faces. Send your details plus 1 headshot and 1 full body shot to  info@frambosia.com.  And we might purpose you something nice.

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND TRUST IN FRAMBOSIA!
story_txt:
Buying the perfect bikini is something you often try to do in a rush. 

 
Save money and start enjoying tanning in your new favorite bikini.You won’t have to deal with tan lines. This takes away a lot of stress during sunbathing. No more untying bikini straps and forgetting that they are untied when you try to get up. We know, every female has been in this situation once.70 years ago, the bikini debuted in the market... Amazing idea! And now, 70 year later, we, Frambosia, want to reinvent the bikini.  "The Most Unique Strapless Bikini in the World".You can put and take off your straps and the top does not fall down... due to the new gel technology.We’ve innovated and discovered the secret to offer you the perfect bikini. Re-enforced with a special adhesive polymer, regenerated for using up to 200 times; this will allow the bikini top to adhere to the skin with a nice feeling, and remove easily and comfortably.  The results are more than good, they are ideal! The adhesive special silicone gel will self-activate and regenerate after each washing, keeping all the strength as if it was the first use. You don’t need to do anything other than following the easy steps on the care manual and you will always have the best results. Strap lines from the ordinary bikini are now a thing of the past. All you need is a bikini that not only covers your breast, but also gives you that little extra to empower your body. The bikinis come with an adhesive technique and a subtle push-up effect.This means you can wear your bikini top without straps and you won‘t have to worry about how your breast will look. No sagging of your breast, it will keep your breast in place! The adhesive technique gives you the option to optimize your curves. Your breast will look magnificent even without straps!Place the bra on a higher position of the breasts, to make your breast look magnificent, or place the two bras at a distance, to enhance the effect of cleavage.And if you do want to wear the straps, we will give you many options to do so! How to use it! /Clean your breasts with soap and water.

Now the straps are optional.Next to this innovation, these premium bikinis are handmade with high quality details. This not your average summer sale bikini. This is an investment for your body!The last thing we want is a stock full of bikini's we don't wear. We created a high quality bikini that defeats all problems.The clothes are  designed and handmade elaborated based on the  traditional  artisan, with the highest quality, plenty of  exclusive and unique detail, in every accessory, crystal and element…with perfect finish that will power the inner elegance.Frambosia uses the highest quality, creating a particular and own identity and style in every cloth and each bikini.To produce a product of the highest quality and standards is very important. This is only made possible by designing every piece with the attention to detail in mind.When you see Frambosia products the expectations of high quality, detailed finishing and luxurious feel will all be met as you touch and try-on these products for the first time, and every time thereafter. The design, the style and the finish are key words for creating a difference  in the market.Do you want to be a part of the Frambosia lifestyle? We will keep you up to date about special offers & products! Mix up your swimsear with different color pairings to match your mood. With over 700 combinations, pair to your hearts desire for that ultimate beachside pairing.SIZE GUIDEOur sizing advice is a guideline only. Please consider this when choosing your size. / How to measure for topFrambosia tops are adhesive and very easy to measure. You don’t need to measure the full contorn of your chest. You just need to measure, as you can see the picture, the lenght of the curve of your cups.Measure your size in both curve lines, vertical and horizontal./ How to measure for bottomHip Measurement: Stand on a level surface with feet together. Measure around fullets part covered on hips and bottom (few cm below waitsline), keeping tape parallel with floor. You just need to measure the part of your body you want to be covered by the bottom, as showed in the photo.  Frambosia is a new luxury fashion brand created to change your mind and bring to you a new concept of swimwear. Thanks to our new revolutionary concept you can create your own bikini depending on your mood and unique style in every situation. By customizing your own swimwear with our unique technology that is personalized right down to your own requirements. You can create your own style.We have introduced an adhesive technique that changes forever the concept of the bikini, to get ideal tans and enforce the women body shape with elegance.Frambosia specializes in innovative designs and products where tendencies towards fashion and exquisite quality combines with new technologies. Handmade traditions all handcrafted with meticulous detail.“Since I was a child, my idea has always been to find out solutions to necessities. I realized that when women are at the beach or swimming pool or enjoying their free time, have really troubles to get a great tan due to the bikini lines. They had just 2 options, topless or keeping the bikini with the straps and changing it every day to avoid the tan lines, but this is not effective. So I came up with the idea of apply this technology on the bikinis. Now women can enjoy their time on the beach, beach club, swimming pool, or wherever and get the ideal tan, even they can carefully enjoy the water.”/ WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT We've been working on Frambosia Ideal bikini for over a year. story:
We are Sunglasses For Sport Ltd (www.sunglassesforsport.com), established in 2007 and now one of the UK’s leading online retailers for sports sunglasses and sports eyewear with a sizeable customer base. 

We are looking for £12 each from 500 individual contributors with an objective of raising £6000 to help fund the manufacture of a new range of sports safety eyewear. In return each £12 contributor gets 2 of the new model in 2 different lens colours worth £30.

One of the 18 brands of eyewear we sell is our own-label range called Evolution which is made especially for us by different factories in the Far East. Evolution has been a great success story and we sell around 15000 units a year to both consumers and trade customers. 

Over the last 2-3 years we have had numerous trade enquiries for safety eyewear including one request to tender for 20,000 units. We take the view that if we add safety eyewear models to our Evolution range they must look good - with some style - and bear no resemblance to the type of functional, industrial looking safety eyewear you might find in builders merchants.

Working with the largest safety eyewear manufacturer in Taiwan we have identified the ideal model which we'll call Evolution Hunter. To be successful safety eyewear must comply with the European standard EN166 and European Directive 89/686/EEC. We have already submitted the model for testing (to meet these standards) to INSPEC, the internationally recognised UKAS accredited test house.

Evolution Hunter will have 4 colour variants of the eyewear: clear, yellow, grey and grey with a blue mirror finish.

Technically, the new Evolution Hunter range will be  high specification, featuring Class 1 lenses, anti-fog coatings (to both sides of the lenses), full impact protection (meeting EN166), polycarbonate shatterproof lenses and UV400 rated lenses providing the maximum protection from harmful UVR. Importantly, it will also look good - we believe a winning combination of style and performance. It will retail at £15 each which is competitive for high quality sports style safety eyewear.

There are numerous different markets for safety eyewear. Trade customers will include:
•    Building and construction companies
•    Rail maintenance companies
•    Medical companies and laboratories
•    Hardware distributors supplying factories etc  
•    Civil engineering companies
•    Shooting schools and shooting grounds

We will also sell direct to consumers via our website; customers will include cyclists, shooting enthusiasts, archery enthusiasts and airsoft BB enthusiasts. Airsoft BB is a rapidly growing sport that has taken over from paintballing.

The minimum factory order is 1500 per colour so for the four colours we need to place an initial order for 6000 units which is why we are seeking help with the funding. The order will be placed with the factory in mid-December of this year and it will take 45 days for manufacture.

We are looking for £12 each from 500 contributors to raise £6000 in funding. What each individual contributor gets is 2 different lens colours. This is one of the grey colour models (plain grey or the grey with mirror finish), plus a clear or yellow colour (their choice). So they will get £30 worth of eyewear for £12 and we will include a protective soft carry pouch for each one. We will be able to deliver the two colours to each contributor around mid-February 2017 and certainly no later than the end of February.

This eyewear can be used around the home & garden to protect eyes (DIY, gardening etc) and for many different sports. Even though it's categorised as safety eyewear  the grey lens model (with or without mirror) is no different to any other stylish looking sports style sunglass, providing maximum protection from harmful UVR.

story:
About


Boondocks is a Canadian company aiming to provide the most functional, durable leather on the planet, without compromising the health of it.

After the realization that some of the most popular leather companies are putting profits ahead of quality, and that designs could be significantly improved, Boondocks was started.

By helping Boondocks, you'll be helping the planet. A huge percentage of leather made today is made with harmful chemicals. Sure, it is cheaper. But the cost is not merely financial. The planet pays part of the price. By purchasing leather tanned with natural plant compounds, you'll be respecting the environment rather than destroying it.


Perks and Use of Funds


Whether you need a bag for travel, camping, business, hiking, school, or protection of electronics, you'll find something that you can use.
Each Boondocks item is protected by a 150 year warranty. If your Boondocks item breaks down enough to require a repair, send it back. You pay the shipping, the repair work is free of charge. If the item can't be fixed, it gets replaced!
Boondocks items can be either black like the Raider bag, dark brown like the Nomad backpack, or a red and brown mixture like the drawstring on the Boonie backpack.
Note also that when you see that interior pockets are a feature, they are the same quality of leather as the exterior leather, NOT a cheap lining! The leather used is very thick and is smooth on both sides, not hairy, and does not need a lining.

$275 Perk

Small Messenger Bag

Normally priced at $345

Send the right message.


A simple, clean-looking shoulder bag

Strap is adjustable from both sides for a specified fit and comfort

Exterior pocket fits tablets, magazines, and papers

Interior pocket is half the height of the back pocket for organized item storage



Height 12.5 inches

Width 11.5 inches

Depth 3.5 inches


You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.

$345 Perk
Large Messenger Bag
Normally priced at $425


Looks basically identical to the bag shown above. Measurements are about 30 percent larger. This means that both the exterior and interior pockets will fit laptops.

You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.


$545 Perk

Large Boonie Backpack

Normally priced at $675

A bucket for the boonies.


Drawstring style, with a protective flap and simple design

Large, 8-inch interior pocket for tablets and books

Small interior pocket for phones, and wallets

Surprising storage capacity

Flap is shaped like a leaf to wick rain

Anti-theft technology strap prevents would-be thieves from stealing


Height 13 inches

Width 14.5 inches

Depth 40 inches across mouth


You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.


$395 Perk

Small Boonie Backpack

Normally priced at $495


Looks basically identical to the bag shown above. Measurements are about 30 percent smaller.

You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.


$745 Perk

Large Raider Bag

Normally priced at $845

Protection of the herd.


Protect your laptop or other items from damage by surrounding it with multiple layers of thick leather

Easily functions as a briefcase, backpack, or satchel with adjustable and removable straps

Interior pocket is 14.5 inches wide and offers an extremely safe environment from impacts, is strategically located for optimal safety, and fits large laptops

Leather has excellent insulating properties, so your electronics are shielded from harsh temperatures

Can be worn over the shoulder as a satchel with the included shoulder strap

Two front pockets have spaces behind them for small items

Convertible from satchel to backpack

There is a tube-shaped pocket between the front pockets that is suitable for items like flashlights and pens

Wide exterior back pocket spans the bag's body width

Front flap can be tucked or untucked for different looks

Rings on each corner of the base for tying on and hanging items like tripods, bedrolls, and extra clothing

Key clip

Food canister and snake not included, of course.


Height 12.5 inches

Width 19 from side pocket to side pocket

Depth 7 inches to front pocket


You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.

Small Raider Bag

Normally priced at $695


Looks basically identical to the bag shown above. Measurements are about 30 percent smaller.

You can choose your bag color after you order. An email will be sent asking you for specifications.


$975 Perk

Large Nomad Backpack

Normally priced at $1175

It is almost like having your own personal water buffalo to carry things for you.


Extreme storage capacity, adjustable and removable belts, straps and strap pads, and tons of places to hang, tie, and hide things

Drawstring mouth

Pockets attached in a way that makes storage behind and even between them possible

Two front straps make another space for items like clothing to be carried

Highly-adjustable pads and straps for comfort and customization

Rings on each corner of the base for tying on and hanging items like tripods, bedrolls, and extra clothing

Key clip


Height 17 inches

Normally priced at $95

Water buffalo strength, without the bulk.


Designed to fit a wide range of sizes

12 holes spaced 0.75 inches apart for a customized fit

Thickness guarantees durability without making your waist look way bigger

3 rivets for extreme strength

$5, $15, and $30
Contributor Edition Piece

For those feeling generous.


If you'd like to help Boondocks

When you do buy a Boondocks product in the future, a small leather piece to hang with your keys will be sent to you

It will have the Boondocks logo stamped on it, along with an exclusive Contributor Edition stamp, which will feature the graphic of the hand holding needles on the "SAY NO TO MACHINE STITCHING" picture on the Versus page.


What will funds be used for?

Quality leather is not cheap. And vegetable-tanning is a very long process. Hides are not produced at a rapid rate, so colors aren't always easy to find. Maybe that's why they are called hides.

With the funds from this campaign, Boondocks will be able to purchase a large amount of hides of different colors. That means that products will be able to be developed and shipped more quickly.

Properly-made tools can also be very expensive. Low quality stuff can break easily. That slows production down. So some funds will also be spent on high-quality equipment.

Custom stamps will also be purchased to place the Boondocks logo on products. Don't worry, though. It won't be flashy or distracting.


 A Global Impact

There needs to be a change in modern business practices. Outsourcing, cheap materials, and a lack of quality are plagues that are much too common.
Not only do they damage the economy, but they make life harder in general. It truly isn't fun to have to replace an important item that you spent a lot of money on and that has meaning to you. And you don't want to get caught out in the boonies with a bag that falls apart under demanding conditions.
If you want the best leather you can buy, you need to take multiple factors into consideration. Leather items are actually quite complicated, and there is a huge variety of types of hides, threads, and hardware. Avoiding easily-breakable parts like zippers, cheap fabric linings, and hollow rivets is very important. For a comparison and explanation of the quality of Boondocks leather to that of the competition, look at http://www.boondocksleathercanada.com/details/


Questions, Answers


Leather, Stitching Style

What is full grain leather? What is vegetable tanning? What type of leather does Boondocks use?

Boondocks uses thick, full grain, vegetable-tanned water buffalo hides.

Full grain leather is the best quality leather you can buy. It is from the top of the hide, where the fibers are intertwined and tangled, resulting in extremely high strength.

Top grain leather from just below that. People use it to avoid the outer layer of the skin, which could have scars on it. It isn't too bad.

Genuine leather is from even lower on the hide. When you see the word "genuine", you may be inclined to think that it simply means that you're looking at real leather. And sure, it may be. But coming from an even lower layer of the hide, its fibers are much less intertwined and closer to being flat. That means it isn't as strong as full grain or top grain. So you probably want to avoid it if you are looking for good quality leather.

Then there is bonded leather. Watch out for it. Particles of leather are glued and mashed together. It may even be stamped in an effort to make it look like full grain. Sort of like a fast food hamburger bun. You know, the white bread that is stripped of basically all of its nutritional value with some seeds thrown on top to give it the appearance of a healthy, whole grain bread. 

Vegetable tanning is the process of tanning hide by infusing plant extract. Organic compounds are taken from bark, branches, leaves, and sometimes fruits. An age-old way. It is better for the environment and human health than toxic alternatives.

Why water buffalo? Why not cow?

Water buffalo skin is used to protect against crocodiles, lions, and tigers. There is actually a video online showing a water buffalo calf walking away after an attack by multiple lions and a crocodile. That is a great example of the protective quality of water buffalo skin.

Besides that, cow leather is nice, but so common! Who doesn't own something made of cow? Water buffalo is exotic (for a lot of people). When you combine a rarer animal with a rare, less-practiced sewing style, you get a rare, exotic product that very few people own.

Is the leather waterproof?

It actually seems to enjoy the water. It might have something to do with the fact that water buffalo are practically amphibious.

They don't live in the ocean, though. So salt water is a different story.

Why do you hand-stitch? Wouldn't it be faster to use a machine?

Hand stitching is superior in strength compared to the typical machine stitch.

The handmade way is reclaiming the popularity it once had. It is not only the way of the past, but it is the way of the future.

Why do you use hemp for the stitching?

See Versus for an explanation.

The Company

What does "Boondocks" mean?

See The Name for an explanation.

Where is Boondocks located? Is there a store that sells Boondocks products?

Boondocks is a Canadian company based in Ontario.

No, Boondocks products are sold mostly on the online store.

If you are considering buying a bag or other large item and want to see for yourself what the quality of Boondocks leather is like, purchase a small item like a belt or a wallet, then decide about the bigger item.

Do you plan on offering any more products than what are on the site?

Yes, of course. Boondocks has plans for tons of different products. Follow Boondocks for updates!

Pricing

Why should I spend this much?

Cheap items rarely last long, function as well, or look as good as more expensive ones.

Some people may think that they are getting a "good deal" when they buy something that is extraordinarily inexpensive. Strangely, though, they don't give much consideration to the chance that the item they are buying could need multiple replacements over the next few years, costing them more money than they would have spent if they had purchased the higher quality alternative in the first place.

Considering those points, the fact that all of the materials used to make each Boondocks product are very expensive, and that a great amount of effort is necessary to craft each item, the answer is obvious.

So invest in your future. Buy nice or buy thrice!

Does Boondocks ever put on any sales?

Not other than the campaign, no. So there isn't any point in waiting to get a better price!

Orders


When will my order be made and shipped?

Since all Boondocks products are handmade, production times are longer than most companies. They also partly depend on the amount of orders that have been sent, and the complexity of the items that need to be made. Of course, a bag takes significantly longer to make than a belt or wallet.

Items will usually ship within 1-2 days of being made.

Can I send an item back or exchange items?

Understandably, leather is a very personal thing. It has a particular feel, smell, and style. Perhaps you intended to give someone some Boondocks leather as a gift, but you weren't aware that someone else had the same idea. Or maybe you discovered that an item of a different size would be more suitable.

You can return or exchange an item within 30 days of purchase if it is in the same condition as when you received it.

To set up an item return or exchange, contact Boondocks.


It is Easy to Help!

Spreading the word is now the main challenge for Boondocks, since suppliers have been found and product designs made.

Understandably, some people can't contribute financially.

There are other ways to help, though!

Post about Boondocks online. Tell people you know. Remember to check the campaign page frequently for updates.


Note that the products shown are prototypes, so expect some very slight modifications. The modifications are improvements! Hardware will be solid brass, some flaps will be widened for extra protection from rain, and some straps may be slightly lengthened, which makes it easier to use them when you have to carry a lot of items!

About





 Boondocks is a Canadian company aiming to provide the most functional, durable leather on the planet, without compromising the health of it.
After the realization that some of the most popular leather companies are putting profits ahead of quality, and that designs could be significantly improved, Boondocks was started.
By helping Boondocks, you'll be helping the planet. A huge percentage of leather made today is made with harmful chemicals. Sure, it is cheaper. But the cost is not merely financial. The planet pays part of the price. By purchasing leather tanned with natural plant compounds, you'll be respecting the environment rather than destroying it.   
Perks and Use of Funds

Whether you need a bag for travel, camping, business, hiking, school, or protection of electronics, you'll find something that you can use.
Each Boondocks item is protected by a 150 year warranty. If your Boondocks item breaks down enough to require a repair, send it back. You pay the shipping, the repair work is free of charge. If the item can't be fixed, it gets replaced!
Boondocks items can be either black like the Raider bag, dark brown like the Nomad backpack, or a red and brown mixture like the drawstring on the Boonie backpack.


Note also that when you see that interior pockets are a feature, they are the same quality of leather as the exterior leather, NOT a cheap lining! The leather used is very thick and is smooth on both sides, not hairy, and does not need a lining.
