story:
Apple's announcement of wireless charging in its phones and accessories makes the GoQi  wireless charging wallet all the more easier for everyone to use now.

Introducing the latest GOQi wireless charging long wallet - slim, sleek and sexy.

Look at the day ahead with excitement and anticipation, shining through your personality and style.  Goqi takes care of the minor details for you, so that you can focus on the bigger picture.

The normalisation of smart-tech into our everyday lives has so far missed out a key ingredient: the ease of charging all your different tools on the go.  By integrating all your different chargers into one beautiful wallet, cables become a thing of the past for you.

 

Optional wired charging for all your regular gadgets that do not have advanced wireless charging capabilities yet.

 

 
 
Tech companies often forlorn product design in order to emphasize functionality.  At Goqi, we believe neither can exist without the other, so we have always worked hard to make our products both highly functional and expectionally beautiful.
 

-----------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------

1) GO/Active - for the adventurer in you

Using a selection of balistic nylon material with leather trim.                  

-----------------------------------------------

2) GO/Style - for the fashionista in you

Using a selection of fashion forward colours, textures and material finishes.

-----------------------------------------------

3) GO/Classic - for the traditionalist in you

Made with the finest of genuine leathers available from exotic leathers to Italian vegetable tanned calf leathers.

-----------------------------------------------

Charging cases, pads, receivers and portable wireless power banks

Charging cases and receivers for older non-wireless compatible phones.  Pads of all types with Qi wireless charging capabilities.

_____________________________________________________________________

THE ORIGINAL GOQI TRAVEL WALLET : DESIGNED FOR BUSINESS OR LEISURE

This stylish double zipper wallet keeps your travel documents, boarding pass, cards, pen coins, jewelry and money in one place and keeps your devices fully charged while you travel.

We are travelers too and understand that being organised is the key to a smooth and stress free trip.

 

 

THREE WIRELESS "PHONE" CHARGING OPTIONS

1. Flat back       2. Back slip     3. Inside compartment

 

______________________________________

WIRELESSLY RECHARGING THE WALLET

The GOQI Continental wallet was designed so that it not only charges your phones wireless, but itself is also charged wirelessly when placed on a wireless charging station.

A complete wireless charging solution. 

POWERING UP AND DOWN THE GOQI WALLET WITH A SIMPLE PRESS.

 

______________________________________

SNUG AND SECURE WITH TIME, DATES AND NOTIFICATIONS VISIBLE

 

______________________________________

EASY CHARGING OF WEARABLE TECH GADGETS

There are many charging methods for each tech gadget out there, so we  offer a micro USB cable with the GOQI Continental wallet.  You can charge your watches, trackers, headsets, rings and glasses with the appropriate adaptor.

_______________________________________

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS & ATTENTION TO DETAIL

As leather product specialists for over 30 years, we have selected the finest leathers which will pass the test of time.  Metal components and workmanship are also inspected to ensure its finishing will last.  Workmanship is carried out by the best craftsmen in the leather business who make for many famous international brands.

_______________________________________

DESIGNED AND MADE WITH DEDICATION AND PASSION

       

A PASSION FOR CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT AND A VISION OF A GRAND FUTURE FOR WIRELESS WEARABLES.

______________________________________

We are launching the GOQI wallets after many years of designing, making and selling leather bags and accessories.  With a strong belief that there are too many wires in our life and a vision to start eliminating some of them, we hope you can support us and other wireless charging companies so that we can keep reiterating towards the perfect wireless charging accessory.

We have also designed a method to incorporate GOQI tech into your favourite branded accessories so that your business satchels and handbags will be able to charge all your accessories wirelessly.  We are currently in talks with brands at the moment.

By supporting our first step, you will help validate that the time for wireless charging has come.  

MATTHEW CHOW, founder

______________________________________

DELIVERY TIME FRAME ** delivery completed 100%

December 2016 for first 100 purchased.

_____________________________________  

Q&A directly with Indiegogo.  Thanks

We are very grateful for your support in making this happen.

Frequently asked questions : from backers

- Is the wallet safe?  GOQI wallets have heat sensor units attached to both the batteries and to the transmitter, and will automatically reduce the power output of the system in the event of overheating past 55 degrees.  The Qi wireless standard emits very minimal electromagnetic waves which are safe for humans.  

- Will it work with my phone?  GOQI wallets are currently based on Qi wireless technology which is a wireless induction charging method.  There are many cell phones on the market which support this wireless technology, including the new iphone8,8+,X and also most Samsung phones.   Other phones only require a thin charging coil to be placed behind the battery. These can be easily purchased over the web, however we have offered you 2 types of receivers to purchase, which are compatible with most iphones and android phones.   These can be purchased at www.goqiwireless.com

- How long will the battery last?  Because every type of phone has a different battery capacity, we can only estimate that a 4000mAH battery can charge a standard iphone 6+  1x wirelessly and 2x with wire.  We suggest that you do not run your phone dry before recharging your phone on the wallet and for faster charge to use the wired option.  We have found that portable power banks have a 30% battery wastage and wireless charging has a further 30% loss in efficiency, so if you are looking for a fast charge we recommend you use the cable option we have.

- Will my credit cards be affected?  Most modern credit cards use chips now rather than magnetic strips so the magnetic field from the coils will not affect them.  Old style magnetic strip cards may be affected by magnetic induction charging, however we have installed protection plates between the transmitter and receivers coils which will help minimise any issues you may have.  With our Continental style the card section is also separated from the main transmitter, therefore minimising this issue.  Our own personal testing has not raised any issues to date.

- Does it come it other styles or colours?  Based on demand we have increased our offering with vegan leather, sports canvas and high quality leathers.

- How heavy and large is it?    The Long wallet is 300g and 19cm x 10cm x 2.5cm.  Travel wallet is 587g and size is  22.5cm long x 12.5cm wide x 4cm deep.  

- Can I repair it myself?  As we are professional manufacturers of these wallets, we strongly suggest that you do not attempt to self repair a GOQI wallet.  We have redesigned the new wallet to enable simpler repairs if necessary by professionals.

- I’m having trouble making a payment through Paypal.  Who should I reach out to?  We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to us and also the Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com.

- Can I get a refund?  According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here.

After the campaign, please reach out to our team at info@goqiwireless.com !

IF YOU HAVE ANY OTHER QUESTIONS WE WOULD LOVE TO KNOW.  THANKS.
_______________________________________
UPDATE 14 July 2016 : Startup launch pad fair

________________________________________________________

May 2016

MEDI TECH : The GOQI wallet is getting a strong following with medical professionals to help them keep all there medical tech devices charged up when they do their patient visits.

_________________________________________________________
July 2016
GoQi long wallet charging my new HuaHui bluetooth tracker heat set.

_________________________________________________________

GoQi keeping my Wifi egg fully charged during my travels

_________________________________________________________

GoQi at breakfast in Melbourne Australia

_________________________________________________________

Gift box packaging for all travel wallets

\

 

_________________________________________________________

Packed & Shipped 1 month early.  We under budgeted for freight by USD15/pc, but happy to take this as a learning experience.  Surprising the costs to Brazil, South Africa and even rural Japan.

_________________________________________________________

GOQi at Australia, Melbourne Innovation pitch fest 2016. Top 20 pitch.

_________________________________________________________

August 2016 - unboxing experiences with some happy backers. Thanks Jon.

_________________________________________________________
GOQi travel wallet - Unboxing instructions - Aug 2016

_________________________________________________________

The GoQi long wallet at lunch

_________________________________________________________
Goqi USA patent approval - Sept 2017
 
_________________________________________________________
CES, Las Vegas, USA - Jan 2017

Introducing the latest GOQi wireless charging long wallet - slim, sleek and sexy.
Look at the day ahead with excitement and anticipation, shining through your personality and style.  Goqi takes care of the minor details for you, so that you can focus on the bigger picture.

The normalisation of smart-tech into our everyday lives has so far missed out a key ingredient: the ease of charging all your different tools on the go.  By integrating all your different chargers into one beautiful wallet, cables become a thing of the past for you.
 
 
Optional wired charging for all your regular gadgets that do not have advanced wireless charging capabilities yet.

 
 
 

 
Tech companies often forlorn product design in order to emphasize functionality.  At Goqi, we believe neither can exist without the other, so we have always worked hard to make our products both highly functional and expectionally beautiful.
 

-----------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------
1) GO/Active - for the adventurer in you
Using a selection of balistic nylon material with leather trim.                  


-----------------------------------------------
2) GO/Style - for the fashionista in you
Using a selection of fashion forward colours, textures and material finishes.


-----------------------------------------------
3) GO/Classic - for the traditionalist in you
Made with the finest of genuine leathers available from exotic leathers to Italian vegetable tanned calf leathers.

-----------------------------------------------
Charging cases, pads, receivers and portable wireless power banks
Charging cases and receivers for older non-wireless compatible phones.  Pads of all types with Qi wireless charging capabilities.




_____________________________________________________________________

THE ORIGINAL GOQI TRAVEL WALLET : DESIGNED FOR BUSINESS OR LEISURE
This stylish double zipper wallet keeps your travel documents, boarding pass, cards, pen coins, jewelry and money in one place and keeps your devices fully charged while you travel.
We are travelers too and understand that being organised is the key to a smooth and stress free trip.

 

 

THREE WIRELESS "PHONE" CHARGING OPTIONS
1. Flat back       2. Back slip     3. Inside compartment
 ______________________________________


WIRELESSLY RECHARGING THE WALLET
The GOQI Continental wallet was designed so that it not only charges your phones wireless, but itself is also charged wirelessly when placed on a wireless charging station.
A complete wireless charging solution. 
 

We understand that not everywhere will have wireless charging stations, so wired charging is also an option.  You can charge it from any laptop, computer, power strip or wall socket via our USB(A) cable.

______________________________________POWERING UP AND DOWN THE GOQI WALLET WITH A SIMPLE PRESS.

 
For your safety and unnecessary battery waste, we have designed an elegant, hidden on/off button on the gusset of the wallet. 
______________________________________
SNUG AND SECURE WITH TIME, DATES AND NOTIFICATIONS VISIBLE
 

 
We designed the slip compartment because we know you want to review your messages, see the time or charging level, when you are charging.  We know we do. 
______________________________________
EASY CHARGING OF WEARABLE TECH GADGETS
There are many charging methods for each tech gadget out there, so we  offer a micro USB cable with the GOQI Continental wallet.  You can charge your watches, trackers, headsets, rings and glasses with the appropriate adaptor.

_______________________________________
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS & ATTENTION TO DETAIL

As leather product specialists for over 30 years, we have selected the finest leathers which will pass the test of time.  Metal components and workmanship are also inspected to ensure its finishing will last.  Workmanship is carried out by the best craftsmen in the leather business who make for many famous international brands.
_______________________________________
DESIGNED AND MADE WITH DEDICATION AND PASSION
       
Working with the best in leather accessories and wireless charging technology, we are able to capture the opportunities of scaling up production to international standards, without compromising our dedication and passion.  _______________________________________ A PASSION FOR CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT AND A VISION OF A GRAND FUTURE FOR WIRELESS WEARABLES.

We have tried out of hundreds of iterations.  Here are 12 of them planned for future versions when our campaign is a success.______________________________________
OUR HOPES, DREAMS, BELIEF AND VISION

A couple of awards for best of small accessory design along the way and a lot of hard work to go with it, travelling the world. We are launching the GOQI wallets after many years of designing, making and selling leather bags and accessories.  With a strong belief that there are too many wires in our life and a vision to start eliminating some of them, we hope you can support us and other wireless charging companies so that we can keep reiterating towards the perfect wireless charging accessory.
We have also designed a method to incorporate GOQI tech into your favourite branded accessories so that your business satchels and handbags will be able to charge all your accessories wirelessly.  We are currently in talks with brands at the moment.
By supporting our first step, you will help validate that the time for wireless charging has come.  
MATTHEW CHOW, founder
______________________________________
DELIVERY TIME FRAME ** delivery completed 100%
December 2016 for first 100 purchased.
_____________________________________  
All Indiegogo first backers received their travel wallet in time.Q&A directly with Indiegogo.  Thanks
We are very grateful for your support in making this happen.

Frequently asked questions : from backers
- Is the wallet safe?  GOQI wallets have heat sensor units attached to both the batteries and to the transmitter, and will automatically reduce the power output of the system in the event of overheating past 55 degrees.  The Qi wireless standard emits very minimal electromagnetic waves which are safe for humans.  
- Will it work with my phone?  GOQI wallets are currently based on Qi wireless technology which is a wireless induction charging method.  There are many cell phones on the market which support this wireless technology, including the new iphone8,8+,X and also most Samsung phones.   Other phones only require a thin charging coil to be placed behind the battery. These can be easily purchased over the web, however we have offered you 2 types of receivers to purchase, which are compatible with most iphones and android phones.   These can be purchased at www.goqiwireless.com
- How long will the battery last?  Because every type of phone has a different battery capacity, we can only estimate that a 4000mAH battery can charge a standard iphone 6+  1x wirelessly and 2x with wire.  We suggest that you do not run your phone dry before recharging your phone on the wallet and for faster charge to use the wired option.  We have found that portable power banks have a 30% battery wastage and wireless charging has a further 30% loss in efficiency, so if you are looking for a fast charge we recommend you use the cable option we have.
- Will my credit cards be affected?  Most modern credit cards use chips now rather than magnetic strips so the magnetic field from the coils will not affect them.  Old style magnetic strip cards may be affected by magnetic induction charging, however we have installed protection plates between the transmitter and receivers coils which will help minimise any issues you may have.  With our Continental style the card section is also separated from the main transmitter, therefore minimising this issue.  Our own personal testing has not raised any issues to date.
- Does it come it other styles or colours?  Based on demand we have increased our offering with vegan leather, sports canvas and high quality leathers.
- How heavy and large is it?    The Long wallet is 300g and 19cm x 10cm x 2.5cm.  Travel wallet is 587g and size is  22.5cm long x 12.5cm wide x 4cm deep.  
- Can I repair it myself?  As we are professional manufacturers of these wallets, we strongly suggest that you do not attempt to self repair a GOQI wallet.  We have redesigned the new wallet to enable simpler repairs if necessary by professionals.
- I’m having trouble making a payment through Paypal.  Who should I reach out to?  We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to us and also the Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com.
- Can I get a refund?  According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here.
After the campaign, please reach out to our team at info@goqiwireless.com !IF YOU HAVE ANY OTHER QUESTIONS WE WOULD LOVE TO KNOW.  THANKS.
_______________________________________
UPDATE 14 July 2016 : Startup launch pad fair



________________________________________________________
May 2016
MEDI TECH : The GOQI wallet is getting a strong following with medical professionals to help them keep all there medical tech devices charged up when they do their patient visits._________________________________________________________
July 2016
GoQi long wallet charging my new HuaHui bluetooth tracker heat set.


_________________________________________________________
GoQi keeping my Wifi egg fully charged during my travels

_________________________________________________________
GoQi at breakfast in Melbourne Australia

Gift box packaging for all travel wallets

_________________________________________________________
Packed & Shipped 1 month early.  We under budgeted for freight by USD15/pc, but happy to take this as a learning experience.  Surprising the costs to Brazil, South Africa and even rural Japan.

_________________________________________________________
GOQi at Australia, Melbourne Innovation pitch fest 2016. Top 20 pitch.

_________________________________________________________
August 2016 - unboxing experiences with some happy backers. Thanks Jon.


_________________________________________________________
GOQi travel wallet - Unboxing instructions - Aug 2016


_________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________

story:
The Shamagh Project Story

My name is Majd and I am a Jordanian currently living in Texas.  I moved to the US around a year ago, and have made the states my home.  

I have worked with American students in Jordan for years, and one of my favorite moments with each group is taking them to visit Petra and Wadi Rum, two breathtaking sites in southern Jordan, where my family’s history began.  The Shamagh becomes a trademark and staple item of each trip; it protects my new foreign friends’ faces from the flying red dust as we barrel through the desert on 4x4’s, and shields their heads from the sun as we walk through the exposed siq of Petra in the footsteps of civilizations past.

This square piece of colorful cotton, adorned with tassels and handcrafted in the workshops of my homeland, is full of memories of cultural exploration.  Over the past ten months, since I stepped foot in the USA for the first time, I am consistently experiencing moments of cultural exploration as I struggle and strive to make a foreign place home and connect with the community around me.  Texas may seem like an unexpected settling spot for a Bedouin from the Middle East, but after visiting around twenty cities since I arrived in the US, I have found that the people here are so welcoming and enjoy a familiar way of life. The Lone Star state was one of many inspirations for The Shamagh Project, which is a reflection of my mission to create meaningful cultural fusion between the US and the Middle East.

I have created a final prototype for my American-inspired Shamagh, and hope to create a line of customizable scarves based in the same traditional pattern.  The funding from this campaign will allow me to order a large quantity of my design, and start working on new designs.  My dream is for the wearer to represent their pride on their chest, or head, or back - whether it be their state, city, university, favorite sports team, or social cause.

Uncovering the History of the Shamagh:

The red and white checkered headdress of my homeland has been around for thousands of years, before Islam, Christianity, and Judaism began in the Middle East.  It originated in the village of Shamakh (neighboring my home village of Shobak) in southern Jordan, and stayed resilient as a signature wardrobe piece throughout the Edomite, Moabite, and Nabatean Kingdoms of Jordan.  These kingdoms reached through Iraq to the Arab Gulf, and across Jordan to Syria.

Over time, through the developing of the Arabic and Sumerian languages, the head and neck covering from the village of Shamakh came to be known as the shamagh.  Its most traditional representation is red and white, with the red color coming from the Jordanian poppy that dots the country's landscape during the spring season, and the white existing as cotton in its purest form.

HRH King Hussein of Jordan donning the shamagh in a desert patrol uniform.

As other civilizations and countries formed, the colors of the shamagh grew to incorporate black, now known as the Palestinian kuffiyah, or solid white, which is more popular in the Gulf.

The light cotton and wool material of the shamagh allow it to be worn in any climate or season.  It is light enough to wear in the summer, yet serves as a warm covering in the winter.  It can be worn as a simple neck scarf, or tied around the crown of the head for sun coverage, or even around the shoulders.

ِA Yemeni Jew wearing the shamagh. (Wikipedia)

What We're Asking For:

In order to achieve my goal of ordering this model in a large quantity and starting a line of customizable shamaghs, we will need to raise a minimum of $15,000.  More specifically, these funds will be used for:

  • Production
    • In order to create this unique and inaugural product, we will need to secure one entire loom in the manufacturer's factory.  This will allow us to run our material and thread through the loom, as the others solely produce the traditional red and white or black and white shamagh.
    • Labor
  • Materials
    • Cotton thread and tassels.
  • Shipping
    • From the manufacturer to the U.S.
  • Ownership
    • In order to maintain ownership of this idea, we will need to sustain substantial orders to our manufacturer.
  • Customs & broker fees
    • In order to receive the shipment in the US, we will be beholden to import fees and will be required to assign an agent to acquire the items from US Customs and Border Patrol.
  • New designs and products
    • We hope this crowfunding campaign will allow us to expand our designs and offer completely customizable options!

As a thank you for your support, we will provide unique perks to our donors such as handwritten thank you cards, logo stickers, and even the product itself!

If we are unable to raise the total amount of funding, we will still produce this shamagh model in a small quantity to send as a thank you to our donors, but will be unable to produce a large quantity and create more designs.

The Impact

As this idea develops, we hope to have the opportunity to partner with organizations that support our ideals of building bridges through cross-cultural programs and education. The Shamagh Project was created through passion and a dream; thus, I will seek out organizations to donate profits to when the project is fully funded.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to support us monetarily, please share our campaign through email, social media, and word of mouth!

Please include the hashtag #theshamaghproject on your post! Follow the hashtag to see our friends posting their pictures wearing the prototype.

story:
THE VEEROUT PROJECT


MISSION

Our mission is to allow anyone with a creative mind to express themselves artistically on their clothing while sharing their art with children of less fortune. The impact art has on a childs life is priceless. We want to help children by giving them high quality t shirts as well as expose them to beautiful art that will inspire their own creativity and artistic expression. 

OUR INSPIRATION

Our current screen printing startup, VeerOut Screen Printing, based out of Santa Barbara, CA, has been greatly expanding in recent months. We now see an opportunity to start giving back to the marginalized communities that often get forgotten about by businesses such as ourselves that serve those who can afford our servcies.

The idea for the VeerOut Project started because people kept asking us to just make just ONE shirt for them with their original designs. We were unable to do so because our screen printing equipment takes too much time to set up, and costs too much for the consumer in the end. We decided that we needed to get a DIGITAL garment printer so we could just make one shirt any time that someone asked us to do so. Our team quickly realized that the opportunity to create individual customized tshirts for our clients at a relatively low cost also presents another, more phillanthropic opportunity to provide a child in need with a BRAND NEW TSHIRT for every order we recieve from our clients. We recognize that there are many foundations in the US dedicated to prividing children and their families with used, hand-me-down garments. A brand new shirt, however, is something that is not commonly received by these children. It is our goal to not only provide a child with a new shirt-- but to give them a gift that will provide them with a sense of pride and excitement--something hand-me-downs cannot provide. The founders of VeerOut were moved by the One-for-One vision and decided to separate this piece of the business into its own project and allow artists to express themselves through philanthropy.

HELPING THE LESS FORTUNATE

Our entire business revolves around promoting growth in our communities. We decided to start by helping American families first.

According to the US Census Bureau:

  • US Population: 311,591,917 
  • Approx. 13.7 million single parents
  • Responsible for raising 26% of all children
  • 27% of single mothers and their children live in poverty
  • 13% of single fathers and their children live in poverty
  • Impoverished households rely heavily on medicaid, foodstamps, public housing, rent subsidies and other types of aid.

TO BUILD A COMMUNITY. ONE CLICK. TWO SMILES.

For each t shirts that you purchase, we are donating one identical t shirt to those in need. We chose the buy one, give one model because it makes an immediate and tangible difference in the lives of those in need.

ORIGINAL DESIGNS ONLY?

Yes! We cannot print copyrighted material so we need consumers to upload original art (graphics, fonts, etc).


Let your imagination run wild!

 

 

THE IMPACT

As founders of the VeerOut Project, we are proud to bring together our diverse backgrounds to promote growth in our communities. We want to share original art with families across America to alleviate the stress they ususally face when buying new clothes.

Please watch our video so you can get a full picture of what we are doing and why.

PLEASE HELP US BRING THIS PROJECT TO LIFE!

If you are unable to donate you can still help us reach our goal by sharing our cause with your family and friends!

 

Men's Tee

 

Ladies Bella Boxy Tank

 

 

Men's Tank

 

Ladies Tee

story:
Hi my name is Justin and I want to introduce you to my new project that creates a whole new experience to improve the custom t-shirt industry.  My goal is to see the custom t-shirt industry with a more efficient system that produces high quality customized products with faster turn-around times.

My Background:

Although born in West Covina, California, we moved to Bloomington, Indiana when I was eight where I completed school and attended Indiana University.  After serving in the United States Marine Corps, my deployment to Iraq came to an end in 2005 and I returned home as a disabled veteran.  In 2006, realizing my Infantry skills would not be adaptable to the civilian world I had to make a switch in professions.  Fortunately, I had been in a small, specialized unit that used equipment called an MSIDS (MAGTF Secondary Imagery Dissemination System).  This equipment enabled our unit to take surveillance from photos and rapidly get the intelligence back to the Battalion Commander.  The Panasonic Toughbook we used had a program of “layering” photographs to allow for additional messages for intel within the pictures.  This set me up perfectly to learn Adobe Photoshop and move into web design and later programming.   From websites to even Native Mobile Apps I have published in the Apple ‘App Store’, I have developed a strong base in web and mobile technologies.

In 2008, I made the move to the promotional products industry as I found I could serve my clients better in the promotions of their websites via offline advertising and marketing campaigns.  This gave me the opportunity to do training in various promotional product productions from silk screening to even Pad Printing. 

This past year I began learning the art of ‘Direct to Garment’ printing which is what this project is focused on!

Industry Background

Currently, the most cost effective way of getting custom t-shirts are done via silk screening.  Silk screening has many limitations though, such as the time it takes to set up each screen for each color used.  Printing a photograph to a t-shirt is just not possible with silk screening because of the large amount of colors used.   My focus is on the Direct to Garment (DTG) printer systems. The best way to describe these printers is by imagining a t-shirt as a piece of paper printing through a color printer.  Essentially you can print whatever is on your computer screen to a t-shirt within a couple minutes!

The Project

This project you are viewing now is focusing on one key part of the business.  The goal is to develop mobile t-shirt shops.  Mobile t-shirts shops with the capability of instant printing would be a great way to add a new user experience to buying t-shirts at a fair, festival, concert or even sports game!  Even fundraisers can benefit from this system.  Imagine a fundraiser that raises money for something like breast cancer research.  The fundraiser hires us to handle all t-shirt sales.  The public can choose which design they like best for their t-shirt but even customize it with something as specific as a person’s name the purchaser knew who passed away or wishes to honor from breast cancer - or even a photo!  

The actual business model is very simple and great for NPO’s and small business, but even better for clubs or music bands.  Essentially, we come out for a minimum (20 shirts roughly) and sell the shirts for you.  We have a set price for you and a set price for the public, which is where your profits originate from the difference.  At the end of the event we give you a check for your end of the profits!  No more buying or stocking 500 shirts, or more, for events and having too many shirts left over digging into your profits!

What we need

We are seeking at least $15,000 to complete the full development of our mobile t-shirt shop system.  We still need to focus on some programming components to ensure easy use of the system as well as the need for additional products and inventory.  Products we need now are some key components to our current printer, but hopefully we will be able to purchase another printer for back-up purposes in case one printer ever goes down for maintenance.  We also need a hydraulic cart system to move the printer easily from vehicles to any location we need to be - no matter if it’s indoors or outdoors!

 How can you help and BENEFIT!

The benefit to everyone who helps us in this project is that we want to HELP YOU with your IndieGoGo project!  The more you donate to us, the more we can benefit you in your donations for your project by providing promotional products to give out to your donors!  This is in the form of our IndieGoGo Promo Pack.   No matter if you want the Promo Pack for your start-up or if you already have a business, organization or even a band and need promos, you can get them here while helping us build and engineer our mobile custom t-shirt shop!

This past year I began learning the art of ‘Direct to Garment’ printing which is what this project is focused on!
Industry Background
Currently, the most cost effective way of getting custom t-shirts are done via silk screening.  Silk screening has many limitations though, such as the time it takes to set up each screen for each color used.  Printing a photograph to a t-shirt is just not possible with silk screening because of the large amount of colors used.   My focus is on the Direct to Garment (DTG) printer systems. The best way to describe these printers is by imagining a t-shirt as a piece of paper printing through a color printer.  Essentially you can print whatever is on your computer screen to a t-shirt within a couple minutes!
The Project
This project you are viewing now is focusing on one key part of the business.  The goal is to develop mobile t-shirt shops.  Mobile t-shirts shops with the capability of instant printing would be a great way to add a new user experience to buying t-shirts at a fair, festival, concert or even sports game!  Even fundraisers can benefit from this system.  Imagine a fundraiser that raises money for something like breast cancer research.  The fundraiser hires us to handle all t-shirt sales.  The public can choose which design they like best for their t-shirt but even customize it with something as specific as a person’s name the purchaser knew who passed away or wishes to honor from breast cancer - or even a photo!  
The actual business model is very simple and great for NPO’s and small business, but even better for clubs or music bands.  Essentially, we come out for a minimum (20 shirts roughly) and sell the shirts for you.  We have a set price for you and a set price for the public, which is where your profits originate from the difference.  At the end of the event we give you a check for your end of the profits!  No more buying or stocking 500 shirts, or more, for events and having too many shirts left over digging into your profits!
What we need
We are seeking at least $15,000 to complete the full development of our mobile t-shirt shop system.  We still need to focus on some programming components to ensure easy use of the system as well as the need for additional products and inventory.  Products we need now are some key components to our current printer, but hopefully we will be able to purchase another printer for back-up purposes in case one printer ever goes down for maintenance.  We also need a hydraulic cart system to move the printer easily from vehicles to any location we need to be - no matter if it’s indoors or outdoors!
 How can you help and BENEFIT!
The benefit to everyone who helps us in this project is that we want to HELP YOU with your IndieGoGo project!  The more you donate to us, the more we can benefit you in your donations for your project by providing promotional products to give out to your donors!  This is in the form of our IndieGoGo Promo Pack.   No matter if you want the Promo Pack for your start-up or if you already have a business, organization or even a band and need promos, you can get them here while helping us build and engineer our mobile custom t-shirt shop!

story:
Short Summary

    Hi everyone! My name is Leah "Vynarius" Tatley and this is my first campaign. I've always been passionate about art and felt this was a great way to channel that passion into something tangible with the added bonus of supporting a cause that I care for.

    This campaign is to raise funds for the first batch of T-shirts I wish to print. This campaign also has the added bonus of having a portion donated to the Loggerhead Marinelife Center, a local Florida charity in West Palm Beach. (Amount detailed in the pledges.)

    By supporting my campaign you help an aspiring artist who wishes to have her artwork be beautiful and meaningful. A goal of mine is to create designs that will be liked by many while also having some connection to a cause. I feel it is important to give back where and when you can.

 

What We Need & What You Get

    The goal is $500 (the minimum you can set) and this money will first be going towards covering the cost of the printing of the first batch of T-shirts (aiming for 40 T-shirts min.) and image prints and the proper amount to be sent to Loggerhead Marine Center based on the pledges. Any remaining amount will be used towards the next T-shirt design printing cost.

    By pledging your funds there are a plethora of perks available, each detailed on the side, with a wide range of amounts to best accommodate those who wish to help!

    (The T-shirt will be the background color of the above image[Kiwi Green], and the dark green color will be the printed color upon the T-shirt.)

   If I don't reach my entire goal the funds will go towards printing as many of the "Save the Sea Turtles" T-shirts and prints as possible.

The Impact

    This will be the first step towards having my own line of T-shirts in which I can offer, and continue to be able to offer future designs to grow. Not only are you helping an aspiring artist, but you are helping the conservation of sea turtles, which all species occuring in US waters are classified as threatened or endangered.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute, that's okay, you can still help! Please, spread the word to your friends and family. Remember there are many tools that Indiegogo has provided to help aid in this, such as the share tools! Thank you for your time and consideration!

story:
The reason for this campaign is to expose an awesome product to a world that craves innovative solutions. In the process of doing that we hope to raise awareness and enough capital to finance the more 'technical' areas of our venture. Tooling and tying up legal loose ends are our top priorities for any funds raised.

Our hope is that this campaign will serve as a catalyst for marketing to create awareness of uses and begin not only the fad, but also the longer-term staple product for bundlers in all facets of life and hobbies.

Markets of interest include (but are not limited to):

  • Backpacking
  • Hunting
  • Camping
  • Military
  • Electronics
  • High Performance Audio
  • Home
  • Work
  • Utility
  • Snow Sports
  • Marine/Sailing
  • Cosmetic

What can this product do?

  • Ride Along
  • Free End of cordage.
  • Inbetween Ends
  • Rebuildable
  • Labeling
  • Tracking
  • Finding
  • Custom Construction

story:
Help Gary Noel survive from one the most deadliest plane crashes in Lousianas history. Gary needs financial support for medical needs so he can walk once again and provide for his family and contribute to the economy like he did every single day before the deadly plane crash on August 15th.

Gary Noel is a lovable, hardworking American farmer who is also a pilot, flying a crop duster. He was in middle of work flying his crop duster plane and suddenly his plane dipped out of control, hit a power line and crashed upside down. Gary was in excruciating pain from the severe injuries and couldn’t move. Several bones in his body were crushed from the impact including a huge gash in his head that was bleeding and needed immediate attention. A young college nursing student saw the plane crash and rushed to the site with a few people following her vehicle.  The brave young lady, Kristyn Abshire, single handedly rescued Gary Noel in spite of the bystanders yelling at her not to go near the plane as the fuel was leaking all over and the plane was smoking. Kristyn covered Gary’s bleeding head wound until the emergency rescue team arrived which saved Gary’s life.

We want to raise a total of $100,000 with $80,000 going to Gary Noel to help recover from the plane crash and also give a $20,000 Nursing College scholarship award for Kristyn Abshire for saving Gary’s life.

Gary Noel is currently in a critical condition and going through several painful surgeries to recover from the body damage he sustained from the plane crash. Gary requires our support to get him back on his feet and help his family who depends on him to cope with the expensive medical needs from the accident. As a hardworking American farmer living in Vermilion Parish, Louisiana, Gary has earned an honest living, took care of his family, been charitable all his life, paid taxes on his earnings and contributed to the economy.  This is the most difficult time in Gary’s life and he deserves our support. Please help contribute to Gary Noel and his loving family to get through this difficult time in their life.

We also want to give Kristyn Abshire a $20,000 scholarship for her nursing education so she can save more lives like Gary Noel. She saw an accident, rushed to the scene without wasting time; she risked her life from a potentially exploding plane and saved a life of a hardworking American farmer. We would appreciate is the nursing college Kristyn Abshire is attending gives her a full scholarship for her good deeds and care for human life. People like her deserve full scholarship for education.

story:
Glorious Resurrection of an Extinct Animal- On a T-Shirt!

Hello all! My name is Ryan, and I am an artist/illustrator/designer. I run a t-shirt and apparel company called Donkeyshines which specializes in absurd animal designs. Recently, I created an illustration of a flaming dodo bird which I call the Dodo Phoenix. It symbolizes the resurrection of a misunderstood animal that everyone assumed was too dumb to survive. With your help, I'd like to put this majestic creature on a t-shirt and share it with the world!

What I Need

I've estimated that this project will cost $1750, which includes Indiegogo processing fees, costs of perks, and of course the printing of the shirt itself. This is for the 3-color Dodo Phoenix design on the front and the 1-color Donkeyshines logo on the right sleeve. I'm looking to do a run of 101 shirts on the very best blanks I can afford. Shirt quality is important to me, and if I fall short of my goal, I will print fewer shirts before I make compromises with the fabric.

What Happens If I Fall Short of My Goal?

Taking care of the perks will be my first priority if my goal is not met. Since the Dodo Phoenix shirt itself will be offered as one of the perks, that means there will be at least SOME shirts printed as long as at least one person makes a contribution for that perk. My ultimate goal is to share my art, and all of the perks offered will be examples of my work. In that sense, this project can't fail as long as at least one person makes a contribution for one perk (even if it's not for the shirt and I don't end up printing any).

Of course, getting the entire $1750 would be nice, too...

The Perks

$5- Contributions of this amount will get you a piece of hand-drawn original art! What will I draw for you? Whatever pops into my head as I hold my pen over an 8" x 10" piece of paper and listen to Berlioz's Symphonie Fantastique or Prokoviev's Semyon Kotko. The drawing is likely to feature a weird monster or alien or something. Example:


See more examples of the kind of drawing you'll get.

$10- Contributions of this amount will get you a pack of stickers and postcards from Donkeyshines. The postcards are prints of 3 digital paintings I've done (Interplanetary Adoption, A Day in the Park, and Gorilla Chef):

In addition to 1 each of the above postcards, you'll get 3 Robot Penguin stickers:

$15- Contributions of this amount will get you the Dodo Phoenix shirt! It quite possibly will look something like this:

This shirt will eventually retail for $19.99 at Donkeyshines, so you can save $5 by getting it as a perk for a donation! Think of it as a discounted pre-order.

$20- Contributions of this amount will get you any Donkeyshines T-shirt I currently have in stock. Here are some examples of my other designs:

See more choices at Donkeyshines

$50- For contributions of this amount, I will sketch a portrait of you in graphite (pencil) on 8.5" x 11" drawing paper! Actually, the portrait can be of anyone you want, as long as you can send me a high quality photo reference. I can even draw your pet. What do I mean by high quality reference? Not too dark, not too light, face has to be big enough, it shouldn't be blurry, out of focus etc. I'll only be drawing the face, so it should mostly be a close-up of the face. Here's an example of my work:

$100- For contributions of this amount, I will paint a portrait in watercolor on 9" x 12" watercolor paper. As with the pencil portraits, the subject can be pretty much anyone as long as you provide a decent photo reference. Example:

$250- For contributions of this amount, I will paint a portrait in acrylic on an 11" x 14" wooden panel! Example:

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are tough, and our wallets are sometimes thinner than we'd like them to be. If you are unable to contribute to my project financially, there are other ways you can help that Dodo rise from the ashes. Spread the word! Use social media! Use the Indiegogo sharing tools! Sharing is caring, after all.

story:
Our Story
Dreaded Eden is here to bring out everyone's wild and creative side. Through wigs, clothes and accessories, a person can become their inner little creature. Run and owned by Lady Eve, creating new designs along with custom works for any and all people. This company is newly established to launch to great heights, but not alone. This fundraiser is to buy supplies, tools, and help getting the word out via building the website, fliers, and traveling to events etc. The goal is $400 but we're looking for more if possible, Eve has wonderful workers that work very hard for something they love just as much as she does that she wants to pay along with wanting to hire many others.With styles ranging from Cybergoth to old fashioned gothic, lolita and Visual Kei and anything in the fantasy realm of imagination as well as Costume Play for the Anime and gaming scene anyone and everyone will be covered with their desires.
The Impact
This is technically creating a few new jobs (local and in other states) if all goes well. Many possibilities branch from Dreaded Eden, including entertainment. Not reaching our goal or higher means people who work hard with Eve expressing their talents and time will go with out compensation, so please help!
What We Need & What You Get
The funds will be going toward tools and what not such as tables, storage for materials, dress forms, sewing machines. Also the ability to stock up on materials such as hair, fabric (faux fur, vinyl, spandex, etc), base wigs, cyberlox, beads and just about anything. Orders are filled on a "as asked for" basis there for they take longer to produce needing to order all the materials, having most everything in our hands on stand by makes it possible to roll out orders faster and bring out whole new lines of designs. Also funds will go to advertising and getting the word out ie. creating a website, ordering fliers/cards/signage and traveling to events and conventions to sell and bring Dreaded Eden to you.$500 specifically will get us a much needed dress form and enough money to start a siteWhet you'll get out of donating ranges:$5 will get you 10% off an item at the Tainted Reality store http://www.taintedreality.net/$10 will get 10% off an order$25 will get you 20% off an order $50 will get you a custom dread accent kit (around 40 dreads) or a custom chain mail jewelry piece or a Dread Horn set$75 will get you a custom set of leg warmers or a small custom fall set$100 will get you a large custom fall set or a custom paw/leg warmer set. 
Other Ways You Can Help
You all can get the word out by sharing the Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/DreadedEden and posting this fundraiser EVERYWHERE possible, forums, twitter, tumblr and any other social media or sources that would find interest in thiscompany!

story:
**I WILL ASK YOU YOUR SIZE ONCE THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER SO NO NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THIS!**

 

Help me repropose to my wife!

This past weekend, my wife, Annie Cline, lost her wedding ring in Indianapolis.  We looked all weekend for it and never found it.  She is deeply saddened that she will never have the ring that I proposed to her with as well as the wedding band she received on our big day.  While I know I will never be able to replace that special keepsake, I am wanting to replace it with a new wedding ring.  I plan to propose to her again and have a small renwal of our vows if you will.

How am I going to buy the new ring?

In order to buy the new ring, I need to raise funds in order to buy it.  I have been kicking around several ideas on how to do this, and the most logical way is for me to make and sell shirts.  The shirt is entitled "Bring the Ring" and is printed on a super-soft Tultex fashion fit heather shirt.  The vintage design has our initials in the center of the ring along with the year we got married.  The shirts are available in mens and womens sizes (heather grey is men's only.)  All the shirts are $18 and include shipping.
 

What it will mean to Annie and I

While there are not many material things that the two of us care about, this is the one thing that both of us are truly saddened that we will never have again.  There are so many memories of the ring.  Saving for it, proposing to Annie, the day we got married, the joys and trials of the first 7 years of our marriage.  I know how emotionally drained Annie is from losing it and I want to see her happy.  It would mean so much to both of us to have family and friends involved in this renewing of our marriage.  By purchasing a shirt, you are helping me raise the needed funds to buy that special item that will signify our undying love for each other.  Thank you!

 

Scott Cline

story:
Packed with over 23 Features

 

 

Each pledge includes: 

The Riviera PACK, a Laptop CASE, a Mobile HOLDER, a Water POUCH, and accessories !!! 

Each piece is integrated within the backpack design or each can be used by itself.

 

THE BACKPACK

 

 

EXTREMELY WATERPROOF STANDARD: 

All seams are LASER CUT and then WELDED with radio waves high frequency to resist over a 100.000mm water column and achieve extreme waterproof standards.

 

TOSS YOUR BAG AROUND, WORRY FREE: 

The extra padded bottom is layered with high-density EVA foam to reach high shock absorbing standards. Have you ever seen a dry bag, well we made an ultimate version with shock bottom system. 

 

COLD PROOF - WORRY FREE:

The zip and stitch free main compartment gives you extra security against water immersion and protects your vulnerable belongings in severe weather conditions like a snowstorm.

 

ROLL UP EXPANDABLE TOP:

Our pack expands from 20L to 30L, to perfectly fit one day at the office or a weekend away. The length/volume is adjustable in just a few seconds:

Our pack expands from 20L to 30L, to perfectly fit one day at the office or a weekend away. The length/volume is adjustable in just a few seconds:

 

NEVER SHOW UP TO WORK WITH A SWEATY BACK AGAIN:

A 3D Padded EVA back with laser cut finishing balances a comfortable, firm fit with good airflow for precise temperature control. Fast drying material dries in just seconds perfect for rainy days, open water swim or hottest sweating days.

 

CUSTOMISED RIDING STRAPS:

Shoulder straps are ergonomically designed with 3D top grade EVA.Extra padding offers comfort in any situation while keeping 100% water repellency. Maintain a minimalist look with our strap keepers, which tuck away any loose hanging parts.

 

EXTRA CAPACITY SIDE HANDLES:

Our side handles help separate wet materials from dry materials, but that's not quite the whole story--you can also use them to:
- Hold the pack while swimming 
- Hold your helmet before or after riding
- Offer extra storage capacity

 

CONVENIENT SAFETY WHISTLE: 

 

QUICK DRY HOLES POCKET: 

Specific laser cut mesh holes with a waterproof coating allows air to ventilate between the shell and lining, offering the most comfortable drying system on the market. Transporting your wet gear without worries and let them dry on your way.

 

BOOK AND TABLET POCKET: 

 

EASY ORGANISER: 

 

Fully Radio Frequency Backpack is the safest waterproof standard workmanship that technology can offer. Even though it has some limits, in fact a normal RFW pack can't offer any internal pockets. MOW over pass this limit with the Lap Top Internal Detachable Case and easy access organiser. 

THREE DIFFERENT FUNCTIONAL CLOSING METHODS:

 

Close your backpack three different ways to suit your day:

  • Commute Mode gives a compact, urban look that won't  brush against people or things.
  • Float Mode is a water safe solution that gives an extra holding handle for swimming.
  • Discover Mode is for easy access and quick expansion from 20 to 30L.

 

 

THE LAP TOP CASE

Like the Riviera backpack, your included laptop case can also be closed multiple ways to suit the occasion.

By adding the sailing grade rope shoulder straps (included in each purchase), your laptop case will transform into a second backpack, becoming the flattest waterproof laptop case in the market.

The front grab handle allows the case to be used as a separate handbag. Use it to hold your bike helmet, mobile holder or another clothing layer.

Internal pockets are extra padded and shock absorbing, functionally designed to separately hold your tablet, mobile, cables and more. Flat front pocket offers small extra packing capacity. Available only for 15’’ screens or less (Please see our size specification down here).

The back hidden zippered pocket is perfect to hold passport and valuables.

 

 

THE MOBILE CASE

Like the backpack and laptop holder, the included mobile case is high frequency welded, has a roll-up closure that fits any phone on the market, and offers easy access zippered pocket design to hold your ATM or credit cards.

 

The easy access zippered pocket is designed to hold your credit cards, cash, or receipts in a perfectly waterproof environment.

Our included back bracelet fixes the mobile case to any shoulder strap, side handles laptop case, or on your arm for your outdoor craziness.

 

COLORS

 

 

 

"I have been using the Riviera backpack for months now as my daily backpack. I am testing the limits (some rather extreme, over the technical lab's tests) so you won’t have to. I will be able to detect any possible problems, including long-term wear and tear and make further improvements before you get your first pack."

- Jacopo Pennone, Co-Founder and Creator

 

 

 

Making MOW a reality has been two years in the making. We know our potential difficulties, and we have thoroughly prepared to reduce potential risks before they occur. Given our combined experience (Sergio's 15 years of research and development, Enrica 's14 years in quality control and auditing, Jacopo's 14 years developing and manufacturing clothing and accessories for USA-UE brands) we are beyond confident in our ability to bring this product to the market.

As Salvador Dali’ said, “Have no fear of perfection, you will never reach it." Well we will keep our humble approach and work hard, sweating on each single pack and ready to face the challenge that any production will offers. With Our supporters help s we will overcome any difficulties and will delivery Riviera in to your hands.

 

MOW IN TO THE WILD: 

EARLY PROTOTYPES and MORE STORIES: 

 

 

LINKS

If you're interested in sharing this project with friends, here are a few links:

  • Facebook - Like us
  • Website  - Know more
  • Instagram - Follow 

Video and Photography: Sfera Films
Design: Luke Morris

story:
Strawberry Jam Kids is a new fresh baby and little kids brand, inspired by the cool styles, patterns and colors of the 60s, 70s and more. Strawberry Jam Kids will carry sizes from newborn up to 5/6T. Each piece in our line is designed to be fun, colorful, bold and comfortable, just what your little one will love.

Let me introduce myself, I'm Caitlyn, the founder of Strawberry Jam Kids. My background is in photography, but I have always loved sewing, design and fashion since my Aunt taught me to sew on my grandmother's machine. Before my first daughter was born, I began a handmade baby clothing business. The business evolved over the years, and now I'm ready to take it to the next level with a fresh styles and a new concept.

I am so excited to take my love of everything retro and vintage, and combine it with my passion for baby and kids clothes to make Strawberry Jam Kids come to life.

Strawberry Jam Kids has been my dream for years! It’s thrilling to finally launch this exciting new clothing line. I am so happy to have found the perfect outlet for my passion of vintage styles and kids wear. Plans are already being developed to expand and grow Strawberry Jam Kids. In the future, we intend to add a wider variety of clothing, a boy’s line, and some fabulous accessories. Thank you so much for helping Strawberry Jam Kids get off the ground! ​​

 

 

Funds raised here will be used to purchase inventory for the launch of the Strawberry Jam Kids collection. The launch collection consists of buttery soft baby rompers and girl’s shirts available in four different retro-inspired prints; a cute retro ringer t-shirt with our signature strawberry; and hand embroidered girl's shorts. Certain minimum quantities must be met to put the launch collection into production. Starting our collection with a strong variety of prints was critical to our success, but that does mean a larger investment up front. We also sought out a great and reliable manufacturer to ensure quality.  By lending your support to Strawberry Jam Kids today, you are not only helping launch the line but will also receive one of the great outfits from the collection. Your contribution is a pre-order! ​​

story:
Our story

 

The Scuro bronzo is a custom designed bronze pilot/dive watch, every part has been designed and build's on the brand's commitment to produce robust and well-designed timepieces that are both versatile and afordable. Like the dive watches that came before, SCURO kept things simple with a strong focus on reliability, which of course, is one of the most important qualities in a watch meant to serve both pilots and divers. With features like a bronze Super Compressor-style case and vibrant dial colors, the SCURO Bronzo also aims to offer tool watch lovers something a little different.

 B 03 vintage blue dial

B 02 Burst vintage brown dial

B 01 - Black dial

B 03 - Burst vintage blue dial

B 02 - Burst vintage brown dial

B 02 - Burst vintage brown dial

B 03 - Burst vintage blue dial

Double domed sapphire crystal with AR coating​

If it wasn't apparent in the Model S dive watches, it should be evident that SCURO prefers to use the best materials available in the development of  watches. In the case of the SCURO Bronzo, that material is CuSn8, a marine-grade bronze alloy that is known to patina nicely with age. This is also a more versatile case material than most people might think and the SCURO Bronzo is equally at home in both casual and formal settings. Whatever situation you find yourself in, it should also be noted that like all SCURO timepieces, it is backed by a one-year warranty.

Super-Luminova bezel, dial and hands

What they said about us :

http://www.thetimebum.com/2017/08/scuro-bronzo.html

http://www.ablogtowatch.com/scuro-bronzo-pilot-watch/

https://www.wristwatchreview.com/2017/08/02/scuro-is-kickin-it-with-a-brand-new-bronze-watch/

https://microbrandwatchworld.com/previews/dive-watch-and-pilot-watch-in-one-yes-please-and-thank-you-scuro/

For the movement, SCURO bronzo chose the venerable Miyota 9015. At just 3.90mm in height, the movement allowed for the relatively slim case profile and also provides reliable timekeeping. It offers both hacking and hand-winding and operates at 28,800 bph for a smooth, sweeping effect. One thing to note is that it also boasts a 42-hour power reserve and supports the discreet date function located at 6 o'clock on the Bronzo's dial.

Burst vintage blue sandwich dial

Another standout feature is the sandwich dial with its deep cutouts for the Arabic numerals that rest on the luminescent layer. Aside from that bottom layer, the cathedral-style hands are coated with Super-LumiNova for maximum visibility in low-light conditions. Additionally the dial is available in two "burst" colorways; Vintage Blue and Vintage Brown. Both of these dial finishes are meant to compliment the bronze case no matter how clean or patinated it may appear.

Burst vintage brown sandwich dial

Custom embossed S logo crown

Bead blasted stainless steel caseback with engraved logos

Buckle and lugs are in the same design language 

Scuro's signature bezel, double domed sapphire crystal with AR coating

The SCURO Bronzo's case measures 42mm in diameter and has a thickness of 13mm including the domed sapphire crystal, which makes for a slim profile in a watch with this much wrist presence. The lug-to-lug measurement was also kept to just 50mm to work with a variety of wrist sizes. Water resistance is 200m and the Bronzo's twin-crown design gives the watch a distinct look that exudes utility and practicality. Both of the crowns are embossed with SCURO's 'S' logo and if you haven't guessed it by now, one of the crowns controls the movement functions while the other is dedicated to the bidirectional custom-designed internal bezel.

Case Diameter : 42 mm 

Lug to lug : 50 mm

Thickness :  13 mm ( including domed sapphire crystal )

Case Material : Bronze Cusn8

Bezel : Bi-directional custom designed internal bezel  

Crown : Custom stainless steel dual screwdown crowns with embossed S logo ( both are screwdown crowns ) 

Crystal : Domed sapphire crystal with AR Coating 

Movement : Japanese Miyota 9015 Automatic Movement  

Dial : Sandwich dial, index & hands painted with Super-Luminova  

Strap Material : 20mm black sail cloth strap. 

Water Resistant : 20 ATM/200M

Warranty: 12 Months

Add an additional strap ( US$25 )

How to get additional straps

If you would like to add additional straps, add US$25 to your pledge amount for each additional strap after you select your reward on the right side of the page, this is a custom made dark brown Italian genuine leather strap.

Genuine Italian brown leather strap - Total length 280 mm

We anticipate to begin delivering rewards in the late of Dec. 2017 or Jan. 2018 . Quality assurance will take place in conjunction with delivery ensuring we ship perfect watches in a timely manner.

Shipping now is via DHL express.

In order to assist you in calculating duties, please follow the link below:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation

Risks & Challenges

Having completed production runs of the Scuro model S titanium watches on our previous campaign, we have learnt a lot and have plans to prevent any problems that we can foresee. Quality issues have also been solved.

Production delays have been prevented as we have the final prototypes for production, with all specifications and details locked down with the manufacturer.

We have reliable suppliers who ensure that the watches delivered are of the best quality, although this sometimes come at the expense of time. However, this attention to quality is extremely important to us as other suppliers might be quicker to deliver an inferior product. We hope you all agree with our beliefs!

In the event of delays to milestones or reward deliveries please note they will be shared promptly and a revised schedule provided.

Genuine Italian brown leather strap - Total length 280 mm







We anticipate to begin delivering rewards in the late of Dec. 2017 or Jan. 2018 . Quality assurance will take place in conjunction with delivery ensuring we ship perfect watches in a timely manner.
Shipping now is via DHL express.
In order to assist you in calculating duties, please follow the link below:

story:
Hello Indiegogoers,

Reuben and I started living a more eco-lifestyle around 4 years ago and since then we have made an effort to be sustainable and conscious in our buying decisions. The one area where this became a challenge was everyday clothing, like t-shirts. We were shocked at how expensive these everyday items were - with words like organic and eco being used as marketing fodder to hike up prices and segregate buyers - but that’s totally against the nature of sustainability - so we said “rhino balls to that” and started Jungle Snail.

Jungle Snail is a little clothing company that wants to make a big difference. We want to supply simple, quality eco-clothing for everyday living at down-to-earth prices. We also want to start this business off on a sustainable footing and give back from the first t-shirts sold - instead of as part of a PR campaign or tax-break like high street retailers. That means aligning with charities and awesome causes to share the eco love - you buy the t-shirts and the worlds eco-warriors get a helping hand.

Jungle Snail wants to challenge the high street and bring sustainable eco-clothing to everyone - why should you pay a small fortune for a simple organic cotton t-shirt just because it’s a trendy thing? That’s just massive elephant-poo. You know what we do with massive elephant-poo - we get it in paper-form and print on it!

So, elephant-poo aside, we need your support in getting our venture off the ground. Your donations to our startup fund will ensure that we can get the ‘Mother Snail’ launched in exactly the way we want to operate it - by giving a little wherever we can. We also want to ensure that we’re a sustainable company from the ground-up - from our clothing materials, the printing we use, the packaging, the labels, even the food we feed our sausage dog ‘Noodle’.

Thank you in advance for your support in helping us make this a reality!

story:
Redoubled:

(adjective) become much greater in intensity or size or amount.  

Rewondered is expanding, offering new product lines and custom order services.  I am very excited about all the new products I will be introducing over the course of this campaign, and in the future.  Funds raised will support purchasing more supplies to make more samples and products for sale, as well as to make the items claimed through the rewards offered here, and for packaging, listing fees, and other costs associated with making and selling my products.  

I will be listing five new items in my Etsy shop for each day for 50 days (my Five X Fifty promotion, see the updates tab for links to my blog posts), so I am redoubling my efforts to raise funds, create new products, and get them available to my customers.

UPDATE 12/11/12: I now have the ability to view City of Heroes .costume files, so I'm adding a special perk.  For $100 I will use a .costume file you send me as a prototype, and send you the finished pieces so you can cosplay your character!  Alternately, if you don't want to/can't cosplay your own character, I will make a female costume of your choice for myself to cosplay and do a photo shoot, sending you autographed copies of at least five photos.  Please send your .costume file to rewondered@gmail.com

Caveats:  I will not cosplay any costume that shows more skin than it covers.  No Eden tops, sorry!  I may not be able to make every piece available in the costume creator, so your costume may not be complete if any pieces are too hard for me to make or require skills I don't have (i.e. I can sew, I can't weld).  This project may take me several months, and I will start with the easier costumes first.  I will keep you appraised of my progress on your costume pieces and do my best to recreate it in its entirety, but I cannot guarantee that I will be able to make every piece, nor when I will have it done.  Also, shipping your costume to you will be extra, and I will arrange that with you once the costume is completed.

UPDATE 12/01/12:  With the sunsetting of City of Heroes and my acceptance as a merchant for Birka, I will be redirecting my focus and funding on two main new products (though I'll still be completing the Five X Fifty posts I'm behind on. I have items made, I just need to get them posted!). 

One, I will be attempting to recreate City of Heroes costume pieces "in real life" particularly those "classic" pieces that so many people used and those from some of the fun newer costume packs like the Steampunk and Gunslinger ones.  If you played City of Heroes, please send your screenshots of your favorite costumes to rewondered@gmail.com

Two, I will be working on a line of Practically Period jewelry, garb, and accessories for SCA enthusiasts, particularly a line of mix and match reversible pieces that can be used to create several looks from just a handful of pieces.  For example, a pair of tie-on sleeves, an overdress/vest/apron, a lace-up bodice/corselet, and a belt/sash could be combined in several different ways on top of a basic chemise/dress.  I also want to work on Rewondered Garb, remaking modern clothing to look more period.

If you are going to be at Birka, you can spend your gift certificate and/or pick out your free item there!

For more information about redeeming your perks, please read this.

 

Rewondered – What is Rewondered?

Rewondered is a one-woman handmade fashion business specializing in items for anyone who wants to express their style in a distinctive and unconventional fashion.

When I decided to start my own business, I wanted it to express my creativity, as well as do some small part to save the world (I'm not a superhero in real life, but I play one online). I started designing jewelry using a variety of new and used materials, old broken pieces, found objects, leftover craft supplies, and anything else I thought was interesting. I try to reuse and recycle as much as possible, thus keeping perfectly good objects out of the landfills. I love taking something that could be considered “junk” and “rewondering” it into something... well, wonderful.

I have been planning to expand my product lines for some time, but Rewondered took a bit of a back seat when I relocated to New Hampshire in August of 2011, and when I got married in August of 2012. However, I have since been busy in the studio and I'm ready to start reinvigorating my business.

Here are just a few of the new products I'm working on:

  • Period “Replica” Jewelry – Designs based on portraits and artwork from the Middle Ages and Renaissance.
  • Basic garb – T-tunics, chemises, simple dresses, etc.
  • “Upcycled” garb – Modern clothing “rewondered” to look more period.
  • Garb “Accessories” – Sleeves that tie on, aprons, tabards, headdresses, hats, belts and sashes, pouches, corsets, etc.
  • Steampunk “Accessories” – Bustles and overskirts, corset tops, top hats, bags and purses, belts and harnesses, spats, cuffs, etc.
  • Costume and cosplay pieces – I’d love to try some recreations of costume pieces that are available in City of Heroes, and I have several other costume patterns I need to play with.
  • Hair accessories – Barrettes, headbands, hair sticks, elastics, and various headpieces.
  • More bags – I have a bunch of different patterns and a few other ideas floating around in my head.
  • Skirts – I’m working on a few of my own design, and I have several patterns.
  • Wondiosyncra-Tees – Upcycled t-shirts featuring descriptive words.
  • “Feminized” t-shirts – I’ve seen several nifty ideas for taking a regular t-shirt and making it more fitted and more feminine.
  • More “rewondered” clothing and costume pieces
  • More embellished hoodies
  • More pillows
  • More wall art – Word art designs using quotes, collages and mixed media, signs, etc.
  • Adding matching earrings and/or bracelets to some of my current designs

 

Rewards Redoubled

Each reward level is actually a double reward.  You get to choose one item in that price range, plus you'll get a gift certificate to Rewondered in the amount of your contribution.
 
For a $50 contribution, your reward is re-redoubled, and you'll get a gift certificate worth $210!  I am limiting this reward to 210 people.  Why 210?  Because 2/10 is my birthday so I have a special affinity for that number. :)
 
If I raise DOUBLE my goal (i.e. $2000), all rewards will double!  So you'll get two products in that price range plus twice your contribution as a gift certificate.  And the $50 contributions will get $420 gift certificates!  And yes, the $100 contributions would be able to pick two costumes.
 
AND if all 210 of the $50 rewards are claimed, I'll multiply ALL rewards by 5!  So you'd get 5 items and 5 times your contribution as a gift certificate, or a $1050 gift certificate for a $50 contribution, or five costumes.
 
Rewondered gift certificates do not expire and don't need to be spent all at once, as I will keep track of any balance left.  Most of my prices end in 95 cents, so for the purposes of the price ranges here, all items will be rounded up to the next dollar (i.e. an item priced at $9.95 is a $10 item).
 

Other Ways You Can Help

One great way to help is to spread the word about my campaign to everyone you know through Facebook, Twitter, email, or however else you want to communicate. 

Another is to contribute your unwanted jewelry, craft and sewing supplies, fabric, trims and embellishments, clothing, wedding and prom dresses, costume pieces, curtains, blankets, home decorations, and any other items you think might be useful to me. I don't care if it's broken, ripped, or out of style! Do you have a 10x10 canopy you're not using? Something that will make a good display piece? Adjustable dress forms, portable washing machine, sewing machine, or other equipment? If you live within a 2-3 hours drive of Hillsborough, NH I can arrange to pick things up. Otherwise, talk to me about arrangements for shipping.

You can also check out the products I currently have for sale in my Etsy shop. Feel free to pin the stuff you like on Pinterest or share it on Facebook or Twitter! Also check out my website, like my Facebook page, follow me on Twitter and Pinterest, and subscribe to my blog.

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for taking a look at my campaign, and thank you for your contribution (monetary or otherwise).  I very much appreciate it!
story_txt:
Redoubled:
(adjective) become much greater in intensity or size or amount.  
Rewondered is expanding, offering new product lines and custom order services.  I am very excited about all the new products I will be introducing over the course of this campaign, and in the future.  Funds raised will support purchasing more supplies to make more samples and products for sale, as well as to make the items claimed through the rewards offered here, and for packaging, listing fees, and other costs associated with making and selling my products.  
I will be listing five new items in my Etsy shop for each day for 50 days (my Five X Fifty promotion, see the updates tab for links to my blog posts), so I am redoubling my efforts to raise funds, create new products, and get them available to my customers.
