story:
"Edufii is big on a talent level, a performance level and health level."

~ Dr. Rex Stevens, ESPN Radio Host / Co-Owner SLO Wellness

35 Accounts Donated So Far!

Contribute $95 and... 

  • DONATE a one-year Edufii account
  • Receive a 90-day Free Edufii trial!
  • Everybody wins.

 

All athletes deserve their own TrainingSpace to become their best. That’s why we’ve partnered locally with THE FIRST TEE here on the beautiful Central Coast of California.

The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to provide these athletes with Edufii at no cost as we launch... right here in our local community. Contribute today to train smarter and improve faster with Edufii... all while helping others live out their dreams.

Join the Edufii Generation today!

Contribute Now ▶
 

What is Edufii?

Edufii is a skill development network for Coaches, Athletes and their support teams (ie. Parents). A virtual classroom or what we call a TrainingSpace makes the development process richer and more productive during in-person lessons, and most importantly, when apart.

WATCH: ESPN interview with CEO / Co-Founder Spencer Dennis

 

Because great Athletes aren’t just made at the course, on the field or in the gym... your TrainingSpace now goes with you. Edufii has your back.

  • Mobile - Conencted to WHO and WHAT matters most
  • Social - Athletes, Coaches and Parents celebrate Milestones together
  • Cloud - Your TrainingSpace is secure and accessible; anytime, anwhere

Make the most of your coaches.

Quickly and simply capture (video, picture, audio, text) & catalogue swings, drills, lesson recaps etc. anytime, anywhere. The right information for improvement is now easily accessible for review and collaboration all in one place. With Edufii, your TrainingSpace and your evolution goes with you.

  • Capture - technique, drills, session recaps & milestones
  • Training - rich media, notes and “Coaches” all in one place
  • Connected - even when you're not with your “Coaches"
  • Accountability - one click practice remind & review system
  • Progress - track and visualize; see how far you’ve come
  • Celebrate - re-live Milestones; share with friends and family

Edufii is like having your coaches at your fingertips; accessible from your phone, tablet or any browser.


Check out the Edufii sneak peak.

With your contribution, we will revolutionize collaboration, learning and growth potential in athletics and beyond!

Contribute Now ▶
 

The Forgetting Curve

Have you ever taken golf, baseball, tennis or other lessons hoping to improve your game? How about personal training, physical therapy or sports psychology? Perhaps you’ve paid for private instruction or training for your kid(s)?

What if you could access and reflect on everything you’ve ever learned?

According to the "Forgetting Curve" on average we immediately forget 40% of what we learn... and without review, we lose 70-80% by weeks end. Given todays technology, we believe this is unacceptable... which is why we created Edufii.

 
 

"I used to spend one-hour per week with my players in private lessons... now with Edufii, it's like I'm with them 7 days a week."

~ Adam Melhuse, Former MLB Catcher & Private Baseball Coach
 
 

Athletes are made.


 

Your TrainingSpace is where it all happens

At the course, in the gym, at home and everywhere in-between, your TrainingSpace goes with you. It even reminds you and helps you stay on track with your training goals.

 
 

"The TrainingSpace means comprehensive care."

~ Dr. Rex Stevens, ESPN Radio Host/Co-Owner SLO Wellness

For Coaches by Coaches

"The founders of Edufii have created a solution to an age-old problem."

~ Jim Coles, PGA Teaching Pro / Founder Golf Pro Marathons

Keep doing what you do best...better

TrainingSpaces connect you with your Athletes, Sports Parents and other coaches to build better athletes faster. Edufii uses Mobile, Social & Cloud technology to power your business.

Ideal for:

  • Private Coaches & Team Coaches
  • Fitness Trainers & Physical Therapists
  • Mental Trainers & Sports Psychologists
  • And much more...

Instantly Create TrainingSpaces for your Athletes:

  • Organize - per-client video, picture and training notes organizational tool
  • Save Time - minimize out of session work
  • Maximize effectiveness - your athletes and coaches are all-in-one place
  • Accountability - one-click practice & review reminder system
  • Social media - automatically generate new leads for your business
  • Retention - highlight your client success stories

Edufii is your assistant coach and full-time marketing engine.

 
 

Parents are coaches too 

Be Cool. Be Your Kids Competitive Edge.

From the office, at home or on the road be connected to your child's TrainingSpace, all in real-time. Make the most of your child's "Coaches," see what your child is learning and celebrate their progress every step of the way. Edufii is fun... and, your kids will love you for it.

 
 

"When you're paying for your kid(s) lessons you want them to learn something, as a parent, you need to know what they're learning so you can reinforce it."

~ Rob McKee, Golf Dad

Imagine:

  • more quality-time while your athlete grows
  • staying Connected to what matters most
  • being a better Coach

Sports today are ultra-competitive; especially for our kids. Our superstar Athletes of tomorrow need a new competitive edge today.

 
 

Open API

Long-term Edufii plans to connect you to everything it takes to improve. Have a favorite Run Tracker? Plug it in. Have a favorite Stat Tracker? Plug it in. The possibilities are infinite.


 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just cant make a contribution right now, thats ok...

  • Please help us get the word out and spread this campaign. Send this campaign to all your friends, family and any one else you think would benefit from this. 
  • Be sure to use the share tools right under the video. Its really easy. 
  • Our intitial goal is to outfit our local chapters, but we can't wait for the opportunity to help other regions join the Edufii generation as well! Please spread the word!

The First Tee and Edufii thank you for all your help and contributions. 

Contribute Now ▶

Please help us get the word out and spread this campaign. Send this campaign to all your friends, family and any one else you think would benefit from this. 
Be sure to use the share tools right under the video. Its really easy. 
Our intitial goal is to outfit our local chapters, but we can't wait for the opportunity to help other regions join the Edufii generation as well! Please spread the word!



The First Tee and Edufii thank you for all your help and contributions.

story:
What is Lift 23?

Lift 23 is a premium ski/snow sock company with a social mission. 

Our product: 

The perfect ski/snowboard sock.  We have refined multiple prototypes over the past 5 years based on feedback from avid snow sport enthusiasts and now bring to you a sock with the optimal thickness and make up for achieving performance, comfort, and warmth. Made from the finest Merino wool, the Lift 23 sock is durable, form-fitting, and will keep your feet warm. 

UPDATE:

These socks are super comfy! I haven't gotten my new free ride boots in yet so I used my wicked stiff and tight race boots this weekend at A-Basin. The socks were quite thick for that style boot but they will certainly be optimal for my loose fit park and pow boots. All and all, these socks are killer and chicks dig them on campus! - Tanner Mottau (Former NCAA U of Colorado Ski Team member)

Please click on: Our latest testimonial posted on a blog 10/6/2014 

And here is another testimonial from a beta-testing family: 

"Skiing as a family is our favorite vacation.. Only one recurring argument.. Who claims the socks!! The most comfortable socks for skiing, riding, or simply lounging around. We want more!!" – T. Moret

Our social mission:  

Derived from the Tom's Shoes "one for one" business model, Lift 23 will donate a pair of socks to a homeless child for every pair of ski/snow socks it sells so that we and you can share the warmth.   Lift 23 designed the donated socks in collaboration with the NYC Department of Homeless Services, and together we will distribute them to children living in NYC homeless shelters.  

Our name:

We derived our name from the company's first mission--to lift the spirits of the 23,000 homeless children living in New York City shelters by giving each of them  a brand new pair of Lift 23-designed socks.


Our partner:

"The Department of Homeless Services is excited to work with Lift 23. Most people don’t think to donate socks, even though they are a basic necessity for all of us, especially in the fall and winter months. Your donation will fill a need, and remind our children that we all care about their well-being.”  ." - Heidi Schmidt (DHS Public Affairs Manager)

Lift 23's Founder:

I'm Ed, the guy sitting on the tree in the picture below.  I am a 43 year old father of 2 young daughters, a pretty decent husband, a business owner, and an entrepreneur. I love the outdoors and years ago developed a prototype for a ski/snow sock, but did not pursue developing a business to sell them. 


While thinking over the past year about my next business venture, two things happened--I decided that I wanted my next venture to have social value and, many of the people to whom I had given my sock prototype told me that it was their favorite ski sock and wanted more.  It was my "Reese's moment" and the Lift 23 concept was born.  


Campaign Goals:

To raise the funds needed to purchase our first run of socks so that:

  • you get awesome socks that you won't want to take off
  • you and your friends don't fight over the socks--they can get some too
  • Lift 23 can donate a significant number of pairs of socks (a number equal to the number bought) to the 23,000 homeless kids in NYC shelters 
  • together we can lift the spirits of homeless children not just through socks, but through "Sock Drop" events  with Department of Homeless Services, such as bowling outings, to show them that we care about more than their feet
  • together we can help raise awareness of the magnitude of the homeless children epidemic and Lift 23's mission


What We Need & What You Get
We need your help!
  • Your pledge at any level will have a dramatic effect not only on your feet, but in helping us to reach our goal of uplifting 23,000 kids who face adversity every day.  
  • You get socks (at a discount) and/or other cool stuff in return for your contributions --see the perks to the right-->  (and FAQs below regarding choosing sizes)
  • Regardless of whether you contribute financially, you can help the campaign tremendously by spreading the word about it to friends who might be interested in the Lift 23 sock and its mission
Facebook Twitter Website

FAQs

What sizes do Lift 23's socks come in?  How do I know my size?

Based on feedback we received from snow sport specialty stores, Lift 23's socks will be unisex, and our first run will come in 3 different adult size, listed below.  Each size indicates the shoe sizes it corresponds to for both men and women.  

Large: Black/Charcoal with white logo

Men's: 8.5 - 11.5   Women's: 10+ 


Medium: Black/Charcoal with electric pink logo

Men's: 6 - 8   Women's: 7 - 9.5


Small: Black/Charcoal with electric green logo

Men's 3 - 5.5  Women's: 4 - 6.5  

 

How do I choose my sock and other apparel sizes?

At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page where you can choose the sizes you want.

When will I get my socks?

You will have them before the ski season starts (and before you need to start wrapping them as your holiday gift for each member of your family).  

My kids are avid skiers and boarders and will be jealous of my socks.  Will Lift 23 offer children sized socks?
We want to!  Hopefully we will surpass our reach goal, which will allow us to immediately begin ordering production of our socks in children sizes.

What are you going to do with the money you raise?

Once we reach our campaign goal, we'll make your ski/snow socks and ship them to you ASAP, as well as make and deliver the donated socks to the children in homeless shelters in NYC.  We will, of course, also deliver on any perk chosen, such as the Sock Drop bowling events.  Any additional funds raised will go towards continued production and expansion of our current ski/snow sock line to include new sizes, and getting us closer to fulfilling our first social mission goal of providing socks to each child in the homeless shelters in NYC.  Depending on the level of support, we may even be able to expand our mission to other cites, sharing the warmth with kids all over the country, as well as adapt our ski/snow socks for other athletic pursuits.  Be sure to regularly check out our website Lift23.com and watch how we put your support to good use.  

You socks sound and look great, but you won't find me on the slopes in the wintertime.  Can I wear them elsewhere?  

Of course!  Once you put our socks on your feet, you won't want to take them off. Regardless of whether you ski or board, you will want to wear these socks for comfort and warmth in your everyday activities.  Not to mention that they look pretty cool too.  

Do you ship internationally? 

Yes! Recently reduced!!

Add $5 to your order for international shipping.

What are these "Sock Drops" mentioned in your perks?  

We hope to raise enough funds so that Lift 23 can host, in conjunction with the Department of Homless Services, outings for the homeless children in NYC.  The idea is that Lift 23 and its sponsors (and guests) will not only deliver socks, but also participate in a fun activity with the kids (and their socks).  Our first idea is to take a few dozen kids to a bowling outing, which we hope to hold quarterly. The Sock Drop Sponsor's generous contribution will fund bowling, shoe rentals, and a meal ticket for all of the kids participating.   

What's the deal with the Lift 23 Ski House and the perk that includes it?

Choose a weekend for you and up to 5 guests to enjoy our Lift 23 on-mountain ski house at Killington, VT.  Select this perk and you and each of your guests will receive 2 pairs of Lift 23 ski/snow socks and lift tickets for both Saturday and Sunday.  After a day on the slopes, you will be able to return to the house and relax in the hot tub and sauna. Lift 23 will also donate 100 pairs of socks to our mission and you will be recognized on our website and campaign follow up as a Platinum contributor. House not available over holiday weekends. Learn more about the house at  Lift 23 ski house details


If you reach your stretch goals, will I be able to choose some children sized ski/snow socks for the socks that come with my perk?  

Definitely.  However, we cannot guarantee the timing for the arrival of kids ski/snow socks. But we can promise that we will work very very hard to try to get them to you as soon as possible, and hopefully before the ski season begins.
story_txt:
What is Lift 23?
Lift 23 is a premium ski/snow sock company with a social mission. 
Our product: 
The perfect ski/snowboard sock.  We have refined multiple prototypes over the past 5 years based on feedback from avid snow sport enthusiasts and now bring to you a sock with the optimal thickness and make up for achieving performance, comfort, and warmth. Made from the finest Merino wool, the Lift 23 sock is durable, form-fitting, and will keep your feet warm. 
UPDATE:
These socks are super comfy! I haven't gotten my new free ride boots in yet so I used my wicked stiff and tight race boots this weekend at A-Basin. The socks were quite thick for that style boot but they will certainly be optimal for my loose fit park and pow boots. All and all, these socks are killer and chicks dig them on campus! - Tanner Mottau (Former NCAA U of Colorado Ski Team member)

Please click on: Our latest testimonial posted on a blog 10/6/2014 


And here is another testimonial from a beta-testing family: 

"Skiing as a family is our favorite vacation.. Only one recurring argument.. Who claims the socks!! The most comfortable socks for skiing, riding, or simply lounging around. We want more!!" – T. Moret
Our social mission:  

Derived from the Tom's Shoes "one for one" business model, Lift 23 will donate a pair of socks to a homeless child for every pair of ski/snow socks it sells so that we and you can share the warmth.   Lift 23 designed the donated socks in collaboration with the NYC Department of Homeless Services, and together we will distribute them to children living in NYC homeless shelters.  

Our name:
We derived our name from the company's first mission--to lift the spirits of the 23,000 homeless children living in New York City shelters by giving each of them  a brand new pair of Lift 23-designed socks.




Our partner:

"The Department of Homeless Services is excited to work with Lift 23. Most people don’t think to donate socks, even though they are a basic necessity for all of us, especially in the fall and winter months. Your donation will fill a need, and remind our children that we all care about their well-being.”  ." - Heidi Schmidt (DHS Public Affairs Manager)
Lift 23's Founder:
I'm Ed, the guy sitting on the tree in the picture below.  I am a 43 year old father of 2 young daughters, a pretty decent husband, a business owner, and an entrepreneur. I love the outdoors and years ago developed a prototype for a ski/snow sock, but did not pursue developing a business to sell them. 



While thinking over the past year about my next business venture, two things happened--I decided that I wanted my next venture to have social value and, many of the people to whom I had given my sock prototype told me that it was their favorite ski sock and wanted more.  It was my "Reese's moment" and the Lift 23 concept was born.  


Campaign Goals:
To raise the funds needed to purchase our first run of socks so that:

you get awesome socks that you won't want to take off
you and your friends don't fight over the socks--they can get some too
Lift 23 can donate a significant number of pairs of socks (a number equal to the number bought) to the 23,000 homeless kids in NYC shelters 

together we can lift the spirits of homeless children not just through socks, but through "Sock Drop" events  with Department of Homeless Services, such as bowling outings, to show them that we care about more than their feet
together we can help raise awareness of the magnitude of the homeless children epidemic and Lift 23's mission



What We Need & What You Get


We need your help!


Your pledge at any level will have a dramatic effect not only on your feet, but in helping us to reach our goal of uplifting 23,000 kids who face adversity every day.  


You get socks (at a discount) and/or other cool stuff in return for your contributions --see the perks to the right-->  (and FAQs below regarding choosing sizes)


Regardless of whether you contribute financially, you can help the campaign tremendously by spreading the word about it to friends who might be interested in the Lift 23 sock and its mission

story:
Short Summary

Raven Roberts. Freelance Wardrobe Stylist.

I'm doing what I love and I need your help. I'm looking to take my business to the next level. I want to buy a mirror-less camera for better photo and video quality. Many of you may know that I take my outfit of the day pictures and post videos on YouTube. These social media strategies are helping me to brand myself. I'm looking to brand myself so that I may partner with brands and expand my styling to bigger clients and avenues. 

What I Need

I'm looking to get the Sony Nex-5T with the following accessories:

  • Tripod - To take photos and video seamlessly without having to commission someone to take them
  • SD Card - So that I can store photos on my camera
  • Case - to protect your investment
  • Warranty plan - to protect your investment
  • Wireless Remote - when using the tripod I can take the photos 
  • Extra Lens - almost free with bundle
  • Total - about $1200
Why the Sony Nex-5T (main reasons)

  • Small and Compact, for a mirror-less camera
  • Wi-fi capabilities to upload pictures straight to my phone 
  • Great video and photo quality
  • Video auto focus
  • Flip Screen
  • Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bTjxBl1fOq0

The Difference

photo quality: my current quality vs a blogger with the Sony Nex 5T


video quality: mine vs another vlogger with the Sony Next 5T



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank You So Much.

xoxo

Raven

story:
“Threadmason offers a highly innovative take on how men will buy their clothes - Cool Hunting

"For almost everybody, the basic off the rack sizes don’t fit perfectly.  Fortunately, the guys at the NYC based startup Threadmason plan to change the game" - Airows

“..create basic shirts that fit guys really, really ridiculously well.” - Techcrunch

“technology revolutionizes the way men's clothing is measured and created.” - PSFK

The Threadmason Approach

We threw out the generic sizing method and built from the ground up t-shirt sizes based on men’s body types and forms. We assembled an all-star team of veteran menswear designers and pattern makers, crunched reams of data on men’s body measurements, and went through countless rounds of prototyping.

The result is 24 proprietary sizes that are based on real guys' body types and guaranteed to fit your individual body better. This represents a revolution in how men’s clothes are made.

Find Your Perfect Fit

Provide us 3 measurements that every guy knows -- your height, weight, and waist size -- and you will be paired with your unique Threadmason size.  We've partnered with technology companies and built fit tools that will allow you to visualize and fine-tune your perfect fit.

Look Great, Own Less

Purchasing a T-shirt, and clothes in general, can be a very careless process. If we bought clothes with more care, we could all look better and own less.

At Threadmason, we want clothes to be a more personal and longer lasting set of possessions. To achieve that, we are bringing a better fit and higher level of quality to men's clothes.

T-shirts are just the beginning.  We'll be taking over the rest of your wardrobe before you know it.

Where We Are Now

Our shirts are already in limited production right here in New York City. The feedback has been outstanding. Every guy has been able to find a perfect fit with Threadmason.

Here's a more detailed example of a before and after for a Threadmason customer. Ben is 6'2'' and has an athletic build. In the past, he always found Medium shirts to be too short, but the right fit in the torso, while large shirts were the right length, but too baggy all around. Now he rocks Threadmason, and he's found the perfect fit!

The Threadmason Shirt - Grown and Sewn in the USA

We use 100% premium USA cotton.  Our shirts are cut and sewn in New York City.  We are able to offer the highest quality t-shirt on the market because we have cut out all middle-men.

We are starting with these 3 colors and will introduce more color and styles options as the business grows.

Timeline

Indiegogo Project Closes: January 1st

Find your Perfect Fit Starting: January 15th. All backers will receive a unique code to find their perfect fit on the Threadmason website, and choose color and style.

Perfect Fitting T-Shirt Production Begins:  February 1st

Expected Delivery: by March 15

story:
Who am I?

I’m Jennifer Todd, though most people know me as Gabby. I am 29 years old and a first year Fashion Design student at University of Cincinnati-School of Design, Art, Architecture, and Planning. I haven’t done anything spectacular or changed the world, but I want to correct that.

I am a lovable goofball with a flair for the dramatic that commonly self identifies as a Diva. I have big dreams, lots of energy and a passion for using fashion to change the world and help make people feel good about themself. My target: Female born, none feminine identified persons-women who don’t follow societal confines of how “a proper lady” should dress, trans males, genderqueer, and androgynous persons.

Gabby and her partner Denys

What do I need?

Education is important:

My education through college was homeschooling and then I got my GED at age 17, and though I have always wanted to be a designer at that point I lacked direction and focus. It didn’t help that I had people in my life who discouraged me from furthering my education. Then at the age of 24 I decided that I wanted to follow my dream of being a designer and started back to school to cover the deficits in my highschool education. After 3 years of general education classes and a 3.7 GPA I moved closer to UC to go to school, and after 2 years got accepted into the Fashion Design program at DAAP.

Why I need school to design clothes:

Being homeschooled didn’t allow me the chance to take art classes, and unfortunately it isn’t something that comes natural to me, but the fact is drawing is an important part of the design process. I also never learned to sew, also a fundamental part of designing clothes. So while I have the passion, creativity and drive to follow my dreams, skills are something I need to learn.

So I got in, now I have to pay:

I have worked hard to get to the school I am in and I am working hard to get the best grades and learn the best skills I can, but money is an issue. I originally started school under the impression that I would be able to get grants and loans, then I found out that there had been a problem with the loans from my previous school that I would have to get worked out before I could get that assistance, and at this point (especially with the government shutdown) it doesn’t look like that will be sorted out in time for me to register and attend classes next semester. I somehow have to come up with the $15,000 to cover my bill for this semester before I can continue on, and because this is a selective program and each semester is a set course if I miss a semester it could be a couple years before I get the opportunity to start classes again.

So what exactly are you planning on designing?

Fashion is psychological:

Fashion is an indicator of how we see ourselves and how we look is the filter through which all of our words and actions are understood by the people we interact with. It is of utmost importance that we feel comfortable with how we are portraying ourselves to the people we meet on a daily basis, to have a safe space in our clothing. For people who fall in the middle of the gender spectrum this is a 

challenge to find things that fit their bodies properly and convey the message of who they are as a person, and my passion lies in trying to correct this.

That is a big task:

It is indeed a big task, one that would overwhelm me if I wasn’t starting at the basics and working through the details with a strong team. The focus of this line is to provide comfort and style for persons born with female bodies who don’t always relate to the feminine image projected by society as a whole. I am going to start at the basics and work from the ground up. I am going to start with boxers, binders, and bras.

The path from here to there:

I am developing a clear plan of steps with my team, one that starts with my education and using the skills as I learn them to develop this line. I want to start with the basics, like undergarments, so that I can build from there.  Then I can expand into better fitting pants, t-shirts, and button downs, and the sky is the limit from there.

Why should I help?

There are several reasons:

There are several reasons you could choose to help

1)  You are someone who could benefit from this line

2)  You value education and progression

3)  You are feeling generous

4)  Simply because you want to

How can I help?

There are several ways to help out

1)  Make a financial contribution

2)  Pass this campaign along

3)  Leave a comment telling me how I could do better

4)  Follow along on Facebook and Twitter

So where exactly is this money going?

Education is the focus:

The priority of this campaign is to cover education costs for this semester, so here is where the money will go, and if anything changes I will upload new graphs of distribution of money, all going to education or development of the line

story:
Our Ocean Sneakers are made out of certified recycled polyester yarns. We use a removable natural latex insole   better for your feet. Moreover, our shoelaces are made from certified organic cotton.

 

 

In 2050 there will be more plastic than fish in the Ocean. Be part of the solution, not of the pollution.

In Our Ocean Sneakers V2 we use better certified raw materials. Our main inner and outer fabric is made from RPET  with GRS ( global recycled standards) and Seaqual certification.

 UPCYCLED MARINE PLASTIC

Our recycled materials give marine waste a second life, and allow us to create a range of fabrics according to season and use. Our oceans are our greatest shared natural resource. Together we can clean, repair and protect them.

By supporting OCEAN TRIBE, you are helping to clean our oceans, support local communities and move society towards a circular economy.

Our aim is to make the best sustainable products with the highest quality. We pick up plastic waste through the collaboration of certain fishermen in the Mediterranean Sea. We select the waste and clean the plastic. Then we make the Recycled polyester fabric called RPET. Finally, we  create our Ocean Sneakers in our Factory in Spain (Elche).

In Our Ocean Sneakers V2 we use better certified raw materials. Our main inner and outer fabric is made from RPET  with GRS ( global recycled standards) and Seaqual.

 

Our factory is a factory with a great family tradition that has been dedicated to the manufacture of sustainable footwear for decades. We are pioneers in the use of recycled materials from the sea, recycled tire soles and materials with low environmental impact.

Despite being a small factory, we have extensive experience and we work each pair of shoes by hand to offer the highest quality. We don't mind spending more time to deliver the best end result.

In order to take care of the environment we have installed photovoltaic self-consumption solar panels from which our factory benefits from solar energy. We try to find and implement the appropriate solutions and thus help to stop the deterioration of our planet.

In this way we drastically reduce the energy consumption necessary for the production of our Ocean Sneakers.

Our new-brand insole is made to stabilize a joint, reduce pain, prevent deformity, provide better positioning, or improve the biomechanical function of the foot. Our Ocean sneakers help relieve  pain and stabilise  your walking imbalances.

 

Our high-quality recycled polyester yarn is high breathable. Moreover are sole made from natural rubber make the Ocean Sneakers ultra breathable and odor less

 

We are Vegan and we are PETA APPROVED

 100% sustainable packing, linen bag for free and no recycled packing to avoid deforestation

 

 

SIZING FOR HIM

SIZING FOR HER

HOW TO SIZE

  1. Take 2-3 of your sneakers
  2. Find the CM of those sneakers
  3. Check our size chart considering the CM, choose your size and enjoy your Ocean Sneakers!

HOW TO BUY

1. SELECT YOUR PERK

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page.

2. PAYMENT

Enter your payment information. 

3. COLOR AND SIZE INFORMATION

You can choose your color and your size and we deliver it to you. We will provide to you a tracking number so you will know where your sneakers are whenever you want

We will ship your OCEAN SNEAKERS worldwide via trackable post providing eco-friendly shipping solutions. Please note that you may be 100% responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

7

story:
OUR STORY

 

 

Hello! We’re Roman and Jenn, the team behind Linjer. We're a Norwegian/Canadian pair united by a passion for design and an obsession with vegetable-tanned leather.

We're proudly bootstrapped entrepreneurs and we owe it to our fantastic community of crowdfunding backers. We can't thank you enough!

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at hello@linjer.co. We would love to hear from you!

Thank you!

 

LEATHER 101

 

We use only the best vegetable-tanned, full-grain aniline leather.
We're quite sure you'll love it.

 

"VEGETABLE-TANNED"
Vegetable tanning is the traditional tanning method refined by the Spanish, Italians and French during the Renaissance. Today it makes up only 10% of leather produced. Unaided by potent chemicals, vegetable tanning takes much longer than chrome tanning (several weeks/months vs a day). As a result, it can be more expensive…but it’s worth it. Vegetable-tanned leather looks natural, smells sweet and develops a unique patina over time.

 

"FULL-GRAIN"
The top surface of a hide, or the grain, is the strongest part of the hide. "Full-grain" means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections. It is much longer-lasting and durable than top-grain leather (which has been buffed or sanded) or split-grain leather (which doesn't have any grain at all). Top-grain leather is more prevalent on the market because it's cheaper to buy low-quality leather and buff off the defects than to buy quality hides.

 

"ANILINE"
...indicates that the leather has been dyed the whole way through. Pigmented leather, in contrast, has a coat of paint sprayed on top and is cheaper to make. Aniline leather looks a lot more natural.

 

Read more about our leather on our website. 

 

www.linjer.co

 

                   

 

 

Paypal disclaimer:

“Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.”

story:
INTRODUCING STUDLACES
 

 

Shoelaces. Nothing special has come along in that department for decades until, all of a sudden, we were treated to the innovation of elastic laces. “No-tie” solutions based on elastics solved the everyday problems of laces coming undone, stray laces getting dirty, long unsightly ribbons, and having to tie and untie them every time. What we don’t have yet, is a way to truly personalize your shoes.

 

 

The ton of shoe designs out there make it clear that your choice of footwear is a personal statement. So how do you express personality and character in a quick and convenient way?

 

StudLace lets you customize your look from simple to striking in seconds.

 

Our patent pending stud system allows you to securely and comfortably set your laces so that you never have to worry about tying laces again.

The StudLace formula is simple: high quality elastic laces + metal studs. If you’ve used no-tie laces before you’ll be familiar with the setup and feel of elastic laces. But StudLaces end with a metal alloy stud that can be easily swapped out. And endless potential for colors, finishes, and designs, means endless personalization.

 

*Click any of above to see a high resolution gallery.

 

OPTIONS

 

STUDS

 

 

ELASTIC LACES

 

At launch we are offering 16 colors/finishes and 8 colors of laces for 128 starting combinations. But as we progress through the campaign, you'll be able to unlock more color and design options through stretch goals.

We’ve got an exciting schedule of future Stud releases that include more than just different colors and finishes. From emblems to different shapes, and even limited editions, the possibilities are endless! And the best part is, we want you to get involved in choosing our future designs!

Our decisions on colors and designs will be heavily influenced by your feedback, surveys, and votes. You can participate by visiting our Facebook page, or taking part in our surveys for a chance to choose our next color/design or even win free StudLaces! Keep checking back for updates where we'll post all these events and stretch goals!

 

JOURNEY

Even though shoelaces seem pretty straightforward, creating the StudLace system wasn’t as easy as we thought. We didn’t just build upon existing no-tie laces, we started from scratch. 
Here’s why:

 

Laces

 

In our search for the best quality elastic laces, we found that all the elastic laces on the market just weren’t up to the standard we wanted. In the end, we decided to design our own laces from scratch. We flew to China and after several trials, we found a factory that could make what we designed. This cost us more than simply choosing from existing options, but we needed to meet a certain aesthetic as well as durability and elasticity. StudLace isn’t simply for utility, it’s a fashion statement, and the laces needed to reflect that. The result is an elastic lace that has the thickness and feel of regular woven laces, yet is embedded with 7 elastics as opposed to the 5 or 6  found in current elastic laces on the market. We even made sure that the elastics are color matched so that the elastics aren't apparent when the laces stretch or flex.

 

Studs

 

It was a similar process when it came to the studs. After weeks of searching, we found a factory that could manufacture according to our exacting standards for feel and usability. Our alloy studs were designed to work like buttons but the most important detail was easy one-handed operation. This required designing the resistance of the stud to a specific tolerance and the attention to detail on the stud shape and height is something we are very proud of.

 

RISKS & REWARDS

We are committed to bringing you endless choice in your pursuit of convenience and personalization. What's more, we're not raising funds to develop our product, we’ve already got our manufacturing and logistics bases covered, all we need is your help to continuously commission new stud designs! Our factory is already hard at work pumping out our first batches.

 


 

 

Grab StudLaces at exclusive prices (up to 50%!) only on IndieGoGo before they go out to retail channels and be the first ones to hit the streets with your personalized shoes!

story:
Our Story

 

Tordney is a creative process as much as it is a self-discovery journey. It all started on a tranquil night when we could hear the watch ticking and feel our heart beating. Living in a fast-paced city, our heartbeat is easily forgotten. The ticking of a watch is muted by constant stimulation in a hectic world; where city lights outshine the stars. Sometimes we simply lose sight of the bright and beautiful things around us, the blue sky, blooming flowers, singing birds, smile of loved ones, and your breathe.

We hope to create a brand that becomes a reminder of the small wonders in life. Tordney timepiece is our first project. It would be our pleasure to share the lessons learned as startup, as well as precious discoveries made along the way.

The Design

 

Dual - time represented by stick and numeric indices for a minimal design.

Mono - hour, minute, second represented by stick indices to create a timeless design.

When distractions are kept to minimal, we are more likely to discover the small wonders in life! Our design is based on this principle. Instead of creating a feature-packed timepiece, we focus on the details. Likewise, we believe time should be mindfully spent rather than rushing from one place to another; meeting one deadline to another. Life is primarily about connecting with yourself, loved ones and the world.

                                                        

The Collection

Note: each model is represented by a number followed by hands (or dial when specified) / strap colour. 

 Product Specifications

Case - diameter 40mm, thickness 9mm, made from anti-corrosion 316L stainless steel 

Case Back - stainless steel screw down 

Sapphire Crystal - anti-reflective coating vapour-desposited to the inside. Highly scratch resistant with Mohs hardness 9 (second to diamond) 

Movement - 1L45 by major Japanese movement producer Miyota, approximately 3 years battery life 

Water Resistance - 5 bar / 5 ATM 

Dial - applied hour marker and printed minute/second track 

Hands - premium diamond cut hands 

Crown - embossed Tordney logo 

Strap - case end: 20mm, buckle end: 18mm, Italian full grain vegetable-tanned leather with matching stiches 

Strap Options - Black, Cognac, Navy 

Buckle - 18mm, stainless steel pin buckle 

                                       

Straps & Sizing

We use vegetable tanned leather because it is more gentle on your skin and the environment. Vegetable-tanning is craftsmanship on its own. Natural patina develops over time to form a unique part of your history. Our straps fit wrists 145mm-190mm.

Why not quick release straps?

We struggled a bit during the development stage since quick release straps are very popular these days. It is easier to change the straps this way. However, when the spring bar in a quick release strap breaks, it is difficult to replace the spring bar without damaging the strap. For straps without quick release, you can simply take the spring bar out and replace it. This way, you’re not doing any harm to the straps. Our straps are made with quality leather and we hope you can keep them longer. :)

Change straps at home

We tested a couple of tools and found this one is easier to use for those not familiar with changing straps. 

This tool has a thinner bent fork end that allows you to easily slide between lug and strap. The fork gives you better hold of the spring bar shoulder so you can just press downward and release it form the lug hole. To install your new straps, fit one end of the spring bar into its lug hole, press the other end of the spring bar downward with the fork, and slide it into the lug hole. Check carefully that the spring bars clicked into the holes, you don’t want the watch head to fall off while wearing it.    

The other end of the tool, the needle end, is good for watches with drilled lugs. To take the straps off, you poke the needle through the lug hole to release the spring bar. You don’t need this for our current model but it may be handy if you own a watch with drilled lugs.  

If it all sound too complicated, we'll show you in a video later!

 

Production Schedule

Late August: production begins

November: quality control + packaging

Early December: delivery begins

We are blessed with highly supportive suppliers who have over 20 years of experience working with renowned international watch brands. Since the prototyping stage, they have been playing significant roles in our project. Functional prototypes have been made and our production partners are all set. In the case of our first collection, the watch case takes the longest time to produce (approximately 3 months from milling to watch case), followed by dial, strap, hands and crown. Assembly begins as soon as all components pass quality control. Water resistance test and final inspection will also be carried out before a Tordney timepiece rests on your wrist.

 

 

 

 

 

About Us

Tordney was founded by Alex and Winky Sum in 2016. Alongside our entrepreneurial adventure, we are keen to explore the meanings of life. These discoveries are reflected in our creations as a way to connect with others.

We would love to hear from you! Drop us a line at hello@tordney.com or learn more about our brand at tordney.com

Stay in the Loop

Follow us on Facebook or Instagram for the latest update.

Thank You

Family and friends - we are deeply grateful for your never-ending support, patience and honest feedback. 

Kes and his team@KesMoments - their video/photos and professional advice were of great help to us.

Our production partners - this project would not see the light of day without their dedication.

Indiegogo community - we appreciate your interest in our campaign, thank you for checking out our story!

Risks and challenges

Production: There is a chance that suppliers do not deliver components on time. This could be due to production problems or simply because they have overwhelming orders to fulfill. To make sure things are on the right track, we will visit our suppliers on regular basis. In case of unavoidable delay, we shall keep you updated of the cause and possible impact. 

A note on leather straps: colour variations occur as leather is made from natural materials. Varied thickness amongst hides also affects absorption of colour. Please understand your strap colour maybe slightly different from what you see in our prototype pictures.

Shipping: A professional shipping company will handle the logistics on our behalf. We will work closely with them to ensure your timepieces are in safe hands. In some countries, custom clearance may take longer than others and we appreciate your patience.

Note

Free shipping worldwide included. However, backers will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

story: Tired of the minimalist wallets that require you to fold your cash making it super inconvenient to get to the bills you want? We certainly were! So, we set out to design the PERFECT Minimalist Wallet.
story_txt: Tired of the minimalist wallets that require you to fold your cash making it super inconvenient to get to the bills you want? We certainly were! So, we set out to design the PERFECT Minimalist Wallet.

story:
Inspired from the ever-changing weather of the Pacific Northwest, MINIM creates truly dynamic garments that can be comfortably used in the rain, sun, and snow. This is done by using soft, sleek, and waterproof fleece.

 

 

 

 

What Makes MINIM Special?

Our garments are created for hikers, campers, snowboarders, and anyone who encounters the elements.

We use the highest tech fleece in the world to craft pants and hoodies that are not only soft and flexible, but waterproof. The result is clothing that breaks the barriers between comfort and performance, creating gear that can be used whether you're trekking through the woods or relaxing on the couch.

WARNING: Once you put these on, you may never take them off.

 

 

How We Do It

The beauty of our technology is layering. Between our brush resistant face and crazy-soft lining lies a razor thin membrane. This membrane is engineered with micro-pore construction, blocking water from entering while simultaneously allowing restricted amounts of airflow to create breathability.

We believe MINIM will transform the way you think about outerwear. We want you to feel inspired every time you get dressed in the morning. 

 

The Problem In The Clothing Industry:

As a result of fast fashion and over consumption, 80 billion clothing garments are bought each year. With consumers purchasing countless pieces in order to be ready for all situations, it's not wonder why the apparel industry has become the second most pollutant in the world, only behind oil.

How We Can Help:

People will always need clothes, but if we can own less by using garments that are useful in a multitude of situations, we'll be able to drastically cut back on the industry's negative effects on the world. That's why our goal is to produce the most versatile clothing you'll ever own. In addition to this, we plant a tree for every garment sold, cutting back our carbon footprint and promoting reforestation.

This is done by using soft, sleek, and waterproof fleece.    What Makes MINIM Special?Our garments are created for hikers, campers, snowboarders, and anyone who encounters the elements.We use the highest tech fleece in the world to craft pants and hoodies that are not only soft and flexible, but waterproof. The result is clothing that breaks the barriers between comfort and performance, creating gear that can be used whether you're trekking through the woods or relaxing on the couch.WARNING: Once you put these on, you may never take them off.  How We Do ItThe beauty of our technology is layering. story:
Even though there are tons of bags on the market for “Everyday Carry” we didn’t feel there were any bags out there for “Everyday Adventure”. We wanted a bag that could hold all our modern day tech-essentials but also keep up with our active lifestyle. We wanted to create a bag that could be worn as comfortably skating down the boardwalk or riding your bike down massive hills as it could be walking to your local coffee shop.

For most people with active lifestyles a backpack is the only option to carry your stuff. However when you're out all day at things like music festivals or hiking with friends, you necessarily don’t want to carry a massive backpack around as it becomes heavy after a few hours of use.

We wanted to make a bag that was so comfortable it could be worn all day, something that had great functionality but also minimal weight and impact. We created the KP Sling Bag to be extremely form fitting, so much so you might even forget you’re wearing it.


Sling Demo Video


We sent a few prototypes to our favorite YouTube channels for them to review, and here is what they had to say about the KP Sling.

Dimensions: 14"L x 8"W x 5"D (Inches) / 35L x 20W x 13D (CM)

Weight: 12 oz / 0.34 kg 

  • Exterior: 1000D Cordura Nylon & High Quality Vegan Leather
  • Interior: Ripstop Nylon & Multi-Spandex
  • Seatbelt Grade Shoulder Strap
  • Zamak 5 Zinc Alloy Hardwares
  • 3 Separate (Zippered) Storage Areas
  • 8 Unique Compartments
  • Center Padded Area (Perfect for Handheld Electronics)
  • Secret Compartment – Passport Sized
  • Special Sunglasses Pouch
  • YKK Waterproof Zippers
  • 100% Water Resistant
  • Vegan-Friendly
  • Optional Waist-Strap & Removable Shoulder Pad
  • Can be worn over left shoulder OR right shoulder
  • Debossed Minimalist Logo


How many USB flash drives have you lost? With the new KP Paracord USB bracelet, you can keep your projects and files right on your wrist. With 32GB of storage and a 10 foot paracord rope, it’s the ultimate survival bracelet for either getting that project to your client or out on adventures.

  • 32GB USB Flash Drive
  • High Speed USB 2.0 Compatible
  • US Military Type III Grade Paracord
  • Minimum strength 550 lb (single paracord)
  • Unravel to 10 ft / 3 meters
  • Debossed Minimalist Logo

Custom KP black carabiner which you can attach to the hook plate of the KP Sling Bag. Perfect for your keys or pocket tools. It also has a built-in bottle opener and hex driver.

Dimensions: 2.75"H x 1.25"W (Inches) / 6.98H x 3.17W (CM)


Whether you're hanging upside down rock climbing or landing kickflips on your skateboard the optional waist strap keeps your KP Sling Bag in place making it the ultimate adventure bag!

The Secret Compartment

We've designed a passport sized secret compartment somewhere in the Sling to store your important belongings. This compartment is so hidden that it's virtually invisible. We can’t tell you where this pocket is located, because then it wouldn’t be a secret anymore. You’ll have to really look for it to find it when you receive your Sling.


Sling’s exterior fabric is treated with durable water repellent (DWR) finish, which makes Sling water-resistant and stain-resistant.

Final prototype sketch

KEEP PURSUING is a small design start-up based in Los Angeles, CA. Our motto is "Outfitters of the Modern Adventurer" as we strive to create quality bags and gear specifically designed for people who live, work and play in urban environments. We truly love what we do and put that passion into every project/product.

KEEP PURSUING - Facebook

KEEP PURSUING - Instagram

KEEP PURSUING - Twitter

A special thanks to all the people who helped put this project together. Actors: Aaron Rodriquez, Alex Nguyen, Brittany Salsberry, Cedric Williams Jr. and Lexi Flores. Film + Photography Crew: Aaron Salcido, Ben Meredith, Brandon Gonzalez, Carol Kinney, Laura Kinney and Yma Adeze. Special thanks to Stone Yeh, Wendy Yeh and Alex Waidley. We couldn't have done it without your support!

story:
Features

Track Your Backpack Anytime with the Smart GPS Tracker!

 

If you’ve ever lost your backpack, (especially if it was heavily loaded with important documents or precious valuables and your favorite gadgets), you already know how traumatic this experience can be. With Energy Sac you will never have to endure all this again.

Integrating an effective GPS tracking system that you can easily connect to a cell phone app, you’ll be able to monitor the location of your Energy Sac at the push of a button, wherever it may be.

 

Fuel All Your Smart Devices Directly from the Sun!

Designed with your modern, active lifestyle in mind, Energy Sac utilizes 3rd Generation Solar Panel Technology  to power your smart devices and gadgets, no matter where you are.

Being able to channel the abundant energy that is available everywhere around us, Energy Sac will make sure you charge all your devices at lightning speed and are never left stranded without battery again.

Connect 2 Devices At the Same Time and Power Up Your iPhone in Only 2 Hours!

The innovative circuitry design of the Solar Power allows you to power external and internal USB ports at the same time. With a total output of 12 W, 2.1 Amp, which is distributed to both ports, you can easily connect two devices simultaneously.

The 3rd Generation Solar Panel will  be able to  completely charge an iPhone 6S in only 2 hours on a sunny day!

 

Made to Outlast All Your Previous Backpacks

Incorporating a jacquard nylon mesh that makes it nearly indestructible, Energy Sac is significantly more durable than any other conventional backpack and promises to withstand the wear and tear of even rough use, while the lightweight design makes it perfect for wearing, all day long.

As an add-on bonus, Energy Sac also features a sandwich mesh, specially designed to keep your back sweat-free and comfortable at all times.

 

Keep Everything With You – From Secret Documents to Your Energy Drink

All high-tech features aside, Energy Sac is still a backpack and as such, it stays true to its main purpose, which is to offer you supreme portability and storage capacity.

 two large stationary and lifestyle compartments, plus one for your laptop, as well as convenient  pockets for your essentials, you can be sure you have everything with you, everywhere you go.

 

Night Safety

With Energy Sac on your back, you will never again have to worry about driving a bike or ridding a cycle during night. Reflective panels along the contours of the Bag makes you an easy target to spot from a distance

 

Customize Your Energy Sac with the Detachable Solar Panel

The Solar Panel has been gracefully integrated into the Energy Sac, adding a special vibrancy to the overall style and is easily detachable, offering unique versatility, so you can always adjust the look of your backpack, according to your needs.

 

 

 

Easy Grip

Minutest of details is been considered while designing Energy Sac , Easy Grip helps you carry the bag with as much ease, as you carry it on your shoulder.

 

Compartments

Energy Sac majorly comprises of Stationary & Lifestyle Compartment and a Laptop compartment to carry all the essentials.

 

Weather Proof

The SmartPack is also coated with a water-resistant material, which makes it impermeable to weather conditions.

 

USB connectivity:

EnergySac houses a total of Three USB ports with an output of 2.1AMP,the USB port are either powered by the Solar panel or the battery pack for lightning fast charging, that  includes one External USB Port for easy access  and the other USB ports are placed behind the solar panel 

 

 

Innovative SmartCard Holder

Energy Sac allows you to safely store your Travelling or Access Cards in a hidden pocket on the strap of the bag for easy access.

 

Hidden pockets:

Keep your most important documents or valuables safe in the Secret Pocket, conveniently placed in the back, where no one else can have access

 

Key organiser:

Energy Sac also features a key organizer to ensure your keys are safely stored and remain easily accessible every time.

 

Bottle Holder

Stay hydrated all day long and carry your water or energy drink bottle in the special holder, conveniently placed in the side of the bag, making it accessible with one hand.

 

Add On Features

Energy Plug

Energy Sac along with Energy Plug is the perfect combination for people who prefer to be on the move and uses multiple devices,Energy Plug is the most functional cable, which syncs and charges both your Apple and Android devices.It is wrapped in many different material and stitched by skilled craftsmen. The colorful and exquisite style allows a unique touch and personalisation and makes it irresistibly fashionable, with added protective shielding Energy Plug is 10 times more durable than the ordinary cables , With an output of 3.0 Amp it syncs and charges your devices at lightning fast speed and with its both ways USB Port feature you can plug in to any USB port without any hassle

  
 
 
 
Quick Look @ Energy Sac Features
 
 

 
 
Blue Print of Energy Sac

Energy Sac Dimensions

The Major Risks Have Already Been Tackled – Energy Sac Is Ready to Hit the Marketplace

Manufacturing an innovative, superior quality product is easier said than done. Although it all began, like all wonderful and creative ideas, over casual chat, designing the Energy Sac was a huge challenge, as we had to come up with a functional prototype that would be truly groundbreaking, yet highly practical and suitable for everyone, man or woman and for every occasion.

However, our 12  years of experience as traders and brand developers paid back and helped us to source the best products.  With hard work and persistence, we managed to source the highest quality, most reliable materials, especially regarding the Solar Panels, GPS Trackers and Battery Packs and come up with an end product that seamlessly combines unparalleled functionality and fashion.

In other words, the major risks involved in this project have already been tackled. As far as mass production is concerned, we are confident that our already established, strong connections with manufacturers will make challenges easy to handle.

Yet, this is where we need your support.

Support, Invest and Enjoy Unique Rewards!

We are fully ready to make this project real and bring Energy Sac to the marketplace. But in order to succeed, we humbly ask for your help.

With an estimated, flexible funding goal of $20.000, we are in need of your precious support. Support, invest or help spread the word, so that we can make this awesome product available to everyone.

In the meanwhile, check the amazing rewards that we have for you

We have put together some unique offers for very early birds. You won’t see prices like this on it for years to come, so make sure you are the first to get the Energy Sac and make a pledge today!

Special Offers

  • ​Get an Energy Sac + Energy Plug +Smart GPS Tracker with every  $89 pledge – limited to the first 175 offers.
  • ​Get an Energy Sac + Energy Plug +Smart GPS Tracker with a Pledge of  $99 pledge – Unlimited
 

The  D’code Story

It all happened on a casual day over a casual chat ,Two like minded people from a trading background wanted to come out of their traditional way of doing business and do something drastic and innovative and over next few meetings D’code happened and we set to work on  products which are high on technology,design and innovation and after working on many Products and prototypes we came up with EnergySac

                                                             

Team D'code 

 

 

Why Is it a Good Idea to Invest In Energy Sac?

  • Simply, having one backpack for every occasion, is a good enough reason to make Energy Sac yours.
  • Reliable, multi-utility backpack, heavily packed with outstanding features, specially designed for making on the go lifestyle simple and fun.
  • Supreme comfort for busy or active individuals.
  • Unisex style, suitable for everyone.
  • There is nothing like it anywhere in the world.

By supporting creative entrepreneurs, who are determined to make a difference in the world, you will have the chance to become an irreplaceable part of a larger project

The Choice Is Yours. Invest, Support and Make Energy Sac a Reality!

And Remember: There are more ways you can help. Use the Indiegogo tools and spread the word – your help is deeply appreciated

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

1. How much does Energy Sac weigh?

Energy Sac weights 1.9 lbs(850g) thats inclusive of 3rd Generation Solar Panel .

2. Does solar Panel powers both the external and internal Port

  Yes it powers both the  USB Ports

3. How long does it take for the solar panel to charge my phone?

Though the Usage is very subjective,according to our tests we were able to charge an iphone 6s completely in 2hrs on a sunny day

4. When the sun goes down can i still charge my phone with the External USB Port?

Yes you can still use the external USB port while the input port needs to be powered by  any battery pack

5. Is Energy Sac Slash-proof?

The material used in Energy Sac is very strong, but we are not advertising it as slash-proof at this point. 

6. What size of Laptop can fit in Energy Sac? 

The bag is designed to fit anything up to a 15" Laptop. In some cases 17" laptops can also fit as long as the width is not more than 11.4 inches (29.5cm) 

 7. What is the capacity of the bag ? 

The bag's capacity in litres is a little under 22 Litres. This is spread between all the compartments, 

8. Does the perks includes  duties?

No the  perks are exclusive of duties which needs to be borne by the backer

9. How will i get my Energy Sac ?

Please select the perk you want and we will create a follow up survey for details

story:
WHO WE ARE

George, Jen, and Nazareth -- it's a pleasure meeting you :) We are passionate about raising our son in the Christian faith, and him knowing his Bible.

One night as we were dressing Nazareth for bed, he said "imagine if my pajamas had David & Goliath all over them, wouldn't that be cool?". From that moment we knew we had to make it happen.

When we started Holy Pals, we wanted to design products that give children the opportunity to draw near to Christ, and to help parents teach their children about their faith. Another very important part of our mission is to shine a light on child-focused charities in need of support, raising awareness of their worthy causes and supporting them alongside our customers.

We are so excited to announce that we will be collaborating with The Littlest Lamb Orphanage, a privately funded orphanage in Egypt. They have built a home for orphaned and at-risk children who have lost parents to death, imprisonment, or abandonment. The Littlest Lamb provides these children with everything they need to thrive – shelter, food, clothing, education and most importantly A FAMILY that loves them. 

The folks at The Littlest Lamb have inspired us so much with their mission, and we’re excited to support them with every pajama sale we make!

 

Every backer's contribution to our Indiegogo campaign will go towards supporting The Littlest Lamb. Choose from 9 different perks (swipe to see them all!) where you can:

  • Order Now AND 10% of your purchase will go towards sending Holy Pals pajamas to the beautiful children of the Littlest Lamb
  • Pre-order pajamas to be delivered to you for December 2020 (in time for Christmas gifting) AND Holy Pals will ship pajamas, in your name, to the Littlest Lamb
  • Pre-order pajamas to be donated to the Littlest Lamb

 

Once the Indiegogo campaign ends, moving forward, 10% of your purchases made on Holypals.com will go towards sending a fresh pair of cozy pajamas to the children of the Littlest Lamb.

Visit The Littlest Lamb to learn more about the amazing work they do!

ABOUT OUR PAJAMAS

We are launching with three collections:

  1. Noah
  2. Jonah
  3. David & Goliath

These designs are ready to ship NOW and are available in a onesie and a two-piece set. 

When you buy pajamas now for immediate shipment, design & size selection will be fulfilled in the sequence in which orders were submitted. If we cannot fulfill your selection we will contact you directly to review our options. INVENTORY UPDATES -- the following sizes are officially sold out for immediate shipment. To order these options you can do so in the Pre-Order perks:

  • Size 2 , 3, 4, 5 & 6 in Noah
  • Size 6 in David & Goliath Blue
  • Size 3 & 6 in Jonah Pink

 

Our pajamas are snug fitting for a cozy and comfortable wear. The onesies are also equipped with grip footies for those little runners who love being in their pajamas all day long. Holy Pals pajamas are:

  • 100% premium grade cotton, chosen for it's coziness and softness
  • The cotton was knit in such a way to maximize stretchiness and breathability. They are SO comfy!
  • Ribbed cuffs to prevent arms and legs from hiking up while sleeping
  • Ribbed neck collar for long lasting "new pj" look and feel
  • Gripped footies on the onesie
  • Snug fit to meet safety standards
  • True to size
  • Ethically sourced material
  • Ethically produced
  • Made in Bali, Indonesia

 

For PRE-ORDERS, three new designs will be added to our collection for December:

  1. Nativity Classic
  2. Nativity Stripes
  3. Adam & Eve

Here is a peak of the Nativity illustrations (still to be finalized!), drop us a comment and tell us your thoughts!

Nativity Classic

Nativity Stripes

 

OUR BELIEFS

TEACHING OUR CHILDREN: Our purpose at Holy Pals is to make the Bible part of every child's bedtime routine. Have fun with story time before bed and use the pictures on the pajamas to tell the story or even have your child do it! Each pajama has a fun Biblical print and has the passage reference stitched on the sleeve. Look up the passage with your child and memorize where the story is in the Bible. Both you and your child will grow to know the Bible more and more with every wear. 

 

GIVING BACK: Our vision is to shine a light on child-focused charities in need of support, raising awareness of their worthy causes and supporting them alongside our customers.  Every purchase you make will go towards providing new, cozy and comfy pajamas to the children of the Littlest Lamb Orphanage in Egypt. 

They have built a home for orphaned and at-risk children who have lost parents to death, imprisonment, or abandonment. The Littlest Lamb provides these children with everything they need to thrive – shelter, food, clothing, education and most importantly A FAMILY that loves them. 

The folks at The Littlest Lamb have inspired us so much with their mission, and we’re excited to support them with every pajama sale we make!

 

HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS: Our mission at Holy Pals is to produce premium quality, beautifully designed, ethically sourced and produced products. All of our pajamas are 100% premium grade cotton that is soft, breathable and durable.

    RISKS & CHALLENGES

    We have partnered with a trusted Canadian clothing manufacturing company based in Bali that has a private network of ethical-verified sourced high quality manufacturers. We have a dedicated team of local professionals that are managing the entire production for us, from end-to-end. Going through the fabric selection and sample process, reviewing and analyzing every cut, stitch and print, we have full confidence that our manufacture will deliver a great product. 

    Of course, risks always exist! An unforeseen delay in production or shipping could impact our delivery dates. 

    We will be basing our December order based on the demand from our pre-order quantities in this campaign. If the pre-order quantities are below our manufacturer's minimum order quantities, we may have to cancel this particular design and will notify you and give you the opportunity to choose an alternative design or receive a refund.

    You can trust that we will be fully transparent with our backers and will communicate any issues that will arise that could put our product or timelines at risk.

     

    OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

    If you cannot contribute at this time, there are other ways you can help!

    You can help get the word out and forward our campaign to those who you think would be interested in your network
story_txt:
WHO WE ARE
George, Jen, and Nazareth -- it's a pleasure meeting you :) We are passionate about raising our son in the Christian faith, and him knowing his Bible.
One night as we were dressing Nazareth for bed, he said "imagine if my pajamas had David & Goliath all over them, wouldn't that be cool?". From that moment we knew we had to make it happen.
When we started Holy Pals, we wanted to design products that give children the opportunity to draw near to Christ, and to help parents teach their children about their faith. Another very important part of our mission is to shine a light on child-focused charities in need of support, raising awareness of their worthy causes and supporting them alongside our customers.
We are so excited to announce that we will be collaborating with The Littlest Lamb Orphanage, a privately funded orphanage in Egypt. They have built a home for orphaned and at-risk children who have lost parents to death, imprisonment, or abandonment. The Littlest Lamb provides these children with everything they need to thrive – shelter, food, clothing, education and most importantly A FAMILY that loves them. 
The folks at The Littlest Lamb have inspired us so much with their mission, and we’re excited to support them with every pajama sale we make!
 
Every backer's contribution to our Indiegogo campaign will go towards supporting The Littlest Lamb. Choose from 9 different perks (swipe to see them all!) where you can:
Order Now AND 10% of your purchase will go towards sending Holy Pals pajamas to the beautiful children of the Littlest Lamb
Pre-order pajamas to be delivered to you for December 2020 (in time for Christmas gifting) AND Holy Pals will ship pajamas, in your name, to the Littlest Lamb
Pre-order pajamas to be donated to the Littlest Lamb
 
Once the Indiegogo campaign ends, moving forward, 10% of your purchases made on Holypals.com will go towards sending a fresh pair of cozy pajamas to the children of the Littlest Lamb.
Visit The Littlest Lamb to learn more about the amazing work they do!

They have built a home for orphaned and at-risk children who have lost parents to death, imprisonment, or abandonment. The Littlest Lamb provides these children with everything they need to thrive – shelter, food, clothing, education and most importantly A FAMILY that loves them. 
The folks at The Littlest Lamb have inspired us so much with their mission, and we’re excited to support them with every pajama sale we make!

Going through the fabric selection and sample process, reviewing and analyzing every cut, stitch and print, we have full confidence that our manufacture will deliver a great product.

If the pre-order quantities are below our manufacturer's minimum order quantities, we may have to cancel this particular design and will notify you and give you the opportunity to choose an alternative design or receive a refund.

story:
After launching our first watch series last year "The Pocavi Gent Series" we are on Kickstarter this time around to introduce our next watch. What inspired the Pocavi El Presidente watch was a visit to the Smithsonian Museum in Washington DC. We came across a pocket watch which belonged to the 16th President of the United States. Abraham Lincoln. The story behind this iconic pocket watch inspired the birth of the Pocavi El Presidente. Our team then set out to design a timepiece to honor a great American hero.

At the heart of the El Presidente is a 26 jewels Japanese Miyota 9132 Calibre featuring a power reserve complication with over 40-hour power reserve,24-hours sub dial and a date window.

It's beats at 28,800 bph with a super smooth sweeping seconds hand.

This Calibre is fully automatic and your wrist is the power source.

Why not Swiss? Over the years Japanese movement has closed the gap between Swiss movement. The Miyota 9000 series are close competitor of the Swiss ETA 2824 and a movement from Swiss with same complications will increase the price of the watch astronomically which will mean us passing on the cost to you and that is against our business model.

 

Break down of Multi layered dial - El presidente Automatic Watch

 After designing a truly unique Timepiece, we didn't stop there. We pushed  the boundaries a little further by including a pair of matching bracelets to complement each variant of the El Presidente watch.

 After designing the El Presidente, it was hard finding a manufacturing partner who could manufacture the El Presidente to exact same specification. After months of trying different manufacturers and, countless prototypes. We found a manufacturer who for decades have manufacture watches for high end watch companies.

 Products

A lot of passion has been put into creating the El presidente watch and bracelet. This watch is for the man who wants to stand out from the pack. It makes a bold statement " This is who i am"

The El Presidente Bracelet has been designed to complement your watch. It tells people a lot about your personality.

Limited Edition

Each variant of the El Presidente is limited up to 1865 pieces Which is the year of Lincoln death. Any watch manufactured after serial number 1865 WILL NOT be Llimited editionand won't be individually numbered. The earlier you back the chances of you getting the limited edition watch

Front Specification Details of the El presidente Timepiece

Back Specification of the El presidente Timepiece

Close Case Back Specification of the El presidente Timepiece

Specification of the El presidente Bracelet

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

Warranty  

You will be pleased to know that all POCAVI watches come with a 5 years limited international warranty. Yes, we more than double industry standard to give our customer the ease of mind when purchasing a timepiece.  

After creating a great timepiece, here's what comes next! Verification. How do you verify a watch that has already been designed to perfection from replica’s? After months of test running different methods to verify the authenticity of a timepiece. We introduce to you P.I.N “ PIECE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER” The piece identification number is a series of alphanumeric number which allow customers to go on our website and verify the authenticity of the watch purchased.  

Each PIN number is tied to a serial number, which is printed on the back of the warranty card All you have to do is go online on our website and click verify. Enter the PIN Number on the back of your Warranty card. If it is a genuine watch, and truly made by POCAVI it will display your watch serial number, picture image of your watch model, valid purchase date, and Warranty information. We did not just stop there; we also integrated a system where previous owner can transfer their timepiece to a new owner, just like a CarFax . I told you it isn’t a smartwatch but an HEIRLOOM. It can be passed on to the next generation.

The El Presidente comes in a lacquered piano wood watch box.

Quotes

"Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." - Abraham Lincoln/Quotes
