story:
My name is Serafina Medina and this is my sister Kaityln Stamper.

I am a 19 year old aspiring artist who sings, acts and cosplays. I wish to become an illustrator or a comic book artist. I've been drawing for years now and I've acquired a taste of expression and color tones. I draw fantasy based drawings like whales with crowns, human like animals, magical warriors and spirits. I recently made a comic called "Babyskin Late Night City Fight" and it's a promotional comic for my later works having to do with Babyskin-an original character drawn by me. 



My sister is 12 and like me she likes drawing but she enjoys making things more like bracelets and crafts.  She sings and likes being in theater productions. On her free time she reads and watches videos on making more crafts.  She's awesome and in many aspects I look up to her


As of late I received a letter from Miss Teen Oakland saying I was eligible to participate for a Beauty Pageant Audition. I was very surprised as to how I got this letter but I tried it out anyways bringing my sister along for fun. We both auditioned and the following week we both got our acceptance letter congratulating us on getting passed auditions. This was now something we had to take a little bit more seriously. After finding out we got in the pageant we had to also raise sponsors. We had to somehow achieve $1,000 for the both of us. Though this sponsor money covers everything that we will need for this pageant.

My sister and I will be competing, for our share of thousands of dollars in prizes and specialty gifts that will be distributed to contestants. We will be competing in the Miss Teen ivision, one of four divisions that will have young ladies ages of 7 and 19 competing in modeling routines, which include casual wear and formal wear. Most important, we will display our personalities and interviewing skills while interviewing with this year's Oakland/San Jose judging panel. Personality is the number one aspect that each contestant is judged on during all phases of competition.

If we were to win the title of Miss Teen Oakland/San Jose, she would represent Oakland/San Jose and the surrounding communities at the National Competition that will take place in Orlando, Florida. Over $30,000.00 in prizes and awards will be presented at the National Competition while each winner enjoys this expense paid trip of five nights and six days in Orlando, Florida.

Community businesses, organizations, and private individuals will assist us in participating in this year's competition by becoming an official sponsor to her. Through sponsorship, each contestant receives all the necessary training, rehearsals, and financial support which will allow us to become  very confident and well-prepared contestants in this year's Oakland/San Jose Pageant.

We both would be deeply blessed and grateful if you could help support us in this very exciting time for us.

We need to raise $1,000 together ($500 for both of us) for us to participate.

All the sponsor money will go towards our participation.

If you participate and contribute sponsor money for our cause you will receive perks!

You could receive:

If you sponsor us and contribute $10 for our cause you shall receive a thank you card from the both of us and an illustrated print for your support! If you contribute $20 for our cause you will receive a comic book created by Serafina Medina called "Babyskin in Late Night City Fight" created in 2013. And a thank you letter from us! If you contribute $30 you will receive both $10 and $20 perk and a special commission (you get to decide what drawing/illustration you want and we will draw it for you ) 11x17 print and sticker sheet of Babyskin (Serafina's original characters). If you contribute $40 you will receive a  Babyskin Poster of the Cover of "Late Night City Fight" along with the 3rd perk! If you contribute $50 you shall receive everything! All the perks.! All of them!And a hand written letter from us tell you our experience and how you've helped us.You will also recieve a sneak peek of the next comic Serafina Medina is making before it is finalized.You will also be in the Recognition video. At the end of this exciting journey we will post a video of our experiences and anyone who has contributed $35 or more.

^-- This is a few of the pages from "Babyskin Late Night City Fight". It's about a 20 page comic that will include art for the comic in the back.

And if you can't make contribution, that doesn't mean you can't help, spreading the word helps us just as much.

We are in this pageant to show all of who we are to our audience. We want to show young ladies that you can feminine and masculine and still act upon what you do with grace. You can be strong and independent on one hand and intelligent and gentle on the other. We wish to show young ladies that they are beautiful just being who they are and staying true to themselves. So many people go through their lives doubting themselves and their ability to try, but if you believe in yourself, you can carry yourself in elegance effortlessly. And I, Serafina, personally show that in my illustrations. Though now I get the precious opportunity to show you in person.

Thank you so much for your time and your consideration.

- Serafina Y. Medina & Kaitlyn M. Stamper.

story:
A while back, I was having a great time at a pool party, when I suddenly realized that I didn’t want to take off my cover up. My bathing suit bottom was creeping up in the front, creating embarrassing ridges. A quick glance around confirmed that I was not the only one who should be worried about this problem.

So I came up with a solution. The She Shell is a flexible, disposable, sweat- and water- proof insert for women’s clothing that prevents ridges in the front, upper-inseam area in tight fitting garments (that's right, cameltoe!).

The opportunities for women to wear this are everywhere: yoga pants, bathing suit bottoms, leggings, cheer uniforms, gymnast costumes, ballet leotards….anything a woman wears that might be snug or “climbing”.

So far I filed a patent, created a logo, designed packaging, put up a website, and ordered all the packing and shipping supplies.

Now it's time to get the word out there. I am raising funds to exhibit at the 2012 Swim Collective Show. I will have the opportunity to speak directly with hundreds of buyers about this game-changing product, and get it into stores all over the country.

So back the She Shell, and help me spread the word and help women find out how they can feel their comfortable, confident best in any outfit. And not be the butt of any jokes about camels!

Thank you!

story:
What's this all about?

I already carry LGBT, Trans, Bisexual, Lesbian (both the 7-shade pink and the new orange-pink variant), Pansexual, Asexual and Non-Binary Pride Fist pins. I also have two pins in the production stages - POC LGBT Pride and the original Gilbert Baker LGBT flag! Help me reach everyone else.

  • My name is Erik, I'm a soon-to-be 26 year old  gay transgender man living in England. I had an idea a little over two years ago to open an LGBT+ focused clothing and accessories brand and I've not stopped since! Abprallen was born and has continued to grow, providing the community I share in with everything I hoped to deliver and more! 
  • As Abprallen has grown and reached more and more people across the globe I've been able to help people within the community wear their pride in the form of tshirts, pins, patches and badges. I've also had a number of mugs, flags,  bags, prints, and stickers too! With my growing reach and the expanding range of Pride Fist flags I've seen more and more people asking for more specific (but equally important) flags to be represented
  • By creating this campaign I'm humbly asking you to help me bring the Pride Fist Flags to a whole range of identities I haven't yet been able to cover due to a lack of money.

What I Need & What You Get

  • I want to make the following pins:
    Agender, Aromantic, Bear, Bigender, Demiboy, Demigirl, Demisexual, Gay Male, Genderfluid, Genderqueer, Intersex, Lesbian Labrys, Omnisexual, Polysexual, and Progress Pride
  • Your support is vital to this campaign and its goals being fulfilled! 
  • Depending on which Perk you choose, you'll be getting either one pin or several! So if you've always wanted me to carry a specific Pride Fist pin then now you can get one! The pins retail for £8 each, but this campaign has them at just £5! So £20 will get you 4 pins which would usually cost you £32. You spend less money, and get the pin you've been waiting for!
  • In the sad event that I don't make my whole goal, I will use the funds I did raise to produce as many of the pins as I possibly can. Maybe a smaller quantity of each, or maybe a smaller number of designs with the intent of making those designs when I am able.

The Impact

  • For every few comments I get about how much people love my pins, for every message from someone telling me how much they adore their pin, for every photo of a happy customer proudly wearing their pin, I have someone asking me why I don't have their flag. It breaks my heart to tell them I can't afford to produce it, I feel as I'm telling them their identity isn't valid or important. With the success of this campaign I can make that a thing of the past, making my community (and myself) happy!
  • Abrallen started with an Indiegogo campaign! I raised over £500 (the minimum I could raise) to cover the costs of my first items! A t-shirt, two pins, and three button badges. Since then I've grown and grown, being able to produce several T-shirt designs, multiple pins and a bunch of button badges! I've also sold mugs in several designs, iron-on patches, stickers, prints, flags, and tote bags. I was able to go above and beyond what I originally set out to do and it was all because of that initial campaign.
  • Check out my website, Etsy, or Instagram to see my reach and what I've been able to accomplish and produce. 

    The above is some examples of what I've already been able to complete - my Pride Fist pins on backing cards and an example of the Non-Binary pin without a backing card. 

    Here is a mock-up of the Genderfluid pin from the front and the back:

Risks & Challenges

  • I've been producing pins with a reputable pin manufacturer for two years. Has there been issues? Of course! These things happen! But I've been able to work with them to fix these small errors without spending much extra time and can safely say I have a 100% success rate!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I get it, money is hard to come by and hard to want to spend. If you can't afford to contribute then I completely understand and sympathise! 
  • If you aren't able to contribute then you can still help! Share this campaign with your friends, circles, and social media pages. Let everyone hear about this project and help me complete the Pride Fist range!
story_txt:
What's this all about?
I already carry LGBT, Trans, Bisexual, Lesbian (both the 7-shade pink and the new orange-pink variant), Pansexual, Asexual and Non-Binary Pride Fist pins. I also have two pins in the production stages - POC LGBT Pride and the original Gilbert Baker LGBT flag! Help me reach everyone else.

My name is Erik, I'm a soon-to-be 26 year old  gay transgender man living in England. I had an idea a little over two years ago to open an LGBT+ focused clothing and accessories brand and I've not stopped since! Abprallen was born and has continued to grow, providing the community I share in with everything I hoped to deliver and more! 
As Abprallen has grown and reached more and more people across the globe I've been able to help people within the community wear their pride in the form of tshirts, pins, patches and badges. I've also had a number of mugs, flags,  bags, prints, and stickers too! With my growing reach and the expanding range of Pride Fist flags I've seen more and more people asking for more specific (but equally important) flags to be represented
By creating this campaign I'm humbly asking you to help me bring the Pride Fist Flags to a whole range of identities I haven't yet been able to cover due to a lack of money.


What I Need & What You Get


I want to make the following pins:Agender, Aromantic, Bear, Bigender, Demiboy, Demigirl, Demisexual, Gay Male, Genderfluid, Genderqueer, Intersex, Lesbian Labrys, Omnisexual, Polysexual, and Progress Pride
Your support is vital to this campaign and its goals being fulfilled! 
Depending on which Perk you choose, you'll be getting either one pin or several! So if you've always wanted me to carry a specific Pride Fist pin then now you can get one! The pins retail for £8 each, but this campaign has them at just £5! So £20 will get you 4 pins which would usually cost you £32. You spend less money, and get the pin you've been waiting for!
In the sad event that I don't make my whole goal, I will use the funds I did raise to produce as many of the pins as I possibly can. Maybe a smaller quantity of each, or maybe a smaller number of designs with the intent of making those designs when I am able.


The Impact

For every few comments I get about how much people love my pins, for every message from someone telling me how much they adore their pin, for every photo of a happy customer proudly wearing their pin, I have someone asking me why I don't have their flag. It breaks my heart to tell them I can't afford to produce it, I feel as I'm telling them their identity isn't valid or important. With the success of this campaign I can make that a thing of the past, making my community (and myself) happy!
Abrallen started with an Indiegogo campaign! I raised over £500 (the minimum I could raise) to cover the costs of my first items! A t-shirt, two pins, and three button badges. Since then I've grown and grown, being able to produce several T-shirt designs, multiple pins and a bunch of button badges! I've also sold mugs in several designs, iron-on patches, stickers, prints, flags, and tote bags. I was able to go above and beyond what I originally set out to do and it was all because of that initial campaign.
Check out my website, Etsy, or Instagram to see my reach and what I've been able to accomplish and produce. The above is some examples of what I've already been able to complete - my Pride Fist pins on backing cards and an example of the Non-Binary pin without a backing card. Here is a mock-up of the Genderfluid pin from the front and the back:



Risks & Challenges
I've been producing pins with a reputable pin manufacturer for two years. Has there been issues? Of course! These things happen! But I've been able to work with them to fix these small errors without spending much extra time and can safely say I have a 100% success rate!

Other Ways You Can Help

I get it, money is hard to come by and hard to want to spend. If you can't afford to contribute then I completely understand and sympathise! 
If you aren't able to contribute then you can still help! Share this campaign with your friends, circles, and social media pages. Let everyone hear about this project and help me complete the Pride Fist range!

story:
Introduction:

My name is Rian Ismadia and I am the cofounder of Maris Equi. About a year ago, I came to the United States from Indonesia. I earned my degree in business from Universitas Gadjah Mada in Indonesia which included a year of classes at Rijksuniversiteit Groningenin in the Netherlands.

The goal of my Indiegogo campaign is to raise enough money that I can manufacture a large quantity underwear for my new company, Maris Equi. I need quantities large enough that I can get the true economy of scale associated with large volume manufacturing. My first manufacturing run is complete, but it is only 7100 units. 7100 units is not enough to get the best pricing on fabric, waistbands, and labor costs. Money is also needed to step up marketing, develop my web presence, and cover basic business expenses. 

Its important to note, Maris Equi's first manufacturing order is complete and on the way! What I ask of the Indiegogo crowd funding community is to buy out my pilot order before it even arrives. If we can do this, Maris Equi can use that money to make a more substantial underwear buy, benefit from quantity discounts, and have a strong inventory for a proper grand opening of our store on Shopify.

What We Need & What You Get:

The goal of the campaign is to sell out of our first pilot order. If we do sell out, the campaign will raise $71,000. Any amount raised will go right back into the company and go toward a second larger order.

The joy of this campaign is there is no risk to you, the contributor. The product designs are finalized, the products are manufactured, and it is all on the way. The photos you see of our products are all real. The photos are of advance production units.  Nothing is rendered because our products have already been manufactured.

Contributors to our campaign get their choice of underwear or swimwear bundles. We have bundles based on fabric, style, or just go ahead and get one of everything! Our goal is to ship within 30 days. Choose from our Bombacio line if you are looking for fun and fashion. Choose from our Viridi Sport line if you want underwear for your sporting active life. Our Viridi Sport Underwear is made from a 95% Bamboo, 5% Spandex blend. Our bamboo blend fabric is super soft, moisture wicking, and nonabrasive. It is ideal wear during vigorous activity.

Risks and Challenges:

Maris Equi is in the "garage stage" of evolution. We need to grow into a real space, evolve operations, and develop efficient fulfillment procedures. My biggest concern is we risk being overwhelmed in this early stage. As a contributor, our company challenges and concerns are no risk to you. Contributors will receive their products regardless of the challenges Maris Equi faces as a new company, even if I have to stay up all night packing underwear!

Thanks for reviewing my campaign. I hope you like our products. If you do, please share the Maris Equi page with your friends.

story:
90% of all fish in the world are known to ingest plastic. You are snacking on it too as our food comes from rivers and lands that are full of microplastic. Your plastic bag is effectively your dinner, unless you prefer something that tastes better.

So we got pissed off.

And decided to fix it.

The average time you use your plastic bag is 12 minutes. Pretty crazy especially if it takes 1000 years that same bag to break down. We teamed up with the best minds & hands on the planet to create Airbag™ 2.0! (remember us from Kickstarter?!). We are now back with some superb qualities that make the original AirBag™ even better. (How do you find that superman emoji on the keyboard anyone?!)

Meet AirBag™ 2.0

 

What's New

 

 

 

 

Material

Feature Comparison

Perks

Want a larger quantity? Contact us for custom pricing.
Shipping is not included. See the "Shipping" section for details.

Choose Your Colour

Timeline

Design credits

Icons made by Darius Dan, Smashicons, itim2101, photo3idea-studio, smalllikeart, monkik, Good Ware and Freepik from www.flaticon.com; video - Tom Fisk, Taryn Elliott, Cottonbro, Videvo; music - Talib Kweli x J. Cole Type Beat.

Risks and challenges

 

Manufacturing

We have developed dozens of prototypes of AirBag™ and AirBag™ 2.0, both in-house and with several manufacturers based in Asia and Europe. Having been able to compare a diverse range of pros and cons, we have chosen an experienced, reliable, top quality manufacturer based in the EU and we've agreed on all key terms with them such as lead times, minimum order quantities, terms of quality assurance and pricing. We are, however, not dependant on one manufacturer and we have a sound contingency plan. There might be no planet B, but we definitely have Plan B should there be a delay.

Shipping

Our ultimate goal is to ensure that no US and EU based backer pays any import duties, taxes or other charges on top of their pledge. We have found a fulfilment partner who will help us deliver on that goal. Shipping is FREE!

Timing

Our timeline published above includes some leeway for unexpected events.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

AirBag 2.0™ has been designed to last a lifetime. We've intentionally chosen a more expensive manufacturer because we want to be 100% sure that we offer quality to support our claim. We've chosen a special, high-strength and durability material and added ripstop technology to make it significantly less prone to ripping and tearing.

Reusability and recyclability

AirBag™ 2.0 is made from partially recycled material and it is fully recyclable (at least in the EU and UK).

Environmentally friendly factories

We have compared a number of factories in Asia and Europe and the decision is to proceed with a factory in the EU, which meets a number of criteria from carbon offsetting, fair wages, meeting EU environmental standards etc.

Sustainable Distribution

Whenever available, shipping will be carbon neutral (currently we can guarantee this for customers in the EU and we'll be aiming for the same for orders from the USA as a matter of priority). All shipping will be 100% plastic free.

story:
Frida Kahlo Lapel Pin

I chose Frida because she is an icon and has been a huge inspiration to so many female artists. I wanted to make something fun, whimsical and easily accessible that anyone could rock!. 
I thought running a pre-order campaign would be a great way to gauge interest and also get these pins into the hands of those that will love them!

THIS IS A PREORDER SO PINS WILL BE PRODUCED AFTER CAMPAIGN ENDS AND IS FUNDED. Production time is 3-4 weeks. Allow time for shipping. THANK YOU!


1"  soft enamel die cast metal pin with a straight pin back with backing,  The pin will be produced by a third party.  Campaign funds will be used to meet the minimum costs for the production of first run of pins. If 


Favorite Frida Quote
“I used to think I was the strangest person in the world but then I thought there are so many people in the world, there must be someone just like me who feels bizarre and flawed in the same ways I do. I would imagine her, and imagine that she must be out there thinking of me too. Well, I hope that if you are out there and read this and know that, yes, it's true I'm here, and I'm just as strange as you.” 
―  Frida Kahlo 

Do you know someone who's inspired by Frida? 
Please share our campaign with your friends and family through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and through email! 


Want to more more about Axelhoney? 
Follow me on Instagram (@axelhoney) or on Facebook (facebook.com/axelhoney).

story:
See the Gallery for Photos of the Rings!

Short Summary

Tony Nguyen is passionate about Tungsten Rings and has designed an entire new set for couples that can be purchased as matching wedding bands. He would like to expand his rings with this new line. For several yeas he has served the public at his Envy J website and now wants to expand the jewelry line by offering couples rings. 4mm size ring and tungsten mix sterling silver

What We Need & What You Get

 We need $10,000 to expand the ring line with our manufacturer and you get to have a completely newly designed set of Tungsten rings at a great price! These rings have been specially designed by Tony Nguyen and can not be found on other websites. The rings are available in both Men and Women's Sizes. The funds go to creating the rings. YOU WILL GET 2 RINGS PER MODEL

""How to support and get the free gift""

1. pick the ring you want on the right side and enter the information and that it,,,, simple!!
 we will email you right after for all the informaion we need..and add you on our Contributor page with in 2 hour
( http://envyj.com/Contributor )

The Impact

When you give to this campaign and pick the ring that you want, this will give Tony great feedback as to what is popular and how to expand the line. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our link with people who are shopping for Sets, Promise Ring andd wedding bands!

Quick facts about our tungsten carbide rings

  • Our tungsten rings are 100% scratch proof
  • Our tungsten rings will not bend out of shape
  • Our tungsten rings do not contain any cobalt
  • We use nickel binder for all our tungsten rings
  • All tungsten rings are covered by our lifetime warranty against scratches and breakage
  • In case of medical emergencies, our tungsten rings can be removed by medical professionals
  • Our tungsten rings are hypoallergenic

YOU WILL GET 2 RINGS PER MODEL

story:
Hello, my name is Adam Gorny working as a designer during many years. I‘m very orderly person trying to have my things fully organized and safely stored. When my daughter was born at the begining of 2012, my live just changed completely. Alexandra is our sweethearth, but she is also a demolition girl. Our sweet harmony turned to a pure chaos in a minute. After some crash tests of my Galaxy S3 and countless hours of looking for keys and wallets I realized, that some solution needed to be found. So I designed The Valet.



WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?


     After more than half a year of design work and negotiations with suppliers to get the best quality parts in good prices it came to a first batch of prototypes. These several pieces were gone in less than one week due to huge interest of people who know my work and I realized that the Valet is something amazing and it could be a solution for every busy person‘s problems.

     Unfortunately at the moment I’m not able to handle high volume production. I need a solid CNC milling machine to extend my small workplace to be able to increase efficiency, lower costs, while still maintaining the same level of quality. I have also more innovative ideas how to connect beauty of wood with modern interiors, but need some web page to show it. That is where Indiegogo comes in...


WHAT WILL YOU GET?


The Valet is a wall-mounted home organizer made to bring orderliness into your houses.

 

    

Key features


  • made from oak plywood in combination with squares from balsa wood
  • organize your daily essentials such us glasses, mobiles, wallets, tobacco products or caps in one sleek place while taking the appearance of a modern wall clock
  • charging your mobile, so it’s always charged when taking off
  • working with all different connectors and mobiles with or without cases
  • connector locking feature
  • easy installation using wall-mounting accessories

               

 

     The Valet is coming in 3 different versions of squares in order to looks amazing in every kind of interior. First and second are made from painted balsa wood, while third are from real stainless steel.


     There is also a clear version of the Valet available, without any square decorations for those who are prefering simplycity while keeping a great functionality of this product.


     All material used during production of the Valet such us paints, glazes and lacquers are respecting eco-friendly rules and regulations.


                                

Perks


     There are special perks made only for indiegogo campaign contributors. You can get a coasters for your cups or mats for your plates. Design of both perks is inspirated by The Valed shapes and they are also comming with variable colours so you can choose between dark oak or ebony wood.

 

The Valet Coasters

The Valet Mats

Thank You very much for any interest of the Valet!

story: n/a

Where Fashion meets Technology.     
Behind the Seams...

I'm extremely excited to share the CLOAQ w/RadiaShield® cap with you on IndieGoGo!  I have been a television camera operator for 20 years.  My job requires me to use electronic devices and microwave transmitters 10-14 hours daily.  Just like cell phones these microwaves emit harmful EMF(Electromagnetic Fields).  I was experiencing severe headaches, insomnia and some hearing loss from these electronics.  So I decided to develop CLOAQ APPAREL®.  CLOAQ is a revolutionary, cutting edge clothing company bridging the gaps between fashion, protection, & technology.  I am committed to protecting ALL who use electronic and mobile devices from the harmful radiation these devices can emit. 

I have partnered with RadiaShield® Technologies, the makers of BellyArmor®, who have carefully developed and designed an advanced technological fabric that shields Electromagnetic fields(EMF) which many scientists and doctors around the world report could be the cause of some forms of cancer and illnesses. 

RadiaShield® Fabric (Click to see test report)


VIDEO TESTS
Over the past 5 years I have researched, tested and built this amazing prototype.  The craftsmanship of each trim detail & every protective stitch of thread are results of hours and days of thought and careful application.  Every product of CLOAQ APPAREL® is meticulously planned and expertly executed to achieve maximum protection to its user. Our durable, quality caps have RadiaShield® Fabric invisibly embedded inside.  You won’t notice you are being protected.  You have been “CLOAQ’d”. 

My initial goal was to protect myself and my coworkers from the harmful radiation we were being exposed to daily.  But in the process I realized that my product could not only be useful for myself but for anyone who uses cell phones and electronics.

Electromagnetic Spectrum


Our CLOAQ APPAREL IndieGoGo project provides you the chance to pre-order the CLOAQ with RadiaShield cap. The funds you pledge will be used to directly fund the completion of this project; purchasing the materials needed to manufacture your hats as well as buy equipment needed to manufacture efficiently and at a large scale.  It will also allow us to produce the apparel at our manufacturing facility minutes from downtown Los Angeles.  With your help in the near future we will offer more colors and also bring you fitted caps, hoodies, underwear & jeans.  We can’t tell you how excited and proud we are to produce a quality "MADE IN THE USA” product.  THANK YOU for taking the time to view our product!  We look forward to getting started!


COMING SOON!!!

story:
BareBands is a first-of-its-kind watch that mixes maximum personalization with maximum comfort. Thanks to our patent-pending process, it couldn’t be easier to mix and match different bands and “shells” to customize a watch that suits your style. Or... We can do it for you. 

Introducing the ND edition BareBands Watch!

Navy and gold with a touch of kelly green, and bands that read "Go Irish!"

For just $2,000 these watches will go into production. So round up a few friends and spread the word and these watches will be all yours in time for football season!

The Product

Each watch comes with TWO different color shells. That means you’re buying one watch, but really getting two (for the ND watch, the alternative shell will be a medium grey)! Each order also comes with the same color bands in three different sizes. We've done a lot of testing to make sure these band sizes fit just about every wrist. If you’re still worried, don’t be.We have additional sizes at the ready, and will mail them out immediately in case none of the three included sizes fits just right.  

While customization and color are obviously our calling cards, we haven't sacrificed in the least on quality. Every part of the watch has been rigorously tested and each watch is waterproof to 30m. 

Right now, we have seven core styles of BareBands. You can see them below and more details on our website. (Note that two of our watches are in need of names! If you pledge a donation on our "main campaign", you can vote on what that name will be!)

SUNSET comes with Eggplant and Pink shells, and Yellow Bands.

MAKO comes with Turquoise and Black shells, and Light Gray bands.

MONTAUK comes with Yellow and White shells, and Beige bands.

FAHRENHEIT comes with Warm Gray and Black shells, and Orange bands.

MIAMI comes with White and Glow-in-the-Dark shells, and Pink bands.

comes with Beige and Sand colored shells, and Gum colored bands.

comes with Glossy and Matte Black shells, and Black bands.


More About BareBands

I've been working on BareBands for two years now. It all started one fateful night—the night before I was set to compete in the NYC Triathlon. As luck would have it, my watch band broke just when I needed it most. In a pinch, I grabbed two bright green rubber bands off some broccoli I had in the fridge, attached them to my watch face, and, voila, I had a watch to compete in. People instantly loved the way the bright color of the bands “popped” but was still subtle. I decided to take this concept and develop the watch for real when it occurred to me that not only could BareBands tap into everyone’s desire to add a little color and self-expression through their accessories, but it could also be a means to support the causes people care about in a unique and functional way. I too was over the engravable, semi-stretchy wristband. Working with my design partner, Rux Design, we’ve built BareBands: the coolest, most customizable watch on the market.

Watch me explain how the watch came to be in a segment I did for Fox Business Network.

Fundraising Platform

If you choose to support BareBands, not only will you be supporting the creation of an awesome, never-before-seen watch, but you’ll also be helping create a new platform for fundraising that benefits from placement on the wrist and adds functionality and fashion in the process. Once we’re fully up and running, we’ll have specific watches dedicated to specific causes. For example, if you buy a pink watch to support the fight against breast cancer, a to-be-determined portion of your watch cost will go to that charity. The same would be true for a blue watch to raise awareness about prostate cancer, and so on. Or, using tools we are planning to integrate into our site with funds from this campaign, you can build your own custom watch to support your own cause/community/team. 

Or, maybe you just want to pick the coolest watch you can find. No sweat. Even when you’re not picking a charity, we’ll pick one for you. BareBands will be designating a portion of all profits to BareBands.org, a charity we’re establishing to support efforts geared towards eradicating infectious disease via wearable technology.

So Why Do We Need Your Support?

First of all, personalization. Not only do we need to make the bands in a wide range of sizes to make sure the watch fits nice and snug on your wrist, but we want to roll out technology through which you can customize every aspect of the watch.  Unfortunately, enabling all that customization costs money.

Second, there’s the issue of MOQ. If you took a second to watch my video, you got to see some great shots of the test run of the very same watch you can buy today. But for me to be able to sell these watches to you, I need to fulfill a “Minimum Order Quantity.” In my case, in order to buy one watch, I need to buy 3,000. 

“Hold up. Did you say I can get the very same watch I saw in the video?” Yes, and as soon as mid-July. That’s just in time for you to rock your new watch on the beach, at the bar, a BBQ, pool party, music festival…all summer long. 

On Board? Help Spread the Word!

Whether or not you contribute, we need your help getting the word out! 

Tweet about BareBands. Facebook about BareBands. Email about BareBands. Draw a picture about BareBands.  And then Instagram it.

We’re trying to build a fun watch that you’re going to love wearing and continuously customizing over time. And, more than that, we’re trying to build a brand that wraps all that fun and self-expression up into something meaningful. We just need your help to get there. Thank you.

P.S. Maybe you've heard of these "smartwatches" and "activity monitors"? We have, too. With your support we'll be able to look into adding those types of functionality down the road. And our modular system means that when we do, all you'll have to do is slide the old piece out and the new one in. Easy peezy.

The 'Chino' - 97% brushed cotton twill / 3% stretch





The '5 - Pocket' -- All McMaculars are lined entirely with 95% Mulberry Silk / 5% Stretch.












































Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
The first of its kind: the best of both worlds

Most light sneakers aren’t exactly comfortable, and unable to create dynamic, interactive lighting effects based on motions or movement, we get it. So we set out to design innovative light-up sneakers that are smart, comfortable, sleek and stylish.

ZOOOII sneakers let you show off your style all day and into the night, with dazzling lights that set you apart from the crowd. They go with you comfortably from casual days to the wildest all-night parties.

 

 Check out the hands-on video by BEST REVIEWS:

 

 Check out the Unboxing video by Unbox Fantasy!

 

ZOOOII provides different light modes for the user to choose from. Whether you're standing, walking, running or dancing, ZOOOII’s shiny light design will fully light up your feet for a unique look in the dark.

  •  Dancing
     
  •  Running
     
  •  Skateboarding
     

Combining the latest fabric technology and trend-setting design concepts, ZOOOII is stylish and comfortable, from the inside out.

 

With the application of ETPU technology, which highly improves the cushion and rebound ability of the sole, ZOOOII is built around a soft midsole that is ultra-comfortable with better energy return than typical sneakers. That means they are perfect for walking and daily wear with excellent shock resistance for any activity.

 

The innovative bridge-like structure and buckle design make ZOOOII supportive and easy to slip on. 

 

An icy translucent outsole sits under the ball of your foot, providing all-around comfort, anti-slip and wear-resistant.

 

ZOOOII is water-resistant and breathable. You will never worry about being caught out in the rain. 

 

 
  •  Motion Control
     

Users can customize the sole lighting effects with different flashing frequencies according to the height of the foot position. When you are walking, ZOOOII will light up your foot. When your foot is lifted, the light will flash. The light will present different flash frequencies based on your foot movement.

 
  •  App Control
     

Press the button on the heel counter, then connect ZOOOII with the APP.  From there, you can adjust different light effects and customize various colors. The lights can be set to blink or stay constantly illuminated. Users can choose 17 different light colors using the APP and adjust other parameters depending upon needs and preferences.

 
  •  Step Number Control
     

Connect with Bluetooth and ZOOOII allows you to quickly see how many steps you’ve taken. The lights will change as your step numbers increase. It helps motivate you to walk more every day and stay committed to your fitness goals. The more steps you take, the more different colors you can unlock.

 

 
  •  Flip Feet Control
     

ZOOOII also lets you turn on and turn off the lights with flip feet control. Easily turn the lights on or off whenever you choose with a quick turn of your foot from left to right.

  • Easy to Charge

Simply place the magnet close to the shoes, it will automatically attach and start charging.

 

ZOOOII team has 20 years of shoe industry experience and has cooperated with many famous sneakers and luxury brands. ZOOOII sneaker is our first self-developed product for the consumer market. We’re on a mission to build the world's best smart wearable system.

 

ZOOOII originated from the discussion with a breaking master on how to make the highly-difficult action show a more dazzling performance effect on the stage. Aaron Cai and Danny Yang, who have extensive experience in making shoes, and Ranto Liu, who are good at developing interactive light effects, were inspired to create a wearable brand that makes movements cooler. In the end, ZOOOII was born.

story:
Hi there, we are Tshotsh. 

We make innovative outfit for Outdoors & Water Sports Lovers since 2007. 

This is "The One Cap", the only cap you will ever need! To pre-order, click Back This Project. Or read on !

__

 

We studied the needs of outdoors enthusiasts like runners, sailors, kitesurfers, surfers, golfers, climbers... And we created the first cap to fit all of their needs. 

One cap, zero compromise. We put all our effort in performance and style. 

 

   

_

 

The cap with 4-in-1 versatility : providing the benefits of a water cap, practicality of a sport cap and style of a street cap. We added up an innovative 100% UV protective & transparent visor, to keep your field of vision as wide as possible.

 

   

_

 

_

 

   

 

Unknown to many adventure lovers, the 100% UV protective & transparent visor is the best protection you can use for all your outdoor activities. It will protect you from the sun and intense light whitout obstructing your field of vision, keeping it as wide as possible.  

The visor is transparent, and you can see through it. It's transparent but tinted; this helps reduce the dazzle from direct sunlight during training. And it's 100% UV protective.  

 

                            

_

 

                            

 

You are tired of losing your caps in the sea while sailing or kitesurfing? Or you won't dare to go out with a cap because you think you'll lose it?

The One Cap is designed to stay securely on your head in all wind conditions. Wear it tight and you'll never lose it ! 

Test ridden by our kitesurfing and surfing team mates in France !

 

                            

_

 

                            

 

After months of research, we finally found it. The most comfortable polyester. The entire cap is made from this unique and easy wearing material. 

In order to make the cap the most breathable for comfort; we used laser technology to place a special geometric structure of holes on the side and back of the cap. This create maximum airflow and moisture transfer. 

In the desert, or on the sea, this cap will feel amazing on your head. 

 

   

_

 

                            

 

Our cap is resistant. The whole cap is made from one material : our highly breathable and solid polyester. The shape and material are built to last. 

The visor is made from TPE, even if you put it in your suitcase, it will not change its shape.

The whole cap is UV & seawater resistant. It will remain black even after hours spent in the ocean.

 

                            

_

 

                            

_

 

                            

 

It's a must for all water sports lovers !

_

 

                            

 

Our cap is made for the water and for the sea. 

It dries quicker thana other caps and hats. The material we chose dries 3 to 4 times faster than cotton.

 

   

_

 

   

 

We made it black because it's classy and fits with every other color. The 100% anti-UV & transparent visor gives you a sophisticated look. The logos are rubber printed : the white color will never turn grey. 

We chose a timeless shape, so you can keep it for years. 

_

 

                            

 

The visor is flexible and will always return to its original shape even if you put it in your suitcase. 

_

 

                            

 

The One Cap is suitable for all head sizes. Even the biggest.

For sports you can wear it tight. It will always be comfortable to wear and remain securely on your head.  

_

   

 

We created a limited edition & 100% Organic Cotton T-shirt. It will only be available during the campaign. 

This t-shirt is printed in Montpellier, France, and made from Organic Cotton. 

Color: Heather Sand 

Available Sizes: XS - XL

 

   

_

 

   

_

 

We are a French outfit brand empowering people to live the life they dream about. Since 2007, our mission is very clear. We create innovative and highly functional product, made for the outdoors, while giving you the best style. Our brand and vibe is very down to earth and positive feeling. 

Naturally, a few seasons later, a community of water-sports enthusiasts and high quality products lovers emerged. And they are still with us today.

If you want longlasting and well-conceived product for your trips and your daily life, you are tshotsh, too.

 

_

 

   

_

 

Risks & Challenges

 

We've been developing technical products and delivering them worldwide for 13 years. We created our first cap in 2007. We already have an international community of customers and facebook fans. We are used to international logistics, factory management and large volume of production. We tested and validated our cap in various conditions the past 6 months. We already produced 250 caps and they will be sent as soon as the campaign ends. We are launching "The One Cap" on Kickstarter to reach a wider community and show our backers our attention to detail and and our expertise in water sports outfits.

The most comfortable polyester. The entire cap is made from this unique and easy wearing material. In order to make the cap the most breathable for comfort; we used laser technology to place a special geometric structure of holes on the side and back of the cap. This create maximum airflow and moisture transfer. In the desert, or on the sea, this cap will feel amazing on your head.     _                              Our cap is resistant. The whole cap is made from one material : our highly breathable and solid polyester. The shape and material are built to last. The visor is made from TPE, even if you put it in your suitcase, it will not change its shape.The whole cap is UV & seawater resistant. It will remain black even after hours spent in the ocean.                             _                             _                              It's a must for all water sports lovers !_                              Our cap is made for the water and for the sea. It dries quicker thana other caps and hats. The material we chose dries 3 to 4 times faster than cotton.    _     We made it black because it's classy and fits with every other color. The 100% anti-UV & transparent visor gives you a sophisticated look. The logos are rubber printed : the white color will never turn grey. We chose a timeless shape, so you can keep it for years. _                              The visor is flexible and will always return to its original shape even if you put it in your suitcase. _                              The One Cap is suitable for all head sizes. Even the biggest.For sports you can wear it tight. It will always be comfortable to wear and remain securely on your head.  _    We created a limited edition & 100% Organic Cotton T-shirt. It will only be available during the campaign. This t-shirt is printed in Montpellier, France, and made from Organic Cotton. Color: Heather Sand Available Sizes: XS - XL    _    _ We are a French outfit brand empowering people to live the life they dream about. Since 2007, our mission is very clear. We create innovative and highly functional product, made for the outdoors, while giving you the best style. Our brand and vibe is very down to earth and positive feeling. Naturally, a few seasons later, a community of water-sports enthusiasts and high quality products lovers emerged. And they are still with us today.If you want longlasting and well-conceived product for your trips and your daily life, you are tshotsh, too. _    _ Risks & Challenges We've been developing technical products and delivering them worldwide for 13 years. We created our first cap in 2007. We already have an international community of customers and facebook fans. We are used to international logistics, factory management and large volume of production. We tested and validated our cap in various conditions the past 6 months. We already produced 250 caps and they will be sent as soon as the campaign ends. We are launching "The One Cap" on Kickstarter to reach a wider community and show our backers our attention to detail and and our expertise in water sports outfits.

story:
SlimKey 

 

Featured In

 

SlimKey and SlimKey Wallet

Available in 2 versions

 

 

The SlimKey Design

Version 1

 

Our design team carried out a sophisticated and rigorous study of key size and usage.

 

Available in 8 fantastic colors

 

Whether you're going out for a jog, a formal evening or a day at the office, SlimKey saves you the bother of carrying a bunch of keys and stuff in your pockets or purse.

 

 

Slimmer than a smartphone, smaller than a credit card and invisible in the pocket - you can easily forget you've got SlimKey with you. 

 

Free up your pockets

 

 

Customize your SlimKey! Arrange keys according to your needs and recognize them without even looking. 

Get the key you're looking for with a simple hand movement. 

No more hassles - even in the dark!

 

Smooth edges protect your clothing  

 

The body of SlimKey is compact and durable. At the same time, thanks to a special treatment, it's smooth and non-abrasive. Keys are firmly held in place, sealed in by the key lock mechanism so they don't fall out and clothes aren't damaged.

 

Holds up to 6 keys 

Keep your keys neatly organized in an intelligent way.

 

Easy to use


In a hurry? Save time with easy insertion and withdrawal mechanism.

 

The SlimKey Wallet Design

Version 2

 

Product design followed a comprehensive study of the size and shape of banknotes, cards and keys.

 

 

Holds up to 10 cards PLUS notes, coins, earphones, etc.  

 

The SlimKey aluminium body and RFID technology shield your cards, protecting them from bending, breakage, unwanted RFID and NFC communications, unauthorized use and theft.

 

Note

If you want to store electronic badgecards, tags, etc. inside your SlimKey Wallet, models are available without RFID protection. 


Keeps your car keys secure too!  

 

 

 

Contents firmly held in position.

High-quality stretch fabric construction.

Maintains shape in all conditions.  

SlimKey Wallets have been designed with high-quality stretch fabric to ensure they do not lose elasticity or stay open when not in use.

The stretchy lycra wallet holds everything you would normally keep in a pocket or purse.

 

 

Feel free when working out

 

A cool way to carry everything you need in any situation.

No more rattling keys, even while you exercise!

 

Customized SlimKey or SlimKey Wallet

Customization examples

 

Multitool 

 

Customize your SlimKey by adding this incredibly useful Multitool: a simple key to help you in numerous situations.  

 

 

Key Lock Mechanism

Keys held in position – always ready when you need them.

 

Fully adjustable elastic tension secures fastening mechanism for your keys.  

 

Techical Specifications - Production And Processing

The body of SlimKey is composed of high-quality aeronautical aluminium plates.

This kind of aluminium is ultra-light and very tough. Its smooth-to-the-touch, non-abrasive feel is achieved by the application of a tumbling treatment that uses ceramic spheres.

A sophisticated anodizing process makes SlimKey scratchproof and improves its resistance to corrosion and general wear and tear.

Body: High-quality, ultra-light and durable aeronautical aluminium plates: 

            Non-abrasive and smooth to the touch

            Corrosion-resistant, hardwearing and scratchproof.

Screws and mechanism:  All components are made of indestructible stainless steel.

Logo: Indelible laser engraving. 

 

RFID technology protection:

 

Key Compatibility

What keys can be used?

SlimKey models hold most types of key with a maximum length of 73mm and a minimum hole diameter of 4mm.

 

Easy Assembly

 

Rewards Chart  

 

The SlimKey Story

 

Our Team

Our team of enthusiastic individuals dedicated their time to the creation of a beautifully designed product that directly addresses users’ needs. We have discussed, prototyped, tested and improved SlimKey many times and are extremely proud of the result: a high-quality product that is compact,durable and suitable for everyone.

All materials are carefully selected. We ensure a reliable and efficient production process to deliver the smoothest of operations and the very best performance. 

Our priority is to implement the project efficiently and effectively to enable us to grow and develop new products, some of which are already in the pipeline. 

We aspire to build a community around the concept of SlimKey: 

bringing people together and forming relationships to advocate our products and support our team.

This is what matters to us. 

 

Why We Need You

We have been working on our project for over a year now and we’re ready for the off!

Your support will help fund our project, which aims to deliver a perfect product and expand our portfolio for your needs. Be part of our campaign by sharing our project with friends and family. A small team can achieve good results but a large group can make a big difference.

Our ambition is to design and deliver a product which will help make your life more organized. Driven by passion, determination and a willingness to innovate, we enjoy challenges and want to develop our great product still further. 

Good design is the result of cooperation and knowledge-sharing to make dreams come true.

None of us, including me, ever do great things. But we can all do small things, with great love, and together we can do something wonderful. (Mother Teresa)

 

SHARE OUR PASSION   

A simple click is worth a lot to us. Thank you! 

 

Interested in writing about this campaign? The link above might help!

 

Rischi e sfide

We already have a proven manufacturing process in place and work closely with the factory to ensure that everything runs smoothly. However, unexpected production delays are always a possibility and can alter estimated delivery dates. We are committed to keep you constantly updated and to be completely honest and transparent at every stage of our journey together.

story:
It started as an obsession to find a comfortable pair of jeans that you could put on in the morning and wear cycling, hiking or climbing, and still look stylish for a meeting or night out. This was the foundation for Boulder Denim. Knowing that there are many pants with many features we decided to design a pant that included the most useful of those features, making them the most functional and stylish jeans on the market.

Our sizing guarantee to YOU:

In the year we spent developing Boulder Denim we realized a few important things about fit and sizing.

For women, we discovered that we could completely simplify the fitting process when we finally settled on the blend that makes up our patented ultra-stretch denim. After testing our woman’s cut on women that are both slim and curvy, we were able to design a single cut that fits virtually all body types.

Because men don’t typically wear skin tight clothing it was important to design a cut that sits naturally on a man’s lower body, while not being overly tight. This discovery lead to the creation of our two fits, SLIM and ATHLETIC.

We are so confident with our sizing that if your jeans don’t fit, all you do is send them back to us and we will send you another pair on us.

*Customers outside of North America will be charged an additional $20 for international shipping.

 FOR MEN:

To determine your fit, there are two key measurements.

First, measure the smallest part of your waist at your natural waistline. Second, measure your thigh 2 inches below your crotch Then cross reference, your waist and thigh measurement with the sizing chart to determine your fit. Men looking for a skinny fit can size down. The denim will stretch to your body.

FOR WOMEN:

You only need to measure the smallest part of your waist at your natural waistline. Our jeans are so incredibly stretchy to ensure an absolutely skin tight fit we recommend sizing down.

Made with the climber in mind and created to truly combine fashion and adventure for a slimmer fit you can wear anytime.

  • Medium rise that sits just above the hip, slim through the thigh, knee and calf with a slight taper
  • Offers a perfectly tailored fit that works for men with slim to medium legs.
  • Fits well for slim or medium builds as the taper increases proportionally with waist size.

BEST FOR: Men with slim to medium legs that want a tailored look.

For the gym rat, crossfitter or bodybuilder. This fit is muscular-glute approved and designed for men that spend a lot time in the gym.

  • Medium rise that sits just above the hip, more room through the thigh, knee and calf with a slight taper.
  • Offers more thigh and calf room for men with muscular legs.

BEST FOR: Men with big legs that have trouble finding pants that can accommodate their thighs. These are for the crossfitter, bodybuilder or football player that never skips leg day. They also look great on men with thicker legs or larger builds that are looking for a roomier fit.

Designed to combine our 360-degree stretch and a perfect cut that embraces the natural movement of a woman’s body. The stretch is perfect for women of all shapes.

  • Medium/Higher rise, that is meant to move with you as your body bends.
  • The ultra-stretch denim allows you to have a higher-waist that doesn’t restrict movement or dig in when you bend over.

BEST FOR: Women that are slim to very curvy. The denim is so unbelievably stretchy that it will hug even the most curvaceous women.

So rest assured and order with confidence that not only will these pants fit you perfectly and feel amazing, your butt will look phenomenal!

The Boulder Denim brand was inspired by necessity and created by adventurists. We know what it’s like having to balance our thirst for thrill and everyday responsibilities. Which is why created our denim to cater to whatever it is your day has in store for you. Aside from selling comfortable pants, we wanted to be the true advocates for adventure and we’ll do this by giving back to you, our amazing community. 

#1 | Every year a portion of our earnings will go towards our “What’s your adventure?” campaign. You tell us what your idea of an epic getaway would be and the person with the best trip will be decided upon by the Boulder Denim community. The prize being the trip you dreamt and 2016’s trip that will be accompanied by world record highliner, Spencer Seabrooke and the boulder denim team. 

#2 | The “Everyday Athlete Sponsorship Program” (EASP). We realized that like ourselves, we all lead busy lives, yet we still find time to train hard. Our skill is built on our dedication. We want to give back to these athletes in recognition of their hard work and inspiration they bring to others. This means support and of course free Boulder Denim gear.

A huge thank you to these companies for allowing us to shoot in their establishments. 

  • The Hive
  • Portland Craft 
  • Milano Coffee 
  • Revolver Coffee
  • The General Public 

And thank you to Rich Emmerson @ travelshootshare.com  and Tanner Dunn @ thefrvr.com for their incredible photography work. 


Risks & Challenges

1. We already have people testing out our pre-production samples around the globe. We're ready to hit "go" on production immediately after we receive our funds from Kickstarter. This is usually two weeks after our campaign ends successfully.

2. Our stain repellent and hydrophobic technology can be done a number of ways. Choosing the type of technology will depend on how many pairs of jeans we sell. Some methods are quicker than others and it could potentially delay the estimated delivery time by up to 30 days.

3. Other delays and unforeseen obstacles may occur along the way but this is highly unlikely as we're equipped to produce a very large quantity of jeans.

The prize being the trip you dreamt and 2016’s trip that will be accompanied by world record highliner, Spencer Seabrooke and the boulder denim team.

We want to give back to these athletes in recognition of their hard work and inspiration they bring to others. This means support and of course free Boulder Denim gear.


A huge thank you to these companies for allowing us to shoot in their establishments. 

The Hive

Portland Craft 

Milano Coffee 
Revolver Coffee

The General Public

2. Our stain repellent and hydrophobic technology can be done a number of ways. Choosing the type of technology will depend on how many pairs of jeans we sell. Some methods are quicker than others and it could potentially delay the estimated delivery time by up to 30 days.
3. Other delays and unforeseen obstacles may occur along the way but this is highly unlikely as we're equipped to produce a very large quantity of jeans.

story:
DUCKS IN A ROW's backpacks are designed especially for the urban cyclists and commuters. Men and women who ride their bikes or the local transit system to work every morning and need to carry their personal items and laptop to and from the work place in the most comfortable and fashionable way. Our luxurious design and choice of materials creates a truly elegant bag and it's many useful features are designed to give solutions to your every need. We are positive that our backpack will become your new best companion. 
  •  A handle bar connection which leaves your shoulders free, your shirt fresh and tidy and keeps your valuable belongings under your watchful eyes. 
  • A touch screen pocket which means you can navigate without stopping, answer your calls etc. 
  • Fully padded protection for a 15'' and under laptop that keeps you worries free and your eyes on the road. 
  • Up to date design and material selection, suitable for any situation or location. 
  • A custom cover for rain protection - Special connectors for lights and helmet which keep you free and safe.

This unique backpack is a combination of life style and high-tech. We took our knowledge as bag designers for protecting gentle photo gear combined it with our industrial design experience and design thinking methods and spiced it up with elegant look and the finest materials. DUCKSINAROW backpack is the first solution for an everyday bag that not only looks awesome but takes great care of your laptop and make your life easier by connecting to your handlebar and leaving your shoulders free. Time to roll in leisure with pleasure !

 Carry on! 

 

Materials 

Measurements & Colors

We’re Anna & Tony, ambitious Industrial designers and the founders of 'DUCKSINAROW'. For long time we worked together in a leading international photo bag company and now we have decided to follow our true passion, break away from the utilitarian world and come back to the world of fashion. We set out to bring our take on urban fashion and lifestyle to the sophisticated urban city cyclists, who cycle to work every day. Cycling is a passion we have both shared for years and since we embraced this fantastic mode of healthier, greener transport we have never looked back. We found it difficult to find a practical and elegant solution for carrying a laptop while riding your bicycle, so we created one. While developing this bag, we focused on creating the best solution for the commuter’s every day needs with a combination of style & fashion!  


Risks and challenges

Both of us worked for a long time for a professional photo bags company, we bring the knowledge and the experience from the top high tech bag industry and we chose an extremely experienced manufacturer which is producing bags for the top brands for years. We will be accompanying the process , hands-on, in every step of the way. Making sure that quality of our products, starting from the finest and carefully chosen materials and up to the sewers and their craftsmanship, is not compromised and that our backers get the product we have been dreaming of.

We are convinced that we will find a solution for every challenge that might appear along the way. Of course, we will keep you updated at every step! We took extra time buffer for shipping and for unprecedented delays, so we will do every thing to keep the time line as scheduled. We have done our homework on shipping and fulfillment, to keep it smooth.

Customer service is a very very important to us and we will continue to work our hardest to make sure everyone is satisfied. Having said that, we know that things can happen during the production process that can cause minor delays. In the event we encounter issues, rest assured, we’re all over it! And of course, we’ll keep you updated, every step of the way.

Thank you for your support!

While developing this bag, we focused on creating the best solution for the commuter’s every day needs with a combination of style & fashion!  


If you went all the way we're in awe! Thank you for the support!


Risks and challenges
Both of us worked for a long time for a professional photo bags company, we bring the knowledge and the experience from the top high tech bag industry and we chose an extremely experienced manufacturer which is producing bags for the top brands for years. We will be accompanying the process , hands-on, in every step of the way. Making sure that quality of our products, starting from the finest and carefully chosen materials and up to the sewers and their craftsmanship, is not compromised and that our backers get the product we have been dreaming of.
We are convinced that we will find a solution for every challenge that might appear along the way. Of course, we will keep you updated at every step! We took extra time buffer for shipping and for unprecedented delays, so we will do every thing to keep the time line as scheduled. We have done our homework on shipping and fulfillment, to keep it smooth.
Customer service is a very very important to us and we will continue to work our hardest to make sure everyone is satisfied. Having said that, we know that things can happen during the production process that can cause minor delays. In the event we encounter issues, rest assured, we’re all over it! And of course, we’ll keep you updated, every step of the way.
Thank you for your support!

story:
Quality Over Profit

Hello I'm Brian Guay, an artist who loves the macabre. I'll be at Calgary Horror Con (June 10-11) and this year I want to showcase some cool t-shirts.

In this day and age, Print On Demand companies are easier and less risky but we here want quality over profit. By buying in bulk at a locally sourced print shop, we can ensure that quality but not without your help!

 

Down To The Blood & Guts 

Grab your chainsaw, it's time to get to work

  • No the cost of this project is not exactly $666. It's a bit more than that...but how could I resist? Tempting the underworld just seemed like fun!    

  • We'll be offering digital wallpapers, the shirt, posters, prints of macabre art, and ORIGINAL CUSTOM ART!  

  • All collected funds will go towards fulfilling the rewards first. If our goal is not reached the remaining funds will secure a virgin for sacrifice (or print as many t-shirts as funds will allow) 

Your contributions make a huge difference to an artist like myself! It shows support for what I do, helps keep the lights in the studio on. My work is what makes me...well, me. You supporting that means the world to me!

Where To Bury The Body

As with most projects there is always a few obstacles and potential witnesses/risks 

  • We only have till June 10th to have the shirts in hand. With this campaign ending in May that doesn't leave any time for mistakes.

  • This is why we'll be sourcing a local print company to help minimize issues like shipping mistakes and proof errors.

Want To Be An Accomplice? 

Maybe you just can't get involved in an outright murder but the idea seems legit to you?

  • Please make some noise! I don't want you to lose friends over it but a few extra tweets and posts a week go a long way to helping spread the word!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to make things easy on yourself!

story:
Ish Strap-Ons. The Recyclable Guitar Strap Lock


Available for pre-order at our website: http://ishcase.com/strap-locks/


Press: NoTreble Talkbass iheartguitar 

MajorGeeks


You will never need to go through that painful process of installing special strap buttons ever again. Strap-Ons work with almost any strap button (even the acoustic guitar 1/4" jack type!). Nope. Not your grandmother's Strap-Ons. The newest product from Ish, these dandy little pieces of rubber are about to blow you mind...

You will never need to take a chunk of flesh out of your finger while trying to pry off the retaining pin, just to change your strap.

You will never have to pay 3 gigs salary for a couple sets.

...Want to buy some Strap-Ons yet?

They work WAY better than you'd expect! Don't believe us? Try a set. Don't like them? Thats fine, you can throw Strap-Ons in the recycling bin, because they are made from recyclable rubber (embrace your inner hipster and go green!). 

Even if you don't play an instrument, you know someone who does. All of our rewards will be delivered before Christmas - perfect for stocking stuffers!

Why Crowdfunding? (IndieGoGo)

Its pretty simple. We need to place an order with the manufacture we found... but that order is pretty dang big. 10,000 pieces minimum, that is. The way we are looking at it, if we can get $3,000 worth of people backing us, then we can put up the rest of the money to make the difference. 

  • You back our campaign by pre-ordering stuff (all while getting great deals).
  • We get successful funding and tell the factory to make the Strap-Ons.
  • We deliver your stuff. You're happy.
  • We get our product on the market and (hopefully) enough money to make more. So you can buy more. And get happier.

About Ish

Ish is finally bringing the cool factor to a very large, but mostly unappreciated, part of the music industry that seldom gets recognized for it's individuality. Or lack there off. Gig bags with... Color?! What?! Carbon fiber picks. Yep, we've got those. Super straps. You're not cool unless you have one! Blah blah blah. Ish makes the stuff that supports the music industry - except our gear doesn't suck.

Rewards

We've got some friggen cool stuff! Besides the Strap-Ons, we also have USA made V Neck T-Shirts (Unisex), Stickers, and even sick-nasty temporary tattoos. 

Our Super Straps come in 3 color combinations, and are made from beautiful faux leather on the front and faux pigskin on the back. They are retro cool and feel great on your shoulder thanks to the 3" wide shoulder pad. Very high quality to boot.

The Carbon Fiber Picks are made from supercar materials (stronger than steel and lighter than fiberglass) and sound fantastic on guitar or bass. They are only 0.7mm thin but still super stiff. 

You get these other awesome Ish products by purchasing the "Wonder Pack" or "The Ish Life" pack. Check out some pictures:

Can't Fund Us? You Can Still Help!

Can't spend $3 on some Strap Ons? (I mean... come on, we made them as cheap as possible...). Thats okay, we could use other help.

Social media has power. Not to be that typical crowdfunding campaign that begs you to share us on Facebook, but... SHARE US PLEASE! (Twitter and Google Plus are way cool too. So is Instragram.)

THANK YOU!

Simple as that. Keep your eyes out in the coming days for giveaways and cool stuff happening. Feel free to contact us with any questions.

story:
Vincie: Holiday push.

To meet holiday demand, Vincie seeks forward-looking fashionistas and lovers of style to prime the pump. We need to hire craftsfolk to help produce Vincie products for the http://bit.ly/SFEtsy15Holiday Emporium, Pier 35, Thanksgiving weekend. For Meet-the-Maker day, West Elm, Emeryville, the Sunday before Christmas. For increasing sales at http://shop.originalvincie.com/.

This is a short campaign because the time is short, the need is critical. 

What can you do?

1. Invest. We're looking for $3.5k in 7 days. To meet holiday demand and tool up for the all-new, exciting 2016 line.

2. Share this campaign with friends and frenemies on Social, in person, by mail. With all those who love fashion, culture and the new economy.

3. Keep in touch. Follow https://instagram.com/originalvincie/, visit the website http://originalvincie.com/, like Vincie on Fb https://www.facebook.com/Original.Vincie. Watch the YouTube video http://bit.ly/GoVincie, like it, leave comments. 

4. Get your perks. Love your Vincie. Use it every day.

What do you get?

  Keys to my heart

Keyfobs and canvas bag perks are yours by the holidays – from Emporium stock. 

Wallet, Dopp kit, laptop case, barrel purse or backpack – you'll get a card to send for the holidays, if you intend the perk as a gift. Items arrive in January. These custom items are made after the holiday rush.

  Get ready

2016 launch is at the beginning of March. Exciting stuff coming, beyond the new-product perks. Be there – twin events in SF and LA.

Who we are?

San Francisco makers. Upstairs, in the Castro. From a long line of European craftsmen, 9 fingers on each hand, doing 16 things at a time. Come to the City by way of San Pedro docks and Long Beach Punk. We like pudding. 

  9-fingered Vince

Let's move forward.

We nurture community. Train interns. Share experience and connections. We're proud members of the Academy of Handmade and the SF Etsy Street Team.

  Andrea Castelfranato

'Omnes Semper Fixit' means 'Always Make It Work.' With a boost from you, we'll work it bigger. And you might be sporting the first 2016 Vincie originals: A little punk, a little chic, a lott'a fun.

We can do this. New fashion for our new world.

Together.

story: Hi! My name is Ricky and I'm 16 years old. I have a story to tell and it's about a 55 yr. young father who means the world to me, that's my dad (Rick). My dad has Cirrhosis of the liver, caused from numerous medications. My dad has worked all his life, until he was let go from his job and became ill. He's been disabled since 2006 and has been coping with his disabilities. He's had some reservations about not  being able to provide for his family. My dad has always been my protector, mentor, provider, best friend, and hero. He's my biggest fan and he always tells me how proud he is of me. Dad enjoys hearing about my day in school and we  spend family time at home, or a night at a hotel. I never thought a night at a hotel would be fun, but if you had parents like mine, I wouldn't trade it for anything else. Dad promised we'll do it again, when he gets better. Dad is in constant pain and mom (Annie) is right there by his side. I catch her crying at times, because she feels she's not doing enough. I see her stressed, tired, and overwhelmed. I help with what I can do, to make it easier on the both of them. Dad has Health Insurance, but mom doesn't. Mom had a stroke last October(2011), and was let go from her job. She was a great Phlebotomist, the patients loved her and still think the world of her. The medical bills are starting to stack up, mom says everything will be okay, but I can see the stress on her face. Dad will need to go have a series of tests, then we wait for the call, to say he's been accepted on the liver transplant list. That's when it starts, the VA will help fly my parents for a week to Houston, Tx. for more tests, and every 3 months for 3 days till there's a match. When the call for a match comes in, then they are flown back to Houston for surgery and stay for a month. The VA will cover the travel, the hotel, and the surgery, but not the every day expenses. That can get very expensive. When dad gets sick and mom calls 911 and he's taken out side of the VA, she worries how the bill is going to get paid. Mom is still trying to pay for her own medical bills, I'm scared for her. The two us have to stay healthy for dad, and she's dad's primary supporter. I need help to relieve some of the stress from the financial burden, Please help me help them breath a little easier. I do know the medical bills are close to $53,500.00, that includes mom's hospital and rehab. bills. HELP! Thank you and many blessings to all of you. My dad has more reason to live longer, me. I just lost my grandpa to lung cancer, this past May, I'm not ready to loose my dad.

story:
Wanna make perfect and luxury Christmas gift for your friends? Or you just want to carry your keys in style? 

StykCase is perfect for you! It is precisious HandMade tool to organize your keys, without jingling and damaging your pockets. And the best? No more shame when placing your keys on the table! Looks amazing!



Help us to reach our goal

Our first goal is to get 10,000$. Why? Every StykCase is HandMade from real leather. We want to make sure every our customer will recieve a masterpiece.



StykCase

Luxury leather key case can carry 1-16 keys. Depends on screws you use. 


Easy to use!

Pull out, insert and open doors. ;)


Package contains:

  • Top and Bottom Leather plates
  • 5x2 screws (up to 4keys; up to 6keys; up to 8keys; up to 12keys; up to 16keys)
  • 10 nylon spacers 
  • Short instructions
Others
  • Felt Key Chain

  • Carbiner


  • Different Screws


Risks & Challenges

If we reach our first goal: 
You´ll get your StykCase in luxury packaging, some gifts, more screws, manual and instructions.

If we don´t reach our goal:
You´ll get your StykCase in normal packaging with some basic instructions. 

Final product may vary from image. (Leather don´t look allways the same)

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share us! Help us to bring StykCase to life!
