story:
The Hammbag is your backpack anywhere, your towel at the beach, your bed while camping, and that perfect seat in the park. In a minute the Hammbag can transform easily between a bag, towel and hammock. Its durable, reliable, and extremely comfy. We’ve spent the past year fine tuning prototype models in order to bring you the best, most versatile bag we can think of.

Get yours Now!
http://hammbag.com
https://thecavern.com.au/shop/hammbag

 

The hammock form is full of useful features. The backpack flap doubles as a drink holder and a large velcro pocket to store any loose items. The two interior pockets can be used as a pillow or neck support. The Hammbag comes with two Grunt pull tie down straps allowing you to use any branch, pole or anything you can find for stable and sturdy hammock support.

When folding the Hammbag into bag form it can be folded into two different bag styles. A normal backpack as well as a single strap bag. Whether you're going on a walk, run or skate you can quickly customise the way you wear your bag.

The Hammbag is duel layered, with a towel interior and a canvas exterior. The soft towel is perfect for beach and the pool, accompanied by the canvas it makes the Hammbag extremely durable and resistant. When in Hammock form the canvas stops all wind, and the towel makes for a cozy sleep.  
 

We've used a lightweight canvas for the outside and a soft towel lining for the interior. The supporting ropes and straps are heavy duty and will easily support up to 120kg / 260lbs. The adjustable black straps also allow for an expanded volume of up to four times its original capacity.

 

This will not be the exterior design of the Hammbag you will receive. There'll be several designs including a tie dye option made!

 The Hammbag's large pockets can hold not 1, not 2, 3, or 4 but 5 laptops, text books and more!  All 5 laptops (13", 14", 3x15")! all in separate pockets and fitted very comfortably.
The pillow pockets are a great support for your head when filled with just a couple of items of clothing. They are also a handy way to keep your drinks cool with a few ice-packs or your wallet safe when it's in bag form.

Our side flap has 2 pockets, the larger with Velcro. These pockets are perfect for secure and quick access to your wallet, phone, keys and can even hold your drink!

Folding between the towel, hammock and bag is a fast and painless process! in under 2 minutes you can go from your bag, to relaxing in a tree.

 
 

The idea for Hammbag first came to us on a road trip up the coast of New South Wales, Australia. We drove from Sydney to Byron Bay, stopping at many beaches along the way.. Tom had brought his regular hammock and slung his towel, water, sunscreen, football and speaker in it like a sack to the beach. We thought, surely we can make this more efficient and... here it is, our final product. We are insanely passionate about our idea, we use ours everyday and we hope to share it with you. 

The Byron Crew.

Our Beds in Byron!

 

We've been using our prototypes in practise for over a year now. We’ve challenged our product to withstand winters in Europe, beaches in Australia, road trips through New Zealand and everyday life. In every situation the Hammbag has performed beyond our expectations. In fact, we were always surprised at how many places the Hammbag worked.. Whether we'd just stopped to hang and study in the park or needed it as a blanket couch surfing our way around the UK, it was always there! At first the Hammbag was a novelty we took to the beach, but now it has become essential to any great adventure. Even now we've impressed ourselves with how well it works and are constantly finding new ways to use the Hammbag and add to its design. We’re excited to see where the Hammbag will take others as well and want to spread the word!

Hanging out in the park after a game of soccer. Finding a spot to chill with mates or just to sit and read outdoors can be a common spontaneous event. Sleeping in Byron Bay in style!
When road tripping setting up a bed  has never been so easy, comfortable and mobile!
Camping has never been so easy and comfortable; whether you're fully equipped or camping on bare minimum, it suites all occasions. Having picnics in the park is a no brainer with the Hammbag. Don't forget those drunk nights where your bed is just to far or your mates couch is 'occupied'.
 
 
Our Goal

 

We're highly passionate about this project and our dream is to one day be walking around Byron and see a Hammbag walk by! 

We've been discussing with our suppliers to organise smaller quantities as well as  better shipping rates to make delivery as cheap as possible.  We've also arranged for 6 different designs to give more variety and selection to our range. 

Even if our goal is not 100% met, we've discussed with several investors in contributing to our fund. However, we are trying as hard as possible to keep this to a crowed funded project. Either way you'll be getting your Hammbag soon!!

 

 

    Risks & Challenges

     

     

    We've done a lot of research over the last 15 months on materials, processing goods and product design to develop the product you see today. We are constantly trying to better our bag, so some minor design adjustments may be made in order to improve your overall Hammbag experience. Our only challenge now is to gain your support so we can continue on our quest to bring the people the bag they deserve.

    If you have any other questions that we haven't been covered above or in the FAQs below please don't hesitate to email us: thecavernofficial@gmail.com

     

     

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you love this idea as much as we do, and would like to see it take of. Please help spread the word and tell anyone, your friends, family, even your cat!
      Indiegogo provides quick social media sharing tool for a quick share.

      Even further if you have a blog, instagram or pinterest we'd love a shout out! or follow us on

The two interior pockets can be used as a pillow or neck support. The Hammbag comes with two Grunt pull tie down straps allowing you to use any branch, pole or anything you can find for stable and sturdy hammock support.

When folding the Hammbag into bag form it can be folded into two different bag styles. A normal backpack as well as a single strap bag. Whether you're going on a walk, run or skate you can quickly customise the way you wear your bag.
The Hammbag is duel layered, with a towel interior and a canvas exterior. The soft towel is perfect for beach and the pool, accompanied by the canvas it makes the Hammbag extremely durable and resistant. When in Hammock form the canvas stops all wind, and the towel makes for a cozy sleep.   

We've used a lightweight canvas for the outside and a soft towel lining for the interior. The supporting ropes and straps are heavy duty and will easily support up to 120kg / 260lbs. The adjustable black straps also allow for an expanded volume of up to four times its original capacity.
 
This will not be the exterior design of the Hammbag you will receive. There'll be several designs including a tie dye option made! The Hammbag's large pockets can hold not 1, not 2, 3, or 4 but 5 laptops, text books and more!  All 5 laptops (13", 14", 3x15")! all in separate pockets and fitted very comfortably.
The pillow pockets are a great support for your head when filled with just a couple of items of clothing. They are also a handy way to keep your drinks cool with a few ice-packs or your wallet safe when it's in bag form.
Our side flap has 2 pockets, the larger with Velcro. These pockets are perfect for secure and quick access to your wallet, phone, keys and can even hold your drink!Folding between the towel, hammock and bag is a fast and painless process! in under 2 minutes you can go from your bag, to relaxing in a tree.
  
The idea for Hammbag first came to us on a road trip up the coast of New South Wales, Australia. We drove from Sydney to Byron Bay, stopping at many beaches along the way.. Tom had brought his regular hammock and slung his towel, water, sunscreen, football and speaker in it like a sack to the beach. We thought, surely we can make this more efficient and... here it is, our final product. We are insanely passionate about our idea, we use ours everyday and we hope to share it with you. The Byron Crew.

Our Beds in Byron!

 

We've been using our prototypes in practise for over a year now. We’ve challenged our product to withstand winters in Europe, beaches in Australia, road trips through New Zealand and everyday life. In every situation the Hammbag has performed beyond our expectations. In fact, we were always surprised at how many places the Hammbag worked.. Whether we'd just stopped to hang and study in the park or needed it as a blanket couch surfing our way around the UK, it was always there! At first the Hammbag was a novelty we took to the beach, but now it has become essential to any great adventure. Even now we've impressed ourselves with how well it works and are constantly finding new ways to use the Hammbag and add to its design. We’re excited to see where the Hammbag will take others as well and want to spread the word!
Hanging out in the park after a game of soccer. Finding a spot to chill with mates or just to sit and read outdoors can be a common spontaneous event.  Sleeping in Byron Bay in style!

When road tripping setting up a bed  has never been so easy, comfortable and mobile!

Camping has never been so easy and comfortable; whether you're fully equipped or camping on bare minimum, it suites all occasions.  Having picnics in the park is a no brainer with the Hammbag.  Don't forget those drunk nights where your bed is just to far or your mates couch is 'occupied'.

 
 Our Goal

 
We're highly passionate about this project and our dream is to one day be walking around Byron and see a Hammbag walk by! 
We've been discussing with our suppliers to organise smaller quantities as well as  better shipping rates to make delivery as cheap as possible.  We've also arranged for 6 different designs to give more variety and selection to our range. 
Even if our goal is not 100% met, we've discussed with several investors in contributing to our fund. However, we are trying as hard as possible to keep this to a crowed funded project. Either way you'll be getting your Hammbag soon!!
 
 



Risks & Challenges
 
 
We've done a lot of research over the last 15 months on materials, processing goods and product design to develop the product you see today. We are constantly trying to better our bag, so some minor design adjustments may be made in order to improve your overall Hammbag experience. Our only challenge now is to gain your support so we can continue on our quest to bring the people the bag they deserve.
If you have any other questions that we haven't been covered above or in the FAQs below please don't hesitate to email us: thecavernofficial@gmail.com
 
 



Other Ways You Can Help
If you love this idea as much as we do, and would like to see it take of. Please help spread the word and tell anyone, your friends, family, even your cat!Indiegogo provides quick social media sharing tool for a quick share.Even further if you have a blog, instagram or pinterest we'd love a shout out! or follow us on

story:
When backing our project please leave a comment on the top part of the campaign to let us know which model of watch /sunglasses or T-shirt you would like.

For a while now we have been making clothing but for now we are focusing on our unique sunglasses and watches because everybody seems to love them so much.

Our sunglasses and watches are ready, after several revisions, alterations, meetings and many product tests we have found the final models to start manufacturing. In the process we have been able to learn by trial and error how to make the perfect watch and sunglasses. We know the fabrication process so now it’s time to take the next step. The only obstruction we have now is capital to fabricate these items, most of our suppliers require minimum amount quantities in order to sell us some of the parts necessary for the fabrication process.

We need your support to bring the wood watches and sunglasses to life and make it affordable for everyone.We have selected manufacturers/suppliers that have great reputation in the industry which gives us confidence that Tv-Head Clothing Co team can deliver an excellent product at an affordable price.

 Once Our campaign is done at Indiegogo the watches and sunglasses will retail for more, now is a great chance to get them for a fraction of the cost.

We will send out several updates throughout the process to make sure you are informed of what's going on, we like to make sure you are satisfied with the process and well informed of when you will get your item, ultimately you the supporters are the ones helping us make our dream a reality.

INTERNATIONAL SUPPORTERS please keep in mind that the International shipping is an estimate number. Once we know where you are at the end of the campaign we will let you know the exact shipping cost. We don’t want to make any money on shipping and will only charge what the post office charges us.We will be transparent about shipping cost.

Take a moment to see our awesome rewards!

The Essentials V-Neck in Blue Red baby Blue and Gray S-XXL


Tank Tops in Blue and Baby Blue sizes S-XXL

Telerama S-XXL


size chart


THE SUNGLASSES

From left to right - The Leo - The Sandy - The Jack

From left to right - The Perry - EL Joe - The Michael Angelo




Description

Lens Vertical:47mm

Lens width: 50mm

Bridge: 18mm

Total length: 140mm

Sunglasses legs are made out of bamboo which is an Eco friendly self sustainable material.

Laser engraved on both sides reading TV-HEAD

They have a mild UV protection

Bamboo is safe to the skin and has an excellent wearing feel

THE WATCHES

Left to right The Earl and The Fonz

The Earl

The Earl


The Earl Description

Analog

Case size:45*41mm approx

Case thickness:12mm approx

Band size:2.2mm*26mm approx

Weight:75g approx

Material:Recycled wood

Movement & battery:Japan miyota,dual quartz movement

Water proof:splash only

Claps:Stainless Steel TV head logo inside of watch

Band can be adjusted to your size easily at any retail store that would normally do this work.

The Fonz




The Fonz

Analog/digital

Case size:45*41mm approx

Case thickness:12mm approx

Band size:2.2mm*26mm approx

Weight:75g approx

Material:Recycled Maple

Movement & battery:Japan miyota,elec movement with quartz 

Water proof:splash only

Clasp:Stainless Steel TV Head logo inside of watch

Band can be adjusted to your size easily at any retail store that would normally do this work.

How Everything Started

Tv Head Clothing originated in 2010, we have been in the fashion industry for about 3 years. Being raised abroad the US and now established in Miami Florida has influenced us greatly, we see fashion from a whole different perspective, fashion is what defines this beautiful city (Miami) and we take pride on being from Miami incorporating it into our fashion sense with the energetic colors that represent the dynamic and active aspect of the city. T.V. Head Clothing is dedicated to a social conscious audience that like to dress well while still being casual and not burning a hole in their wallets. We love fashion!

Experience

We have been in the industry for about 3 years and thru the process of fabricating and manufacturing clothing and accessories we have acquired enough knowledge to give a high quality product at a competitive price. We have been to a decent amount of markets in the past 8 months and we have earned the respect of the locals by providing quality and great products.

Please check out our blog for more info on the last markets we have been part of http://tvheadclothing.com/#/blog/4553572296

But just like everyone else we have flaws and we are always on the look out to correct them which help us learn new things as the days go by.

If you would like to see more pictures or have any questions or just want to say hi you can send us an email to hello@tvheadclothing.com or fredy@tvheadclothing.com we would love to hear from you. Have a question about our campaign follow and join the discussion at :

http://crowdfundingforum.com/showthread.php/7086-(Indiegogo)-Wood-Watches-and-Bamboo-Sunglasses-from-TV-HEAD


 

PLEASE MAKE SURE TO LIKE US ON FACEBOOK - FACABOOK.COM/TVHEADCLOTHING WE WILL BE POSTING ALL INFO. UPDATES AND PICTURES RELATED TO THIS PROJECT.

Project Goals

The funds collected from this campaign will go towards buying more supplies , being a small clothing brand we can't afford the minimum quantities requirements from our suppliers to produce the watches and sunglasses at affordable prices.Thats when you come in, with your help we will be able to manufacture them at great prices. It will also help us make possible some of the ideas that are on the developing stage and require money to become a reality.(we have some really great ideas!). If we are able to successfully surpass our goals then we will unlock new items as we go, as mentioned before we have some sweet ideas that we want to make a reality but without your support none of these is possible. Even if you can't  support the campaign we ask for your help by spreading the video with your friends and family.

story:
****To contact us please go to http://www.theWaybu.com 

or email us at SustainYourWay@thewaybu.com 

Thanks!

-the Waybu Crew 






    


How do I choose my styles and colors?

To order a single pair of Waybu, find the style you want by selecting one of the "perks" on the right hand side. You can use paypal or 'pay as a guest' with any credit card.

How do I choose more than one pair?

If you get the "Choose Any 2 Pairs" or "Choose any 3 Pairs" perk then you get to pick your styles at the end of the campaign.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost? 

Yes! Please add $10 to your order for international shipping.

What about Rx or prescription lenses?

All styles can be fitted with prescription lenses by most local optometry offices (with the exception of the All-Bamboo frame).  

These are made out of bamboo?

Our new collection has hybrid bamboo frames (half bamboo) and All-bamboo frames. All pairs purchased support our journey to Haiti to give solar Aquapaks to to people in need of clean water.  




   

         

   

Waybu is a line of classic sunglasses styles infused with sustainable bamboo materials. We've taken over year to design and offer a full collection of quality hybrid bamboo eyewear. 

Every pair purchased supports our journey through Haiti to bring solar Aquapaks to people in need of clean water independence. 

We believe in making quality eyewear and doing some quality good in the world. Join us.


     


AVAILABLE NOW ON INDIEGOGO! All of our new styles are available exclusively by pre-ordering right here on our Indiegogo campaign page for the special price of $59 (Free shipping in the US, add 10 dollars for international shipping). The money we raise will help us produce these limited edition sunglasses AND help fund out journey to bring Aquapaks to Haiti. 

See our different styles below and select the corresponding perk on the right hand side>>

You will be the first to get a pair of Waybu before anyone else. Every style is a limited edition production run, and any remaining pairs will retail later for $85.00 or more.  


All Rewards levels (perks):

$10: Thank You post card

$25: Custom Waybu T-shirt

$50: Fan Pack (2 shirts+Thank You card+Photos)

$59: Choose your pair of Waybu now through Indiegogo! (each style is a limited edition production run) 

$95: Custom Engraved Pair of Hybrid bamboo or All-bamboo 

$108: Any 2 Pairs of your choice! (early bird deal) SOLD OUT

$115: Any 2 Pairs of your choice! (last chance deal)

$150: Any 3 pairs of your choice!  SOLD OUT

$495: Boutique starter pack

$2500: Journey with us to Haiti! +1 pair of each style 




    


 




 

  



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 *(Meridians available by contributing $59 and commenting "Meridians")

 

 






     



            

       

Approximately one billion people world-wide have limited access to drinkable water. Every pair of Waybu you purchase helps support the Waybu crew’s journey through Haiti where we will help give clean water independence to people in need. We’ve partnered with the inventor of the Aquapak (which is a solar water pasteurizer) to help give more of the life saving devices to families in Haiti. 

The Waybu crew volunteers to make the life saving Aquapaks at a shop in San Diego. The United Nations reported in 2013 that 80% of people in Haiti live below the poverty line and have to decide between buying clean water or food, something no one should have to go through. Inspired by Monty's near death experience from drinking contaminated water in the Sahara Desert, the Waybu crew strongly believes in sustaining your way while also helping to sustain others. 

Thanks for joining the journey,

-The Waybu crew 

Contact us on Facebook for anything:  www.facebook.com/thewaybu

story:
My name is John Allen and I’m an Illustrator and Designer. My work is a collision of both animal and human influences. Strength, individuality, agility, elegance, & grace.   I attended school at California College of the Arts in San Francisco majoring in Fashion Design.  It was there that I honed in my vision. I worked on every project I could, including a partnership with The Goodwill that promoted sustainability and repurposing fabrics that had been discarded. Despite my accolades, my true vision is to change manufacturing into a sustainable fashion. My goal is to inspire the masses with my craft.

I love deconstructing the undesired and breathing new life into my garments. I am meticulous, even down to the texture of each embellishment. It was the smell of stale fabric while watching my grandmother (Virgie Farmer) deconstruct classic womenswear that sparked my initial love affair with fashion. Some of my fondest memories of my childhood were caring for animals, and vintage shopping with Virgie. She was a Performance Artist, and serves as a primary inspiration to my overall aesthetic.  The other dominating inspiration in my life is my Mother, and the thread of her essence is apparent in all of my pieces. I grew up watching her create bold whimsical hairstyles, and her work is nothing short of pure art-form. It was that edgy brilliance paired with memories of Virgie that I will always attribute to the vision of my lines.

I am happy to share some exciting news; I have been selected as a featured international designer to present a 20 look runway show at the 2014 Mercedes Benz Fashion Week Panama on October 31st at 4:00pm in Panama City, Panama.

This will be my first international runway show, and it will take place on one of Latin Americas biggest stages in Fashion. I will also be celebrating my birthday on this memorable occasion.

I will be presenting my CULT AZ 2015 Summer Collection.  CULTZ AZ will push the limits of contemporary fashion by revisiting the glamour of the romantic era but with a modern twist of alternative opulence and the natural world.

In order to complete the collection, and cover my overhead costs, I am raising $10,500 in sponsorship donations from friends, family and angels. 

In return for a donation, I am offering sponsors one of a kind fine art sketches and prints from my personal collection.

    


Thank you for your interest and consideration.  With your support, we can take Jolleson to the next level, and make my dream of becoming an international fashion designer a reality.

story:
Our Story

Hello! We are Paradigm Threads Co. A UK inspired, extreme sports clothing brand. 

Our company is innovative, fairly priced, and creative enough to be the new trend-setter in the clothing industry. We have big ambitions, and we believe our mission is really going to be a PARADIGM for the rest of the industry to look up to.


We are made up of Tom, Jack, Oli & Ellie and our amazing team riders (all working hard for no wage)! As a company we strongly believe that high quality, organic fabrics should be available to our customers for a fair price.


We provide a range of clothing for people who love the lifestyle associated with action sports, and also for you cool seasoned riders.


With your help, we are looking to expand our small business by printing a wider variety of designs, advertising our new web store, and printing our shirts at a lower cost so we can pass the savings to you :)

The Impact

We have struggled to find funding up till now, as we like to absorb a lot of the cost to provide a fair price to the customer. This doesn’t provide big investors with a good enough return to part with their money. That’s where you guys come in!

We have set ourselves a goal of $6,500 as a maximum level goal. This is the amount of cash we need to go ahead with our "expansion plans for world domination", or just to get us out there! 

We have sold masses of shirts in our local area and online, however to reach a wider audience, we need all the funding we can get to make this thing huge!


 

In essence, the more we can raise here, the better!



What We Need & What You Get

In order to enhance our plans to take the industry by storm with fresh, inventive and creative ideas, we need to do the following things...

 


  • Broadening the range by introducing hoodies, new designs and more women's clothing
  • Speak to larger retailers to stock our garments, and attend trade shows
  • Ordering a higher number of garments so that we can reduce our per unit cost, and carry this cost to the consumer
  • Help transport our ‘chill out’ zone to events
  • Travel to a larger number of events around the UK to promote ourselves, including NASS and Beach Break Live.
  • Shoot more cool footage of our team riders, and support our cameraman, Jack
  • Advertise paradigm through Facebook, events and adverts in magazine
  • Get creative with some really awesome competitions
  • Equipment to allow us to take card-payments when we're out and about
  • A small market-traders license for selling locally
  • Banners and Flags to tell people who we are out in public
  • Take our hard-working riders to a decent outdoor resort to help film the Paradigm Movie.

We are offering some really cool incentives that we hope are meaningful enough for you to feel like a really important member of our brand. 
These include 1st access to new products, exclusive lifetime memberships with Paradigm+, VIP tickets to events with the team, your own design named after you, and permanent places on our website to be forever thanked. ... and many more rewards! (See the perks section)
 

 


Other Ways You Can Help

A big part of our strategy to expand is ADVERTISING & MARKETING. We are a really natural, organic company and we feel that our marketing also needs to be grass-roots. However we do need to sow our seeds as far and wide as possible.

If you don't want to donate, but really like us, please spread the word about us. Like us on Facebook, mention us in blogs and forums. Any little helps, and you'll get that awesome warm, fuzzy feeling from helping a small startup such as ourselves!

If you have any cool ideas about new reward tiers, then DEFINITELY let us know! Go to http://paradigmthreads.co.uk/social/inspire/ and leave us some words of advice about ANYTHING you like!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EXCLUSIVE TO FACEBOOK USERS: 

Like us on Facebook, join our Event page & make a contribution of ANY amount, and be entered into a chance to win EVERY SINGLE PERK! Seriously, every single one. These prizes are worth over £3,000 so it's a great opportunity to get involved!

http://www.facebook.com/paradigmthreads


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


We can't wait to put your amazing donations to good use, see you all on the world stage soon!



Tom, Jack, Oli & Ellie
story_txt:
Our Story
Hello! We are Paradigm Threads Co. A UK inspired, extreme sports clothing brand. 

Our company is innovative, fairly priced, and creative enough to be the new trend-setter in the clothing industry. We have big ambitions, and we believe our mission is really going to be a PARADIGM for the rest of the industry to look up to.
We are made up of Tom, Jack, Oli & Ellie and our amazing team riders (all working hard for no wage)! As a company we strongly believe that high quality, organic fabrics should be available to our customers for a fair price.

We provide a range of clothing for people who love the lifestyle associated with action sports, and also for you cool seasoned riders.

With your help, we are looking to expand our small business by printing a wider variety of designs, advertising our new web store, and printing our shirts at a lower cost so we can pass the savings to you :)


The Impact
We have struggled to find funding up till now, as we like to absorb a lot of the cost to provide a fair price to the customer. This doesn’t provide big investors with a good enough return to part with their money. That’s where you guys come in!
We have set ourselves a goal of $6,500 as a maximum level goal. This is the amount of cash we need to go ahead with our "expansion plans for world domination", or just to get us out there! 
We have sold masses of shirts in our local area and online, however to reach a wider audience, we need all the funding we can get to make this thing huge!

 


In essence, the more we can raise here, the better!




What We Need & What You Get
In order to enhance our plans to take the industry by storm with fresh, inventive and creative ideas, we need to do the following things...
 


Broadening the range by introducing hoodies, new designs and more women's clothing
Speak to larger retailers to stock our garments, and attend trade shows
Ordering a higher number of garments so that we can reduce our per unit cost, and carry this cost to the consumer
Help transport our ‘chill out’ zone to events
Travel to a larger number of events around the UK to promote ourselves, including NASS and Beach Break Live.
Shoot more cool footage of our team riders, and support our cameraman, Jack
Advertise paradigm through Facebook, events and adverts in magazine
Get creative with some really awesome competitions
Equipment to allow us to take card-payments when we're out and about
A small market-traders license for selling locally
Banners and Flags to tell people who we are out in public
Take our hard-working riders to a decent outdoor resort to help film the Paradigm Movie.


We are offering some really cool incentives that we hope are meaningful enough for you to feel like a really important member of our brand. 

These include 1st access to new products, exclusive lifetime memberships with Paradigm+, VIP tickets to events with the team, your own design named after you, and permanent places on our website to be forever thanked. ... and many more rewards! (See the perks section)

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help


A big part of our strategy to expand is ADVERTISING & MARKETING. We are a really natural, organic company and we feel that our marketing also needs to be grass-roots. However we do need to sow our seeds as far and wide as possible.
If you don't want to donate, but really like us, please spread the word about us. Like us on Facebook, mention us in blogs and forums. Any little helps, and you'll get that awesome warm, fuzzy feeling from helping a small startup such as ourselves!
If you have any cool ideas about new reward tiers, then DEFINITELY let us know! Go to http://paradigmthreads.co.uk/social/inspire/ and leave us some words of advice about ANYTHING you like!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Like us on Facebook, join our Event page & make a contribution of ANY amount, and be entered into a chance to win EVERY SINGLE PERK! Seriously, every single one. These prizes are worth over £3,000 so it's a great opportunity to get involved!
http://www.facebook.com/paradigmthreads

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We can't wait to put your amazing donations to good use, see you all on the world stage soon!


Tom, Jack, Oli & Ellie

story:
Our Story

 

Coming up as a teenager in the Bronx of New York, learning and playing Volleyball was one of the most difficult things ever. I remember friends and family members being able to play baseball, basketball, football, or soccer for little or no money at all while some of my other friends and I suffered by turning down offers to play on Volleyball clubs because of the cost.

 

Coming from the Bronx, asking your parents to pay out between $1,500 or even $3,700 is a ridiculous joke which most parents laugh about and totally dismiss without recognizing the seriousness of their child and the possibilities within. This is where Legacy comes in!

 

Legacy Volleyball is a non-profit organization working diligently to provide Volleyball training and education not just to elite players, but also to any young athlete who wants to learn the sport of Volleyball. 

 

An Impact

 

Every Coach holds an IMPACT or CAP certification recognized by the United State of America Volleyball Association and every player will be able to learn from them at AFFORDABLE prices or no cost!

 

Every Coach holds a high standard of education, which will be instilled onto the athletes in an effort to promote higher education and a higher standard of living.

 

There over 1,000 colleges and universities sponsoring woman's Volleyball across the nation. Together, they are offering over 12,000 Volleyball scholarships! By playing club Volleyball, each athlete is exposed to this grand opportunity that might be the difference between going to college or not!

 

A major distraction from today's world of war, poverty, bullying, and  adolescent pregnancy among many others.

 

We are creating and expanding a network of friends who will share and enjoy the social benefits of Volleyball for years to come!

 

Without this opportunity, we are leaving thousands of players in New York City without a chance just because they did not make a team or could not afford to pay for a club. Helps us in our efforts to provide Volleyball to all  student athletes!

What We Need & What You Get

Here is what we need:

  • Equipment (Balls, Ball Cart, Bags, Ankle Braces, Knee Pads)
  • Uniforms (Team Jersey, Libero Jersey, Shorts, Socks)
  • Gymnasium Space (Rent Fees)
  • Tournament (Registration Fees)
  • Transportation
  • Scholarships (For Club)

 

If you do the math, $8,000 is only a fraction of the cost to fully operate a Volleyball organization, but it's a start! By raising $8,000, we are working together to fund this club and spread the opportunity throughout the city.

 

Donating does not come without its rewards! Check out the perks that come with each level of donation!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Spread the word out to everyone you know, or come across, including strangers. If you can not contribute financially, letting others know about this campaign would be greatly appreciated. Here are some ways you can get the word out!

 

  • Create a quick email blast
  • Shout it out on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites
  • Text your contact list or give someone a call
  • Tell your own mother, father, brother, sister, cousin, niece, nephew, store clerk, teacher, coach, boss, coworkers, bartender, girlfriend, wife, in-laws, trainer, principal, neighbor, and ANYONE ELSE!
  • Leave words of encouragement in the comment section.

 

Let's create opportunities! Let's make it happen!

story:
• Hey, I'm Felicia Barth-Aasen and I'm the founder/creative director of The Collective. I graduated from The Fashion Institute of Technology in 2011 with a B.F.A. in fashion design. 

  • I've always wanted to be a fashion designer and after interning with several companies in N.Y.C. I decided I was extremely passionate about creating my own line. So, this May after taking 9 months to save up my own money, I started my line. The goal was to start a business that would impact our local economy by employing artisans within our own community. I wanted to be able to trace where my clothing was coming from. I wanted to know that it was being produced in an ethical way and bring work to the U.S. at the same time. 
  • So far we've been able to create consistent work for two artisans and in the future we hope to grow even more in this area by collaborating with artists to create specialty pieces and by sourcing american made materials whenever possible. 
  • We want to create a space where creative minds can meet; where people of different backgrounds can collaborate to build a brand that is responsibly produced and sold. 
  • We're currently producing 15 looks for our runway show as an official event of L.A. fashion week in October and getting ready to officially launch The Collective! Fashion week is so important because we need the opportunity to be exposed to buyers, media and consumers. It's an amazing opportunity and we are well on our way to getting there…But we need your support! 
  • The $5,000 goal will help cover the costs of L.A. fashion week, sample making, and marketing for the launch of the collection. If we meet our goal we will be able to start production to sell the line in boutiques and online retailers in Spring 2013.Please share this campaign with all of your friends and network it to whoever you can! You can even use the share button on Indiegogo or Facebook! Check out our sweet incentives below and know that all donations are deeply felt and appreciated! Thank you so so so much!!! XOXO- The Collective/Felicia

 

Breakdown Of Our Costs-

$2,000- Will cover the costs of models, hair and makeup, lighting, and music for the show at L.A. Fashion Week. 

$1,500- Will cover the production costs for the clothing samples. 

$1,000- Will cover the costs of all the materials; fabric, zippers, trims, finishes, and supplies. 

$500-    Will Cover the cost for our new website, marketing, look book, and promotional materials. 

****UNTIL I CAN FIGURE OUT HOW TO SHOW PERKS ON THIS PAGE, PLEASE CLICK GALLERY TO SEE THEM!!!!***** Thank you! 

Photos and video by Mary Newman.

story:
UPDATE: 1/29/2013

I'm back with a new design! Actually the first in a series of designs that I plan to roll out on 100% organic garment including hemp. "Moa Anbessa Ze Imnegede Yehuda" translates to "Conquering Lion of the Tribe of Judah". You can own this design by choosing the perk, Moa Anbessa (Conquering Lion). This design will print in 5 colors; Army, Black, Espresso, Gray for organic shirts; and Natural for hemp! This shirt will be available February 25, 2013! Get yours now! Respect Mon!!

UPDATE: 1/13/2013

Happy New Years everyone. I've been hard at work planning out the new designs for TINK DIFFRAN label. I've also been busy working on the music side of Dread & Alive/Tink Diffran. I will be releasing two tracks from the artist Faianatur next month which will include a special tshirt design for the album release. The songs are entitled No Evil and Dread & Alive. I'm currrently in the studio working on mixing and mastering the tracks. I also have a new hoodie design to share with you from TINK DIFFRAN and Dread & Alive... The Conquering Lion... Drew McIntosh! This design will be available in pullover and zipup hoodies (black) for men and women. I'll also be posting the official label design later on this month.

UPDATE: 12/23/2012

Dread & Alive: Rastafari is another Dread & Alive design from TINK DIFFRAN which will be ready to ship on Bob Marley's Earthstrong, Feb 6, 2013! Available in t-shirt, tank and hoodie!

UPDATE: 12/18/2012

One World, One Love is another Dread & Alive hoodie design from TINK DIFFRAN which will be ready to ship on Bob Marley's Earthstrong, Feb 6, 2013! Available in hoodie and t-shirt!

UPDATE: 12/11/2012

The Dread & Alive FEAR NO EVIL t-shirt and hoodie will be ready to ship on Bob Marley's Earthstrong, Feb 6, 2013! Tink Diffran Mon!

UPDATE: 12/03/2012

I will have the Dread & Alive ZOMBIE t-shirt ready to ship on Dec. 15 so if you're looking to surprise a loved one or a friend this Christmas with a Zombie, I'll make it happen!

Greetings Bredren!

My name is Nicholas Da Silva but my friends call me Nico. I am the founder of ZOOLOOK, an independent design studio and publishing house based in San Francisco and Brasil. I'm also the creator of the Dread & Alive series, the first comic book/novel series featuring a Jamaican protagonist. The series follows the dreadlocked hero, Drew McIntosh, and his heroic exploits as he battles his nemesis, the nefarious Shadowcatcher and his army of duppies (evil spirits) and zombies in babylon empowered by a sacred amulet created by the ancient Maroons of Jamaica.

What is Dread & Alive?

Dread & Alive is the first multimedia series spanning comic books, novels and music. First published in 1997 as an original short story and inspired by the legacy of the Maroons of Jamaica and the music of reggae legends like Bob Marley & The Wailers, Peter Tosh, Black Uhuru, Steel Pulse, Third World and Burning Spear, Dread & Alive blurs the line between comics and music, offering an original storyline that meshes cultural fact with fiction accompanied by the conscious sounds of today’s reggae music. You can visit the official website at www.dreadandalive.com.

Since launching the Dread & Alive series in comic book and novel format, Dread & Alive has received over 150,000 likes on the official Dread & Alive Facebook fan page: http://www.facebook.com/dreadandalive

Tink Diffran on Indiegogo?

With the release of the newest issue of Dread & Alive, the Zero Issue, I've decided that it's time to officially launch the apparel line for the Dread & Alive series under the brand name TINK DIFFRAN. And that's where you come in. By making a pledge to my campaign, your contribution will go directly to the cost of launching the first set of T-shirts under the TINK DIFFRAN brand. Your contribution enables me to:

  • create custom woven labels for the shirts which will appear on the neck and sleeve.
  • order the minimum number of shirts in all sizes to get the best possible bulk price break for our first production run
  • use an eco-friendly method of discharge printing with waterbased inks to achieve extremely soft and vibrant prints on the t-shirts
  • print my designs on high quality 100% organic cotton t-shirts in sizes for kids, youths and adults (men and women)

What Do You Get?

For helping me achieve my goal, you'll be able to score the shirt of your choice before the official TINK DIFFRAN store launch date of 4/20/2013. That's right, all contributors will receive their shirts ahead of the online store launch date. How cool is that!?! Kinda makes you feel special, huh?

As an added bonus, each shirt design will include a special QR Code inside the shirt offering you a free download of an exclusive reggae track inspired by the Dread & Alive series!

What if we reach/exceed our goal?

We'll print more t-shirts. Not only that, if we double our goal, I'll release the next set in the series, which include two Shadowcatcher designs, a one color design featuring the nefarious shapeshifter, Shadowcatcher, an Obeahman who possesses the ability to steal your shadow and turn you into one of the dead who walk among the living (see below).

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who can't make a contribution to my campaign, it doesn’t mean that you can’t help:

  • You can help me by getting the word out and making some noise about my campaign.
  • You can also remind your friends to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Give thanks for your support! One love!

story:
Our Story

I am a student at Minnesota School of Business in Richfield, MN. I am finishing my Bachelor's of Fine Arts for Digital Video and Media Production. This project is being broken up into three classes: pre-production, production and post production; spanning over the time of 9 months. My graduation date is expected to be December of 2012.

 

The Impact

I want to expose, inspire and educate women about archery. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to raise $3,000 in order to pay for gas, craft services, equipment rental (camera, studio, lab, etc.) , props for the interview room, DVDs, stock photography (if I am unable to get a hold of a DSLR,)  and hopefully enough to pay my crew.

story:
Who We Are & What We Aim to Accomplish

We are seniors studying Product Design at Drexel University, and we are a small group of individuals driven by a common goal to make positive changes in the world. We have spent the past seven months developing our senior thesis projects, which tackle difficult issues ranging from public education to environmentalism. 

Creating viable solutions to these issues has been incredibly challenging, and we are proud and excited to finally introduce our solutions to the public at the Product Design Senior Show in June. 

Why We Need Your Help 
We are completely responsible for everything that goes into this event from funding, to catering, to building the displays for our work. We cover everything for our individual projects out-of-pocket, but the cost of show itself is more than we can afford on our own. 

Despite cutting corners as much as possible, the total budget for the show is $6,000. This is why we ask for your generosity, to facilitate the production of an event with the potential to bring our solutions to reality. 

Update May 9 We are thrilled to have met our initial goal for this page. THANK YOU!! However, between this and our other fundraising efforts, we are still about $3,000 short of the total cost of the show.


Details & Benefits

The Senior Show is our opportunity to present our solutions to the public. While our drive to push our projects to reality is unwavering, we cannot do it alone.  

With your generosity, we can secure printing costs. 

But other basic needs include:

  • Professional displays
  • Promotional materials
  • Furniture and equipment rentals
  • Event catering
We want to host an exhibition worthy of the heart and hard work we put into these projects, but to do so will require significant funding, as printing costs alone surpass our listed campaign goal.

Benefits for Suggested Donation Amounts
$125+  A custom T-shirt, designed by our class, a Product Design mug, and a special Thank You in the event program
$75+  Product Design mug, custom designed token of appreciation, and a special Thank You in the event program
$35+  Product Design mug and a special Thank You in the event program
$15+  A special Thank You in the event program


Our Potential

Our program is relatively new -ours is the second graduating class- but talent and drive has led to student involvement working with companies such as Comcast, Honeywell, Martha Stewart, Ecco Design, K'Nex, Inglis House, and more. 

We are smart. We are driven. We are talented. We care, and we can make a difference. To do that, we need people to see our work.


Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have spare cash to give to strangers? We get it, and we thank you just for taking the time to watch our video and read our campaign. 

We ask you to simply share this page, so other people can learn about us and our solutions, and there is a higher chance that our hard work will be put to good use. 


The Show
Displays will be up in the URBN Annex beginning May 31st. 
The event night will be Friday, June 5 from 4pm to 8pm.


The Projects

EATSENTIALS Apollonia Heinz 
Waste is a global epidemic. In the US, the average person makes an average of 7 lbs of waste a day and 1/3 of the US total waste is food containers/packaging. My product works to use waste accumulation as a way of limiting the amount of waste people create. Through creating easy to use and transport reusable food containers and developing a maintenance system to care for the containers, it is possible to divert otherwise useful materials from landfills.


The Smart Faucet Connor White
Every human has the right to clean and sustainable water. My name is Connor White, cofounder and chief creative officer of Tern. At Tern, we strive to create an independent, sustainable water system within homes through the installation of modular products. The Smart Faucet is the first product of several which achieves the Tern vision through purification and information-sharing.


Stratify Maia Ottenstein

 Most contemporary solutions to improve student achievement neglect the importance of student fulfillment. This project seeks to improve the public school student’s academic experience by facilitating more rewarding and efficient interactions with content. Stratify supports focus and builds understanding through visual organization, and facilitates the enhancement of critical thinking skills using non-intimidating guides for reflection.


BeeThere Minsu Jin

In a world of rapid development, I believe in designs that bring convenience and timesaving solutions into modern life. BeeThere is a short-distance navigation device that connects transportations at airports and train stations. It minimizes uncertainty between transferring gaps by providing a continuous route and clear information to help travelers quickly find the next place they have to be.


Keepsake Stephanie Kovacs

Art is inherently connective. Through an immersive research process, current barriers to art interpretation are analyzed and new ways to promote active visitor engagement within art museums are investigated. The solution, Keepsake, is a system that celebrates and aids the physical process of viewing art while integrating digital tools for more in-depth discovery. A physical guide helps visitors to find their way while a digital platform enables visitors to capture art beyond museum walls.


Osmosis Sean Preston

Osmosis is a professional navigation platform designed to facilitate career exploration and provide personalized career discovery tools for high school students. Through Osmosis, students have the ability to connect with professionals and learn from the experiences of people like them. It can be difficult to find out what you want to pursue after high school, but it doesn’t have to be. With Osmosis, you can easily find people similar to you to see which schools and professions may be a good fit for you.


arTIPS Mai Lu

Our society is one that greatly undervalues artists. There are few services geared specifically towards’ artists needs. Artists grow by connecting with and learning from other artists, but often lack the means to make those connections and find needed information. arTIPS is an app-based platform to connect artists and serve as a community for sharing and seeking resources. By providing artists with the tools to find needed information more easily, artists can empower themselves.


Synesthesia Max Solomon

This project explores how design can use multisensory immersion to educate an individual about their experiences in relation to their environment. The Synesthesia System enables a user to undergo a process of introspective reflection by recording their experiences and then categorizing them by emotion and location. The aims of this project are to help guide the user towards a broader comfort zone in their local area, as well as towards a more self-actualized existence.
story_txt:
Who We Are & What We Aim to Accomplish We are seniors studying Product Design at Drexel University, and we are a small group of individuals driven by a common goal to make positive changes in the world. We have spent the past seven months developing our senior thesis projects, which tackle difficult issues ranging from public education to environmentalism. 
Creating viable solutions to these issues has been incredibly challenging, and we are proud and excited to finally introduce our solutions to the public at the Product Design Senior Show in June. 


Why We Need Your Help We are completely responsible for everything that goes into this event from funding, to catering, to building the displays for our work. We cover everything for our individual projects out-of-pocket, but the cost of show itself is more than we can afford on our own. 


Despite cutting corners as much as possible, the total budget for the show is $6,000. This is why we ask for your generosity, to facilitate the production of an event with the potential to bring our solutions to reality. 


Update May 9 We are thrilled to have met our initial goal for this page. THANK YOU!! However, between this and our other fundraising efforts, we are still about $3,000 short of the total cost of the show.

   Details & Benefits

The Senior Show is our opportunity to present our solutions to the public. While our drive to push our projects to reality is unwavering, we cannot do it alone.  
With your generosity, we can secure printing costs. 
But other basic needs include:

Professional displays
Promotional materials
Furniture and equipment rentals
Event catering
We want to host an exhibition worthy of the heart and hard work we put into these projects, but to do so will require significant funding, as printing costs alone surpass our listed campaign goal.

Benefits for Suggested Donation Amounts$125+  A custom T-shirt, designed by our class, a Product Design mug, and a special Thank You in the event program$75+  Product Design mug, custom designed token of appreciation, and a special Thank You in the event program$35+  Product Design mug and a special Thank You in the event program$15+  A special Thank You in the event program

story:
Fabric and Stitching. Our packs are made from 10.10oz waxed cotton canvas; it is lightweight, durable and water-proof. Proper stitching is important for the life of a good bag. We chose a heavy-duty polyester thread, the most expensive, but strongest option.

Leather. We chose premium veg-tan leather for our straps and strap padding on the Appalachian and Crest packs. The leather acts as reinforcement and accents on the Divide. After cutting our straps we hand-dye them with a weather-proof coating.

Brass. We use solid cast brass for our hardware (excluding the Divide's snap buckles). This means that our rivets, closures and webbing buckles are rust-proof and far stronger than the normal zinc hardware.

 Technical Specs

$25 Pledge, help build the trail and get an Uphill Designs enamel camp mug or trucker hat. 

Missed our last campaign? Still want awesome bamboo hiking poles? We are offering a special Kickstarter price to grab a set. Add $99, or $149 to any pledge level to receive a set of fixed length or collapsible hiking poles. Or navigate to our website www.UphillDesigns.com to pick up a pair anytime!

In 2013, founder of Uphill Designs Dan Sedlacek hiked from Mexico to Canada along the Pacific Crest Trail. As a PCT thru-hiker who made much of his own gear for the 2,665 mile trek, Dan understands what it takes for products to hold up on any terrain. Because of his experiences on the trail, he sought to create a new type of hiking equipment that better connects hikers to their natural surroundings.

At Uphill Designs, we believe that the gear we use in nature reflects our attitudes towards it. Our gear evokes the feelings of being on the trail: natural materials, burned logos, and simple designs leave a hiker yearning for the simple beauty of the woods and the smell of a campfire. We know that the modern adventurer spends most of their time away from nature so we built a product that allows everyone to stay connected with the outdoors wherever they go.

Dan founded Uphill Designs after thru-hiking the Pacific Crest Trail in 2013. During the 2,665 miles, he carried a tent and pack he had sewn himself. He was given the trail name Uphill for his love of steep climbs and breathtaking views. Dan now uses his M.S. in Materials Science & Engineering from the University of Washington to create hiking equipment perfect for the trail. Outside of the workshop he loves to climb cliffs throughout Washington.

David is the numbers guy. His favorite hike is the Na Pali Coast trail in Hawaii. He helped co-found Uphill while earning his MBA from the Foster School of Business at the University of Washington. He now splits his time between creating sustainable hiking equipment, working for a Seattle management consulting firm and growing the best kale in Seattle.

Mallory is the lead strategist and marketer at Uphill Designs. She joined the team after completing a Masters of Science in Bioengineering with a focus on Global Health Diagnostics at the University of Washington. She loves exploring the back-country of Glacier National Park and takes her camera wherever she goes. When she is not cutting leather or writing press releases she loves to teach yoga and make chocolate-centric desserts.

Risks and challenges

We are an experienced team in design and manufacture of outdoor equipment. We delivered our first crowdfunded product on time and on budget, even when faced with unexpected delays. We believe in open, honest communication with backers and provide updates monthly.

The handcrafted nature of our design process allows us to maintain great control of our production line and solve problems and delays quickly. We have made our prototype backpacks from the suppliers of our raw materials and are ready to order in bulk.

Proper stitching is important for the life of a good bag. We chose a heavy-duty polyester thread, the most expensive, but strongest option.Our packs come in Forest Green, Earth, and Natural colors.Leather. We chose premium veg-tan leather for our straps and strap padding on the Appalachian and Crest packs. The leather acts as reinforcement and accents on the Divide. After cutting our straps we hand-dye them with a weather-proof coating.Brass. We use solid cast brass for our hardware (excluding the Divide's snap buckles). This means that our rivets, closures and webbing buckles are rust-proof and far stronger than the normal zinc hardware. Technical Specs$25 Pledge, help build the trail and get an Uphill Designs enamel camp mug or trucker hat. Missed our last campaign? Still want awesome bamboo hiking poles? story:
It’s a dilemma any fashionista will recognize: you’ve found the perfect bag after years of hunting. The only problem: its about $200 more than you wanted to pay. Then, when you do find a bag that does meet your price range, the style just isn’t quite up to pay with what your aesthetic.

GINIK is an ambitious up-and-coming Italian designer brand that competes with names such as Gucci, Prada and Louis Vuitton. The key factor that distinguishes GINIK from these entrenched fashion giants is that GINIK gives customers the freedom to choose the level of quality of the design that he or she would like. This process entirely changes the shopping industry by satisfying the customer in every shape and form. The result: GINIK has the vision, strategy and product to revolutionize the designer fashion industry. And that mission starts here. 

After our research and analysis of the general fashion market and its competitors was performed, we have to invent and introduce new strategies, solutions and actions. The new strategic goals that have been set to start the company are:

  • Luxury fashion electronic:  Women can never go out without carrying their bags full of cosmetics, makeup, mirror, etc. We want to introduce a new dynamic solution to that. They can still carry all those things in their bag but with freedom(from 1° year)
  • Introducing a new dynamic system called “Grades” that makes luxury fashion for all.(Not for poorest)(from first year)
  • Introduce the most beautiful dynamic designs(new) to attract customers(from first year)
  • Despite our 10 wholesalers in 7 major countries in the world that we have already, we will create more huge amount of channels      for marketing. More wholesalers, retailers, online marketing(from 1° yr)
  • Introduce a new fashion technology for the first time: The fashion technology collection is made of three devices: Scio device, smart bag Shoulder Belt Device and Medical device. (from 2° year)
  • Luxury fashion mechanic: High heel equilibrium to 65% of women worldwide who have difficulty walking on high heel(from 3° year). To understand solution, you can see this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFpRLjmAicc 
  • Introducing the possibilities of Luxury Fashion at your command: Depending on your budget (from 4th year)
  • Introduce New Fashion Traveling Office(Technologies):This will come with executive GINIK  traveling bags that make you connected with your office. Even if your office is in New York but you are in London for any purpose, as long as you have your GINIK traveling bag, your office is right  there with you.(from 5° year)
  • Introduce new Fashion Portable Office(Technologies): (from 6° year)
  • Introduce new children’s line(from 8° year)
  • Introduce sports line(from 10° year)

In order to stand before our competitors, these above several strategies, solutions and actions are going to be implemented for the first time in the world of Luxury Fashion Industry.

GINIK is an up-and-coming Italian designer brand on a mission to change the phrase from “what you see is what you get” to “what you want is what you get.”

GINIK designs and produces stylish fashion technology, elegant bags, shoes and other accessories that gives you unprecedented levels of choice and control over the quality and feel of your accessories.

Made of the the finest materials, our GINIK designs are meticulously crafted by experienced Italian craftsmen to indulge you in the world of high fashion.

Beautiful designs, beautiful quality at your command. That’s the GINIK philosophy. 

There's always a game of give and take in the world of fashion, but at GINIK we’re making it our mission to change that by introducing a unique "grade" model that gives you the freedom to choose, not just the style, but the quality and craftsmanship that match your lifestyle -- and your budget.

Say goodbye to your days of choosing between fashion, lifestyle and affordability, because with GINIK, you can have all. 

My dear, we have finally found investors but our problem is that we were asked to present ourselves with a prototype and a presentation video inform of Advertisement. The promotional video is because they want to know the kind of company we are building to compete our competitors. 
We are here to seek for your support so that we can produce the fashion electronic prototype and the video which is going to be registered in Venice Italy. We have to make it to the standard.
We estimated a total of $19.500. But currently we have only $10.000. This is why we are here to seek for your support for the rest of $9.500
Location:  Hotel Danieli, Venice, Italy.

We don't want to go down to the details explaining to you what Fashion Electronic is all about to avoid copyright but believe us is something new with a great idea mainly for women that want to update their luxury lifestyle and is affordable for all. Then Fashion Technology is all about handbag with technologies...
We know that not all of you might be interested in our perks but we will still come back here to appreciate your concern by offering you our Fashion Electronic bag.  We want to do it because these $9.500 worth a lot to us if we will be able to have these video and prototype done. 
So please, even is you don't want our perks, please you can still donate whatever you have. We will still come back to you with offers.

We are in 21° century and is high time to solve our problems which is GINIK's mission to do so.



MISSION

GINIK is on a mission to change the phrase from “what you see is what you get” to “what you want is what you get.”

PRODUCTS

GINIK designs and produces stylish, elegant bags, shoes and other accessories that gives you unprecedented levels of choice and control over the quality and feel of your accessories.


PRODUCTION

Made of the the finest materials, our GINIK designs are meticulously crafted by experienced Italian craftsmen to indulge you in the world of high fashion. All made in ITALY.

Beautiful designs, beautiful quality at your command. That’s the GINIK philosophy.


Our products are made by the same experienced Italian craftsmen that have been in existence since 1964(5th generation of an antique Italian company since 1901). The same companies that brought up and produce for GUCCI, CAVALLI, PRADA, etc. I'm working for these companies. If not, I wouldn't have the possibility to the opportunity they gave to me.


COMPETITORS

My competitors are GUCCI, PRADA, LOUIS VUITTON, etc 


Say goodbye to your days of choosing between fashion, lifestyle and affordability, because with GINIK, you can have all.

MATERIALS


The world most expensive animal leathers are:  which most of my competitors do not use.

  • 1. Stingray Found in: Europe Africa: The Stingray is the skin, tanned, Shark Scyliorhinus canicula also called dogfish or race cowtail stingray. Because of its high production cost is used for the coating of objects of prestige. The skin of Galuchat is a type of skin is very hard and durable and can last a very long time. It is named after its first owner, Jean-Claude Galuchat a French craftsman died in 1774 he was in the service of King Louis XV.
  • 2. Crocodile Found in: Africa USA India
  • 3. Seal Found in: Green Land Ice Land
  • 4. Snake Found : Globally
  • 5. Kangaroo Found in: Australia
  • 6. Ostrich Found in: Africa
  • 7. Deer Found in: Globally* Except*- Greenland, Africa, Ice Land
  • 8. Whale Found : Globally
  • 9. Walrus Found in: Canada Greenland
  • 10. Yak Found : Central Asia

GINIK is the new up-and-coming designer brand that brings personalization to your shopping experience.


At GINIK, we give our customers what they want by offering the same model of bags, shoes and more at a variety of prices, each corresponding to a specific grade of leather. There are five major grades to choose from, of the same model/design but different leathers, all of which are high-quality genuine leather. And will be easy to differentiate them.

This idea is to let everyone have what he/she wants. If our president has one of our models/designs at his price, you poor one can still have the same design/model with/at your own price.

Whether you happen upon a GINIK design in a boutique or online retailer, you choose which design you love most, pick the quality of leather you’d like and you’ll get the design in the grade you want. Before you get your buttery leather GINIK bag or shoes, each product is tested before shipped off to your happy arms or feet.

Do not change your life style but its only a matter of how high you’d like to upgrade it...


At GINIK, we believe that a bag should be as unique as you are. After all, it follows you wherever you go and, let’s face it, it carries around your whole life for you.

Our designs are creative and sophisticated, so you can wear your bag from your office to an evening soiree.


Ginika doesn’t just share a related name with the brand. He’s the bold visionist behind the company. Born in Nigeria, Ginika relocated to Italy in 2007 to work with the hottest brands in the fashion industry including Gucci, etc. 

Have his company in USA in 2014. 

His outstanding fashion connections have come in handy in the founding of GINIK and his creativity can be found in every fiber of our products.


We are here to seek for your support so that we can produce more prototypes with these strategies, solutions and actions as already mentioned above. And then to be able to present what we have to investors.


How our solutions are better:

Luxury Fashion Technologies, Luxury Fashion grades, Luxury Fashion Electronics  Luxury Fashion Mechanics, Luxury Fashion at your command, lower prices, dynamic designs to attract customers, etc.

GINIK is the new up-and-coming designer brand that brings personalization to your shopping experience.

At GINIK, we give our customers what they want by offering the same model of bags, shoes and more at a variety of prices, each corresponding to a specific grade of leather. There are five major grades to choose from, all of which are high-quality.

Do not change your life style but its only a matter of how high you’d like to upgrade it...

At GINIK, we believe that a bag should be as unique as you are. After all, it follows you wherever you go and, let’s face it, it carries around your whole life for you.

Our designs are creative and sophisticated, so you can wear your bag from your office to an evening soiree.

But we don’t want to leave you with an amazing bag hanging off your arm without the perfect accessories to complement it. That’s just rude. That’s why GINIK offers a variety of beautifully made shoes and wristwatches to complete your look.

Whether you happen upon a GINIK design in a boutique or online retailer, you choose which design you love most, pick the quality of leather you’d like and you’ll get the design in the grade you want. Before you get your buttery leather GINIK bag or shoes, each product is tested before shipped off to your happy arms or feet.


We have prototypes for several of our unique designs of bags and shoes that are out and ready for the fashion world to see.

  

We are also collaborating with fashion giants Luisa Via Roma and Net-A-Porter, who are online carriers of luxury brands that ship nationwide. We have made deals with shops throughout London, France, USA, Australia, Germany, Italy, Denmark, Nigeria, and Japan who are waiting to make GINIK bags and accessories available to their clientele.

         

Preparation hasn’t stopped there — even the finest details have been covered. We have connections with SNATT, which is one of the largest logistics companies in Europe and has the ability to propel the company from quality control to packaging.

Watch out Gucci, Prada, and Louis Vuitton: GINIK has dug deep into European fashion and is ready to take the fashion industry by storm. Request access to the Business Plan of this profile to learn more about how GINIK will use market, model, management and momentum to become the biggest name in fashion!

Luxury Fashion Technology Partners

SCiO from Israel: part of GINIK Fashion Technology

SCiO will provide a part of the software to develop our Fashion Technology. It's very important to GINIK 

EB Elektrobit from Israel finalizes our Fashion Technology: EB Elektrobit will also develop a part of our software to finalize our Fashion Technology.

It's very important to GINIK. 

{}p#

Luxury Fashion Electronic Partner

 SN SYSTEM from Italy: They will develope the mechanism of our Fashion Electronic

{}p#

Luxury Fashion Mechanic

 Contitech from Israel: will realize and produce only the dynamic system of our fashion mechanic for the equilibrium of high heels


Chukwujama Izuchukwu Ginika
Ginika doesn’t just share a related name with the brand. He’s the bold visionist behind the company. Born in Nigeria, Ginika relocated to Italy in 2007 to work with the hottest brands in the fashion industry including Gucci. His outstanding fashion connections have come in handy in the founding of GINIK and his creativity can be found in every fiber of our products.
